input: Create a new task or variable.
Delete the selected task or variable.
Enable disable the selected task or variable.
target: Yenza khubaza umsebenzi okhethiweyo okanye umahluko.

input: Dima Rogozin dima mercury. co. il
Like all kde applications,konqueror is highly configurable. This document describes how konqueror behaves with the normal,default settings.
target: Njengazo zonke izicelo,i konqueror iyaqwalaseleka kakulu.Eli liyaqwalaseleka

input: A three button mouse can be useful when you are running konqueror or any other kde application. If your mouse only has two buttons then you should be able to set your system up so that you can simulate a MMB by pressing both buttons at the same time.
target: Imouse enamaqhosha amathathu ingaluncedo xa usenza i konqueror okanyenayiphi na enye kde isicelo.Ukuba imouse yakho inamaqhosha amabini kuphela ngoku ungakwazi ukucwangcisa indlela yakho ukuze ukwazi ukuveza i MMB ngokucinezela amaqhosha omabini ngexesha elinye.

input: If you are used to having to double-click to perform an action,then take care,because in common with the rest of kde ,konqueror defaults to single-clicking.
target: Ukuba sele uqhele ukuba nonqakrazo- kabini ukwenza intshukumo,ngoku yijnge,kuba okudibeneyo nokusele kwi kde,konqueror okungagqibekanga kunqakrazo- kanye.

input: Being a combined File Manager and Browser,konqueror will automatically switch between the two modes as needed when it is running,but it is convenient to be able to choose which mode is to be used when you start it up.
target: Xa unguMphathi wefayile odityanisiweyo noMkhangeli wencwadi,konqueror izakuswitsha ngokuzenzekelayo phakathi kwendlela ezimbini ezifunekayo xa isebenza,kodwa iluncedo ukukhetha indlela ezakusetyenziswa xa uyiqala.

input: If you have a house shaped icon on the panel or desktop,then left click on it to open konqueror as a file manager.
target: Ukuba une indlu emilisiweyo i icon kwiqela lenjongo okanye i desktop,ngoku LMB nqakraza kuyo ukuvula i konqueror njengomphathi wefayile.

input: Or left click on world shaped icon on the panel or desktop to open konqueror in browser mode.
target: Okanye LMB nqakraza ku ihlabathi emilisiweyo i icon kwiqela lenjongo okanye i desktop ukuvula i konqueror kwindlela yomkhangeli zincwadi.

input: From the K menu,select Internet Konqueror Web Browser to start it as a browser,or Home to launch konqueror in file manager mode.
target: Ukusuka ku K menu,khetha i Internet Konqueror Umkhangeli zincwadi ye Web ukuqala njengomkhangeli zincwadi.

input: Alt F2 will open a Run Command dialog box,type konqueror lower case and press Enter or the Run button to start in file manager mode,or just enter a URL www. konqueror. org to start konqueror as a browser.
target: Alt F2 izakuvula i Yenza umyalelo udidi lwebhokisi yencoko yababini,konqueror umzekelo osezantsi kwaye cinizela Ngena okanye i Yenza iqhosha ukuqala kwindlela yomphathi wefayile,okanye ngenisa nje i URL ukuqala konqueror njengomkhangeli zincwadi.

input: konqueror is also started automatically when you left click on a desktop icon that represents a folder,such as a hard disk drive or the Trash icon.
target: konqueror iqalwa nayo ngokuzenzekelayo xa ekhohlo nqakraza kwi desktop icon emele ulawulo,enjenge Umonakalo icon,okanye i URL.

input: A brief look at the main parts of konqueror 's window
target: Ujongo olulula kumaqela angundoqo ewindow ye konqueror

input: The Titlebar is the strip across the top of konqueror 's window,and operates in the same way as for other kde applications. Right click on the central portion to bring up the neat Titlebar menu.
target: I Ibar yewonga ngumcu ngapha phezu kwe window ye konqueror kwaye isebenza ngendlela enye nezinye kde izicelo.Ekunene nqakraza kwisabelo esisezantsi ukuzisa imenu yebar yeWonga ecocekileyo.

input: The Bookmark Toolbar is the area under the Location Toolbar in the previous screenshot. You can add frequently used bookmarks here see the Organizing Your Bookmarks section of this document.
target: I Ibar yesixhobo yenqaku lencwadi yi ariya ephantsi kwe Ibar yendawo kudubulo lwekhusi oludlulileyo.Ungadibanisa amanqaku encwadi asetyenziswa rhoqo apha,bona i Uququzelela Amanqaku wakho encwadi icandelo lolu xwebhu.

input: Do n't worry if your konqueror does n't look exactly like this screenshot it is highly configurable. In particular
target: Sukubanexhala ukuba eyakho i konqueror ayikhangeleki ngqo njengolu dubulo lwekhusi,iqwalaselwe kakhulu kwaye akukho

input: You can use the Settings menu to choose whether to show or hide the Menubar,Main Toolbar,Location Toolbar and Bookmark Toolbar,or even to add an Extra Toolbar.
target: Ungasebeznisa i Izicwangciso menu ukukhetha ukubonisa okanye ukufihla iMenubar,Ibar yesixhobo,Ibar yendawo ne Bar yesixhobo ye Nqaku lencwadi.

input: You can also flatten the toolbars by left clicking on the vertical lines at the left hand end of the bars,or move them around by holding the LMB down while you drag these bars around.
target: Unga kwakhona camabalalisa Ibar yesixhobo,Ibar yendawo neBar yesixhobo ye Nqaku lencwadi nge LMB ukunqakraza kwilayini ezithe nkqo kwisiphelo sesandla sasekhohlo seebar okanye uzijikelezise ngokubamba i LMB iqhosha le mouse phantsi ngexesha utsala ezi bar jikelele.

input: For more details of how to change konqueror 's appearance,see the Configuring konqueror section
target: Iinkcukacha ezininzi zokutshintsha i konqueror inkangeleko,bona i Iqwalasela i konqueror icandelo

input: You can find out a lot about how konqueror works without needing to read this entire document if you take advantage of Tooltips and the What's This feature.
target: Ungafumana okuninzi malunga nokuba i konqueror isebenza njani ngaphandle kokufuna ukufunda lonke uxwebhu ukuba uthatha udelelo lo Icebiso Yintoni le feature.umsebenzi osemqoka.

input: If Tooltips have been enabled in kde K menu Control Center Appearance Themes Style,Style dialog then when you hover the mouse pointer over a Toolbar or Navigation Panel button it should bring up a terse description of what that button does.
target: Ukuba Incam yesixhobo yenziwe kwi kde i K menu Umbindi Wolawulo Jonga Yiva Izicwqangciso Zewidget,yenza Iincam Zesixhobo xa uhambisa i wesalathisi se mouse ngaphezulu kwe ibhari iqosha lesixhobo imele iveze uchazo olulungisiweyo lomsebenzi we qosha.

input: What's This is invoked by the Menubar Help What's This item,by Shift F1,or by just LMB clicking on the question mark near the top right hand corner of konqueror 's window. It changes the cursor to show a question mark alongside the arrow.
target: Yintoni Le ibheniswa yi the Menubar UncedoYintoni Le F1 hotkey,okanye ngo nje LMB ukunqakraza kuphawu lombuzo kufutshane nekona yesandla phezulu sasekunene ye Konqueror ye festile.Itshintsha isalathisi ukubonisa uphawu lombuzo ngapha kwetolo.

input: Left and Middle Mouse Button Actions
target: Ekhohlo na Phakathi Iintshukumo zeQhosha le Mouse

input: If you click the LMB on an item in konqueror 's window,it will be activated. Thus
target: Ukuba unqakraza i LMB kumba kwifestile ye konqueror lomba uzakuba setyenziswa.Nje

input: Left click on an icon in the Toolbar to do whatever that icon is supposed to do.
target: Ekhohlo nqakraza kwi icon kwibar yeSixhobo ukwenza nayiphi na into i icon emele ukuyenza.

input: Left click on an item in the Menubar to make that menu drop down.
target: Ekhohlo nqakraza kumba kwi Menubar ukwenza loo menu iwe phantsi.

input: Left click on a menu item to do that thing.
target: Ekhohlo nqakraza kumba we menu ukwenza loo nto.

input: Left click on an icon in the Bookmark Toolbar to open that URL .
target: Ekhohlo nqakraza kwi icon yenqaku leencwadi Yesixhobo ukuvula ukuba URL.

input: Left click on a link in a web page to make konqueror follow that link.
target: Ekhohlo nqakraza kwikhonkco lephepha le web page ukwenza i konqueror landela elo khonkco.

input: Left click on a folder icon or name and konqueror will descend into show the contents of that folder.
target: Ekhohlo nqakraza kwi icon yolawulo okanye igama ne konqueror izakuhla kwi bonisa imixholo yolo lawulo.

input: Left click on a file name or icon and konqueror will do whatever it thinks appropriate,based on the file type. In general this means opening HTML pages,or previewing text,image or KOffice files,showing them within konqueror 's window Preview means that you can see the file but not change it.
target: Ekhohlo nqakraza kwigama lefayile okanye i icon ne konqueror izakwenza nayiphi na into ecinga ukuba ilungile,ejolise kudidi lwefayile.Ngokubanzi oku kuthetha ukuvula HTML amaphepha,okanye ukubonisa okubhaliweyo,umfanekiso okanye KOffice iifayile,zilungiswa kwi konqueror window.Imboniso ithetha ukuba ungabona ifayile kodwa ungayitshintshi.

input: Clicking the RMB on almost any part of konqueror 's window will bring up an appropriate context menu.
target: Nqakraza i RMB phantse nakweliphi iqela lefestile ye konqueror ezakuzisa elungileyo i menu.

input: If you have enabled the Right click goes back in history option in konqueror 's configuration settings a simple right click is equivalent to clicking on the Back button. In this case you can access the context menu by moving the mouse with the right button held down.
target: Ukuba wenze i Ukunqakaza ekunene lukubuyisela emva kwimbali ukhetho kwi konqueror Umkhangeli zincwadi uqwalaselo lwezicwangciso ezilula right unqakrazo luyafana nokunqakraza kwi Emva iqosha.Ngoku unonikezelo kwi menu ye context ngokuhambisa i mouse nge ekunene iqosha libanjwe phantsi.

input: Right clicking on any free area of the Titlebar brings up the Titlebar Menu,allowing you to control the position of konqueror 's window as well as the decoration applied to all kde program windows.
target: Ekunene nqakraza nakweyiphi na i ariya ekhululekileyo yebar yeWonga izisa iMenu yebar yeWonga,ikuvumela ukulawula indawo ye konqueror window kunye nohombisoa olufakwe kuzo zonke i kde iiwindow zodweliso lwenkqubo.

input: Right click in the URL entry box area to perform Cut,Copy,Paste or Clear operations in this area,or to change the automatic Text Completion features.
target: Ekunene nqakraza kwi URL kwibhokisi yongeno ukwenza Usiko,Ukhuphelo,Ucolo okanye Ucaciso lwemisebenzi kule ariya,okanye ukutshintsha i ugqibo oluzenzekelayo imisebenzi.

input: If you have the Bookmark Toolbar showing,then right click on any free part of it to bring up the Bookmark Toolbar Menu which lets you change its position and whether items are shown as text,icons,or both.
target: Ukuba unebar yeSixhobo yenqaku leNcwadi ebonisayo,ngoku ekunene nqakraza nakweliphi na iqela elikhululekileyo layo ukuzisa iMenu yebar yeSixhobo yenqaku leNcwadi ekuvumela ukutshintsha indawo yayo kwaye noba imiba iboniswe kokubhaliweyo,ii icon,okanye zombini.

input: If you right click on any free area of a view then you will get a menu that contains,among other options,the Up,Back,Forward and Reload navigation commands.
target: Ukuba u ekunene nqakraza nakweyiphi na i ariya ekhululekileyo yemboniselo ngoku ungafumana le menu,equlathe i Phezulu,Emva,Phambili ne Layisha kwakhona imiyalelo yolawulo nayo njenge Yenza olutsha ukhetho kwi Hlela menu.

input: Right click on the Status Bar at the bottom of a window or view to add or remove a view within konqueror 's window.
target: Ekunene nqakraza kwiBar yeNdawo engatshintshiyo ezantsi kwe window okanye bonisela ukudibanisa okanye ukususa imboniselo kwi konqueror window.

input: If you want to read UNIX Man pages konqueror makes it easy. touch or touch into the Location Toolbar to see the page for the touch command.
target: Ukuba ufuna ukufunda i UNIX Amaphepha oMntu konqueror yenza lula,Umzekelo chwetheza i man touch okanye touch kwibar yendawo ukubona iphepha lomyalelo wokubamba.

input: To browse through UNIX Info pages,dir takes you to Info's top level directory,then it's just a matter of clicking on the right links to find the page you want. Alternatively,command name to go straight to the Info page you want.
target: Kwaye yenza ukhangelo ngapha kwamaphepha Olwazi phantse ulwazi olulungileyo.info dir ikubeka kulawulo lomphakamo ophezulu wolwazi ngoku yinto nje yokunqakraza ekunene kumakhonkco ukufumana iphepha olufunayo.

input: Although you can use konqueror 's bookmarks to record the locations of your own files and folders,they are most useful when you are surfing the Web,letting you build up a list of useful sites.
target: Noxa ungasebenzisa i konqueror amanqaku encwadi ukushicilela iindawo yeefayile zakho nabalawuli,baluncedo kakhulu xa ukhangela i Web,ikuvumela wakhe uluhlu lwamanxuwa aluncedo.

input: To open the Bookmarks menu you may either left click on the Bookmarks menu or use the Alt B shortcut. Once the list is visible,you can navigate through it with the arrow keys or with your mouse,then press Enter or left click to visit the selected location.
target: Ukuvula i Amanqaku encwadi lahla- phantsi uluhlu onokuli noba ekhohlo nqakraza kwi Menubar Amanqaku encwadi umba,okanye sebenzisa i Alt B hotkey.Xa uluhlu lubonakala,ungalawula ngapha kwayo ngezitshixo zetolo okanye imouse yakho,ngoku cinezela Ngena okanye LMB nqakraza ukundwendwela indawo ekhethiweyo.

input: To add a new item to the list use Bookmarks Add Bookmark or Ctrl B or right click on a clear space in the web page or folder view and select Bookmark this Location from the pop up menu.
target: Ukudibanisa umba omtsha kuluhlu sebenzisa iMenubar Amanqaku encwadi Dibanisa Inqaku lencwadi umba okanye Ctrl B okanye ekunene nqakraza kwaye ukhethe i Dibanisa kuManqaku encwadi xa ubonisela ulawulo olufunekayo okanye iphepha le web.

input: The Bookmarks list can contain subfolders containing other bookmarks,you can create these with Bookmarks New Bookmark Folder.... To add a bookmark into a subfolder rather than into the main Bookmark list,select the folder from within the Bookmarks list and use the Add Bookmark item in that folder.
target: Ukudibanisa inqaku lencwadi kwincwadi eneenkcukacha- esezantsi kunoluhlu olungundoqo lenqaku lencwadi,khetha lo ncwadi eneenkcukacha kwi Amanqaku encwadi menu kwaye sebenzisa i Dibanisa Inqaku lencwadi umba kulo ncwadi eneenkcukacha.

input: The Bookmarks Edit Bookmarks option opens the Bookmark Editor.
target: I Amanqaku encwadi Hlela Amanqaku encwadi ukhetho luvula i Umhleli Wenqaku lencwadi kwi festile entsha.Apha kulapho ungenza khona

input: A new subfolder can be created at the selected point in the list by using the Create New Folder... option in the Insert menu or from the drop down menu you get when you right click on an item in the main part of the window,or with Ctrl N
target: Yenza iincwadi ezineenkcukacha ezintsha nezisezantsi ngokusebenzisa i Yenza Entsha Incwadi eneenkcukacha ukhetho kwi Ifayile menu okanye kulahlo phantsi lwe menu olufumanayo xa ekunene nqakraza kwindawo engundoqo ye window,okanye nge Ctrl N

input: To select which bookmark subfolder is used to hold the Bookmark Toolbar items select the subfolder then choose Set as Toolbar Folder from the Edit menu.
target: Tshintsha incwadi eneenkcukacha esetyenzisiweyo ukubamba imiba yebar yeSixhobo yeNqaku lencwadi ukhetha loo ncwadi eneenkcukacha ngoku ekhohlo nqakraza kwi Cwangcisa Njengencwadi eneenkcukacha yebar yeSixhobo kwi Hlela i menu.

input: Do n't forget to save your changes with File Save or Ctrl S before you leave the Bookmark Editor.
target: Anga,nngenene,vula umzekelo we konsole,mhlawumbi nge konqueror s Menubar Izixhobo Vula Indlela yesiphelo ukhetho okanye nge Ctrl T.

input: Once you are connected to the Internet you can use konqueror to browse the Web just as easily as you can use it to handle your local files. Just type a URL into the Location Toolbar window,press Enter ,and you are away
target: Xa udityanisiwe kwi Internet ungasebenzisa i konqueror ukukhangela iWeb nje ngokulula onokusebenzisa ukuphatha ezobulali ezakho iifayile.Nje chwetheza i URL kwiwindow yebar yeNdawo,cinezela Ngena,kwaye ukude

input: If you use a dial-up modem connection,then you will be using kppp or a similar dialer program to make the connection.
target: Ukuba usebenzisa udibaniso lwe modem- yokucofa,ngoku uzakusebenzisa i kppp okanye udweliso lwenkqubo lomcofi olufanayo ukwenza udibaniso.

input: If your machine is connected to a local area network LAN that gives you a proxy connection to the Internet then you will have to set konqueror up for the proxy connection. This can be done with the Proxy page of the Settings Configure Konqueror... dialog.
target: Ukuba umatshini udityaniswe kwi ariya yobulali yomsebenzi womnatha LAN oko kukunika udibaniso legunya lokusebenzela omnye kwi Internet ngoku uzakucwangcisa i konqueror phezulu yodibaniso legunya lokusebenzela omnye njengoko kuchaziwe kwi Uqwalaselo Legunya lokusebenzela omnye icandelo.

input: An error message such as Unknown Host usually means that konqueror cannot find a connection to the Internet or that you have entered an incorrect URL .
target: Imposiso yomyalezo onjenge Umamkeli Engaziwayo ngesiqhelo ithetha ukuba i konqueror ayinakufumana dibaniso kwi Internet okanye ungenise engalunganga i URL.

input: Once you have a connection to the Internet,you can surf with konqueror just as you can with any other browser.
target: Xa unodibaniso kwi Internet,ngoku ungalephuza nge konqueror njengoko unako ngomnye umkhangeli zincwadi.

input: Left click on a link in the page to go there.
target: Ekhohlo nqakraza kwikhonkco kwiphepha ukuya apho.

input: To go back to the previous page use the Alt Left Arrow shortcut,the Back button on the Toolbar,or the Menubar Go Back option.
target: Ukubuyela umva kusebenziso lwephepha elidlulileyo i Ctrl Utolo laseKhohlo hotkey,i Emva iqhosha kwibar yeSixhobo,okanye i Menubar Hamba Emva ukhetho,jnjengoko usenza xa ulawula ngapha kwefayile ezizezakho.

input: Similarly,once you have gone back you can go forward by using Alt Right Arrow,the Forward button,or the Menubar Go Forward option.
target: Ngokufanayo,xa ubuyele umva ungaya phambili ngokusebenzisa i Ctrl Utolo laseKunene,i Phambili iqhosha,okanye i Menubar Hamba Phambili ukhetho.

input: If you want to stop the download for any reason then use the Esc key,the Toolbar Stop button or the Menubar View Stop item.
target: Ukuba ufuna ukumisa ulayisho lasezantsi ngaso nasiphi na isizathu ngoku sebenzisa i Esc isitshixo,ibar yeSixhobo Yima iqhosha okanye iMenubar Imboniselo Yima umba.

input: Right clicking on a tab will bring up a menu with the following options
target: Ekhohlo nqakraza kumba we menu ukwenza loo nto.

input: To close the selected tab page.
To see what Web Shortcuts are available,and perhaps add your own,use Settings Configure Konqueror... to open the Settings dialog box and click on the Web Shortcuts icon.
target: Ukushicilela ukhuphelo lwephepha oliboniselayo kwenzeka lula nge Menubar Indawo Shicilela.okanye Shicilela Isakhelo ukhetho,okanye nge ngebar yeSixhobo Shicilela iqhosha.

input: To overcome this problem you can change the browser identification information that konqueror sends for specific sites or domains by selecting Settings Configure Konqueror... to bring up the Settings dialog box and clicking the Browser Identification icon.
target: Ukushicilela ukhuphelo lwephepha oliboniselayo kwenzeka lula nge Menubar Indawo Shicilela.okanye Shicilela Isakhelo ukhetho,okanye nge ngebar yeSixhobo Shicilela iqhosha.
Igcina kwaye Ishicilela Imiba ye Web

input: If the page uses a background image,you can get and save that with the Location Save Background Image As... option.
target: Ukuba iphepha lisebenzisa umfanekiso wesiqalo,ungafumana kwaye ugcine loo nto nge Menubar Indawo Gcina Umfanekiso weSiqalo Njenge.ukhetho.

input: If you right click on a link which may be a picture and select Save Link As... from the pop up menu the basic HTML or similar source text will be downloaded and saved on your local disk.
target: Ekunene nqakraza kwikhonkco olunokuba ngumfanekiso kwaye khetha i Khuphela Indawo yeKhonkco.Oku kukhuphela i URL kwibhodi eqhotyoshwayo ukuze ubeno kuyicola kwi,yithi,i e- mali kumhlobo emxelela malunga neli nxuwa lihle.

input: Right clicking on a link which may be a picture and choosing Copy Link Location will copy the URL of the link to the clipboard so you can then paste it into,say,an e-mail to a friend telling her about this wonderful new site.
target: Ekunene nqakraza kwikhonkco olunokuba ngumfanekiso kwaye khetha i Khuphela Indawo yeKhonkco.Oku kukhuphela i URL kwibhodi eqhotyoshwayo ukuze ubeno kuyicola kwi,yithi,i e- mali kumhlobo emxelela malunga neli nxuwa lihle.

input: Right clicking on a picture and choosing Copy Image Location copies the URL of the picture to the clipboard.
target: Ekunene nqakraza kwikhonkco olunokuba ngumfanekiso kwaye khetha i Khuphela Indawo yeKhonkco.Oku kukhuphela i URL kwibhodi eqhotyoshwayo ukuze ubeno kuyicola kwi,yithi,i e- mali kumhlobo emxelela malunga neli nxuwa lihle.

input: Printing a copy of the page you are viewing is easily done with the Menubar Location Print... or Print Frame option or with the Toolbar Print button.
target: Ukushicilela ukhuphelo lwephepha oliboniselayo kwenzeka lula nge Menubar Indawo Shicilela.okanye Shicilela Isakhelo ukhetho,okanye nge ngebar yeSixhobo Shicilela iqhosha.

input: FTP ,or File Transfer Protocol,is one of the earliest,and still perhaps the best,way of transferring files between computers over the Internet.
target: FTP,okanye iProtocol Yonikezelo yeFayile,yenye yeziphambili,kwaye mhlawumbi isengcono,indlela yokunikezela iifayile phakathi kwee computer ngapha kwi Internet.

input: into the Location Toolbar and press Enter . As long as you are connected to the Internet,and as long as the kde 's FTP site is not too busy,you should end up seeing the pub kde folder at kde-ftp
target: kwibar yeNdawo kwaye cinezela Ngena.Nje ukuba udityanisiwe kwi Internet,kwaye nje ukuba i kde s FTP inxuwa alixakekanga kakhulu,ungaphela ubona i pub kde ulawulo kwi ftp.kde.org

input: Although,strictly speaking,FTP URL and WWW URL konqueror is usually smart enough to figure out what is meant,and insert these characters for you if you leave them out.
target: Noxa,uthetha ngokuphandle,FTP URL s inokungeniswa uqala nge ftp ne WWW URL s iqala nge http konqueror iqhele ukubukeka ngokwaneleyo ukuqwalasela okuthethwayo,kwaye faka aba basebenzi bakho ukuba ubashiya ngaphandle.

input: Sites that are more concerned with security will need a proper username and password,in which case konqueror will ask you for them or you can include the username in the URL you type into the Location Toolbar,as for example
target: Amanxuwa ajongene kakhulu ngokhuseleko azakufuna elona gama lomsebenzisi lililo negama eligqithisiweyo,apho kumzekelo i konqueror izakubuza ngabo okanye ungaquka igama lomsebenzisi kwi URL uchwetheza kwibar yeNdawo,njengomzekelo

input: konqueror will then prompt you for the password.
konqueror is kde 's advanced File Manager,Web Browser and Universal Viewing Application.
target: konqueror yi kde Umphathi wefayile ephambili,Umkhangeli we Web no Mboniseli Woxwebhu.

input: konqueror is part of the kdebase package which an essential part of kde .
target: konqueror yinxenye yempahla ye kdebase apho iqela elisebenzayo le kde.

input: For instructions on acquiring kde www. kde. org.
target: Yemiyalelo efuna i kde nceda bona i http www.kde.org.

input: For further information about konqueror www. konqueror. org.
target: Ulwazi oluphangaleleyo malunga ne konqueror ungathanda ukundwendwela http www.konqueror.org.

input: The shortcut key combinations shown in this chapter are the default ones. They can of course be changed.
target: Isitshixho esifutshane zendibaniso eziboniswe kwisiqendu njengezingagqibekanga.Ziyakwazi ukutshintsheka.
Ctrl N Indawo ekuyo i Window Entsha
Ctrl Shift F i Window Indlela Yekhusi elipheleleyo

input: Open another konqueror tab,containing a blank page.
target: Vula enye i konqueror window,uphinda enye yangoku.
Ctrl D Indawo ekuyo Imphindo ye Window

input: Open another konqueror window,duplicating the current one.
target: Vula enye i konqueror window,uphinda enye yangoku.
Ctrl O Indawo ekuyo Vula Indawo ekuyo.

input: Open a folder or file by entering its path for example home pam or home pam fred. txt in a simple dialog box.
target: Vula ulawulo okanye ifayile ngokungenisa umendo wayo u mzekelo home pam okanye home pam fred.txt kwibhokisi yencoko yababini elula.

input: Send an email containing a link to the current location.

input: Can I run konqueror from another window manager

input: Just install Qt ,kdelibs and kdebase,and from your favorite window manager,launch konqueror . It should work just fine,but if it does n't kde developers do n't test that case often,bugs. kde. org and try running kdeinit before running konqueror it usually helps.

input: If the name of a file or folder begins with a period dot,then it is a hidden file or folder,and will not normally be shown by konqueror . To see hidden files or folders use the Menubar View Show Hidden Files option.
target: Ukuba igama lefayile okanye ulawulo luqala ngethuba Cichaphaza,ngoku iyi efihliweyo ifayile okanye ulawulo,kwaye ayizukuboniswa ngesiqhelo yi konqueror.

input: Any floppy disk,CD drive or other hard disk partition that you have on your system will usually appear in the ,media,mnt or auto folder,having a path something like mnt floppy or cdrom. The details will depend on how your system was set up.
target: Nayiphi ifloppy diski okanye CD uqhubo onalo kwindlela yakho luzakuvela ngesiqhelo kwi mnt ulawulo,unento engathi ngumendo mnt floppy okanye mnt cdrom,iinkcukacha zizakuxhomekeka kwindlela ekwacwangciswa ngayo.

input: How you do this will depend on how your system
target: Indlela owenza ngayo oku ixhomekeke kwindlela yakho

input: You may have an Automount facility,in which case you do n't have to bother about explicitly mounting and unmounting,although you may find that the CD-ROM occasionally starts up by itself for no apparent reason.
target: Ungane Unyuko oluzenzekelayo isixhobo,apho umzekelo ungenakuwuxhalabela malunga nokunyuka no kuhla,naxa ungafumana ukuba i CD- ROM manqapha- nqapha iqala ngokwayo ngaphandle kwesizathu.

input: Or you can do it the traditional way by typing into a text console window
target: Okanye ungayenza ngendlela yakwantu ngokuchwetheza kwiwindow yeconsole yokubhaliweyo

input: to unmount it umount not unmount.
Rather than having to open a text console to type the mount or umount commands,you may prefer to use konqueror 's Tools Execute Shell Command Ctrl E feature.
target: Kunokuvula iconsole yokubhaliweyop ukuchwetheza i nyuka okanye hlisa imiyalelo,ungakhetha uku sebenzisa i konqueror s Izixhobo Phumeza umyalelo weqokobhe Ctrl E umsebenzi.

input: konqueror gives you two ways to dispose of an unwanted file or folder
target: konqueror ikunika iindlela ezintathu ukulahla ifayile engafunwayo okanye ulawulo

input: You can move it to the Trash folder,which is the safest method as you can get it back if you realize that you have made a mistake.
target: Ungayisusa kwi Umonakalo ulawulo,apho iyindlela ekhuselekileyo onokuyifumana xa uqonda ukuba wenze impazamo.

input: You can just plain Delete it,which removes the entry from the folder and adds the disk area occupied by the files to the system's list of free disk areas,in the same way as the rm command.
target: Ungayicima ngokucacileyo,esusa ungeno olusuka kulawulo kwaye ludibanisa i ariya yediski ekwindawo yefayile ii ku luhlu lwendlela ye ariya ze diski ezikhululekileyo.

input: The simplest way to remove a file or folder is to position the mouse pointer over its name or icon and press the RMB ,which will bring up a menu containing the options Move to Trash and Delete.
target: Indlela elula yokususa ifayile okanye ulawulo kukubeka endaweni isalathisi se mouse ngapha kwegama layo okanye i icon kwaye cinezela i RMB iqhosha le mouse,elizakuzisa imenu equlathe iinketho Yiya kuMonakalo,Cima and Krazula.

input: Or,if you have selected the item,the Menubar Edit menu will give you the choice of Move to Trash and Delete options.
target: Okanye,ukuba une khethiweyo umba,iMenubar Hlela imenu izakunika ukhetho lwe Yiya kuMonakalo,Cima ne Krazula iinketho.

input: Del will move the selected item or items to Trash.
target: Del izakususa umba okhethiweyo okanye imiba kuMonakalo.

input: Shift Del will really,truly and irrevocably delete the selected item or items.
target: Shift Del ngenene,ngenyaniso nasekugqibeleni izakucima umba okhethiweyo okanye imiba.

input: You wo n't be able to remove a file or folder if you do n't have the necessary permissions see the section on Super User Mode for further details.
target: Awukwazi ukususa ifayile okanye ulawulo ukuba awunazimvume zaneleyo,bona icandelo ku Indlela yoMsebenzisi Ophezulu iinkcukacha eziphangaleleyo.

input: To copy a file or subfolder between folders you can
target: Ukukhuphela ifayile okanye ulawulo- olusezantsi phakathi kwabalawuli unga

input: Position the mouse pointer over its name or icon and hold down the RMB ,which will bring up a menu containing the Copy option. Choose that.
target: Beka endaweni isalathisi se mouse ngapha kwegama layo okanye i icon kwaye uyibambe ezantsi i RMB,ezakuzisa imenu equlathe i Khuphela ukhetho.Khetha lo nto.

input: Or if the item is selected you can use the Copy button on the Toolbar or the Menubar Edit Copy item,or the Ctrl C shortcut key combination. You can also select multiple files or folders to copy move as well.
target: Okanye ukuba umba yi ekhethiweyo ungasebenzisa i Khuphela iqhosha kwibar yeSixhobo okanye iMenubar Hlela Khuphela umba,okanye i Ctrl C hotkey.

input: Moving a file or subfolder between folders can be done in the same way as copying,except that you choose the Cut option or Ctrl X instead of Copy. The item that you have Cut will be removed from the original folder when you do the Paste into the new folder.
target: Ukushukumisa ifayile okanye ulawulo- olusezantsi phakathi kwabalawuli kungenziwa ngendlela enye nokhuphelo,ngaphandle kokuba ukhetha i Sika ukhetho okanye Ctrl X endaweni ye Khuphela.Umba onawo Sika uzakususwa kulawulo loqobo xa usenza i Cola kulawulo olutsha.

input: You may not be able to copy or move a file or folder if you do n't have the necessary permissions. See the section on Super User Mode for further details.
target: Awunakukhuphela okanye ushukumise ifayile okanye ulawulo ukuba awuna zimvume zaneleyo.Bona icandelo ku Indlela Ephezulu yoMsebenzisi iinkcukacha eziphangaleleyo.

input: konqueror also supports Drag and Drop copying and moving of files and folders.
target: konqueror ixhasa nayo uTsalo no LahloDrag ikhuphela kwaye ishukumisa iifayile nabalawuli.

input: You can also set up konqueror to show more than one folder within its window and drag drop between them.
target: Ungacwangcisa kwakhona i konqueror ukubonisa ulawulo olungapha kwesinye kwaye tsala lahla phakathi kwazo.

input: This screenshot illustrates the use of the Menubar Window Split View Left Right option,also available with the shortcut Ctrl Shift L,to split the main konqueror window into two views,each showing the contents of a different folder.
target: Sisebenzise iMenubar kolu dubulo lwekhusi Window Chaka Imboniselo Ekhohlo Ekunene ukhetho,lukhona nge hotkey Ctrl Shift L,ukuchaka engundoqo i konqueror windowkwimboniselo ezimbini,enye ibonisa imixholo yolawulo olwahlukuneyo.

input: To be able to show different folders in each view they should not be linked the little boxes at the bottom right of each view should be empty.
target: Xa iwindow ichakwe kwiimboniselo ezimbini okanye ngaphezulu kuqhele ukuba ngcono ukuqinisekisa ukuba azidityaniswanga - iibhokisi ezincinane ezantsi ekunene zemboniselo nganye azinakubananto.

input: To remove an active view from konqueror 's window use the Ctrl Shift R shortcut,or the Menubar Window Remove Active View option,or RMB click on the Status Bar and choose the Remove Active View option from the resulting menu.
target: Ukususa imboniselo esebenzayo kwi konqueror window sebenzisa i Ctrl Shift R hotkey,okanye iMenubar Window Susa esebenzayo Imboniselo ukhetho,okanye RMB nqakraza kwiBar yeNdawo engatshintshiyo kwaye khetha i Susa Esebenzayo Imboniselo ukhetho olusuka kwisiphumo se menu.

input: flag. png will select all filenames starting with the letters flag and ending with. png.
target: flag .png izakukhetha wonke amagama efayile uqala ngoonobumba indwe kwaye iphela nge.png.

input: memo . txt will select memo1. txt and memo9. txt but not memo99. txt.
target: inkumbulo.txt izakukhetha memo1.txt ne memo9.txt kodwa hayi memo99.txt.

input: When you have selected a range of files,you can narrow down the selection by using the Menubar Edit Unselect... option or Ctrl - to specify which of the selected files should be removed from the selection.
target: Xa ukhethe umqolo weefayile,ungaxinanisa phantsi ukhetho ngokusebenzisa iMenubar Hlela Sukukhetha.ukhetho okanye Ctrl - ukugxininisa ukuba yeyiphi kwiifayile ezikhethiweyo ezakususwa kukhetho.

input: Use Ctrl U or the Menubar Edit Unselect All option or just LMB click on a clear area of the view to cancel the selection.
target: Sebenzisa Ctrl U okanye iMenubar Hlela Sukukhetha Konke ukhetho okanye nje i LMB nqakraza kwi ariya ecacileyo yemboniselo ukucima ukhetho ii.

input: that is,deselect all selected files and select those that were previously unselected. Use the Menubar Edit Invert Selection option or Ctrl to do this.
target: Ungabuyisela ukhetho,olungakhethi zonke iifayile ezikhethiweyo kwaye khetha ezo bezikhethwe kokudlulileyo.Sebenzisa i Menubar Hlela Buyisela Ukhetho ukhetho okanye Ctrl ukwenza oku.

input: Ctrl Up Arrow,Ctrl Down Arrow,Ctrl Home,Ctrl End,Ctrl Page Up,Ctrl Page Down
target: Ixhomekeke kolwakho udidi lwebhodi yezitshixo ne locale,uzakufumanisa ukuba i Ctrl ,Ctrl - and Ctrl hotkeys zisebenza kuphela ngenkatha yesitshixo Yamanani ,- and izitshixo.

input: Once you have selected the right files then the normal delete,copy or move commands will act on all of the selected files at once.
target: Xa ukhethe iifayile ezizizo ngoku cima ngokuqhelekileyo,khuphela okanye imiyalelo yokushukumisa izakusebenza kuzo zonke iifayile ezikhethiweyo kanye.

input: Depending on your keyboard type and locale,you may find that the Ctrl ,Ctrl - and Ctrl shortcuts only work with the Numeric keypad ,- and keys.
target: Ixhomekeke kolwakho udidi lwebhodi yezitshixo ne locale,uzakufumanisa ukuba i Ctrl ,Ctrl - and Ctrl hotkeys zisebenza kuphela ngenkatha yesitshixo Yamanani ,- and izitshixo.

input: When konqueror is in File Manager mode,picking Create New from the Edit menu or from the context menu you get by RMB clicking on a free area in a folder view gives you a submenu letting you create any of the following in the current folder
target: Xa i konqueror ikwindlela yokuchola yoMphathi weFayile Yenza Entsha.esuka kwi Hlela menu okanye esuka kwimenu yo lahlo- phantsi oyifumanayo nge ekunene nqakraza kwi ariya ekhululekileyo kwimboniselo yolawulo ikunika imenu- esezantsi ikuvumela wenze naluphi na ulawulo lwangoku olulandelayo

input: To put an application link icon into the panel,first create it in the Applications folder then drag the icon onto a clear area of the panel.
target: Ukubeka i icon yekhonkco lesicelo kwiqela lenjongo,yenze kuqala kulawulo lweZicelo ngoku tsala i icon kwi ariya ecacileyo yeqela lenjongo ethile.

input: This option is similar to Floppy Device... but for a hard disk drive or partition.
target: Olu khetho lufana ne Floppy Icebo.kodwa yeye disc enzima uqhubo okanye ulwahlulo.

input: This option is similar to Floppy Device... but for a CD or DVD drive.
target: Olu khetho lufana ne Floppy Icebo.kodwa yeye CD- ROM drive.

input: An easy way of creating a new subfolder.
target: Indlela elula yokwenza olutsha olusezantsi ulawulo.

input: Use this to create an ordinary,empty,text file. A dialog box will be opened for you to enter the name of your new file.
target: Sebenzisa oku ukwenza eyona,engenanto,ifayile yokubhaliweyo.Ibhokisi yencoko yayabini encinane izakuvulelwa wena ukungenisa igama lefayile yakho entsha.

input: Creates a skeleton HTML source file. When you type the new file's name into the dialog box it is probably best to give it a. html extension to avoid confusion.
target: Yenza amathambo HTML ifayile yemvelaphi.Xa uchwetheza igama lefayile elitsha kwibhokisi yencoko yababini encinane ingcono ukuyinika i.html ulwandiso ukunqanda uphazamiseko.

input: Creates a skeleton koffice kpresenter document. Give its name a. kpr extension.
target: Yenza amathambo Koffice kpresenter uxwebhu.Inika igama layo i.kpr ulwandiso.

input: Creates a skeleton KOffice kword document using the standard kword style template. Give its name a. kwd extension.
target: Yenza amathambo KOffice kword uxwebhu usebenzisa esezantsi i kword uhlobo lwe template.Nika igama layo i.kwd ulwandiso.

input: Use this to create a new KOffice kspread spreadsheet file,and name it with a. ksp extension.
target: Sebenzisa oku ukwenza esitsha KOffice kspread spreadsheet fayile,kwaye uyinike igama nge.ksp ulwandiso.

input: Creates a new KOffice kontour document. Name it with the extension. kil.
target: Yenza esitsha KOffice killustrator uxwebhu.Yinike igama ngolwandiso.kil.

input: The two easiest ways to change the name of a file or folder is to either right click on it and select Rename,or select the file or folder and then press the F2 button.
target: Indlela elula ukutshintsha igama lefayile okanye ulawulo ku ekunene nqakraza kuyo kwaye khetha i Nika igama kwakhona.

input: To change the name or permissions of a file or folder right click on its name or icon and select the Properties... item,or if you have selected the file or folder,then you can use the Menubar Edit Properties option.
target: Okanye,ukutshintsha igama okanye iimvume zefayile okanye ulawulo ekunene nqakraza kwigama layo okanye i icon kwaye khetha i Iimpahla.umba.Okanye,ukuba une ekhethiweyo ifayile okanye ulawulo,ngoku ungasebenzisa iMenubar Hlela Iimpahla ukhetho.

input: This will bring up the Properties dialog box with two tabbed pages
target: Oku kuzakuzisa ibhokisi yencoko yababini yeeMpahla enezithuba ezimbini

input: General,which gives you some information about the item and lets you change its name and,for a folder,the associated icon.
target: Ngokubanzi,esikunika ulwazi malunga nomba kwaye ikuvumela utshintshe igama layo nelo lawulo,eyayama nisiweyo i icon.

input: Permissions,which shows you the item's ownership and access permissions and lets you change the permissions.
target: Iimvume,ekubonisa umba s wobunini neemvume zonikezelo kwaye ikuvumela utshintshe iimvume.

input: If you are running as a normal user and try to access files outside of your own home folder you will often be prevented from doing so and get an error message such as Access Denied.
target: Ukuba wenza njengomsebenzisi wesiqhelo kwaye zama ukunikeza iifayile ngaphandle kolawulo lwakho lasekhaya uzakukhuselwa rhoqo ekwenzeni oko kwaye fumana umyaleso wemposiso onjenge Unikezelo Lulahliwe.

input: To access these files you need to be logged in as the system administrator,often known as the Super User or root.
target: Ukunikeza ezi fayile ufuna ukulogwa njengomphathi wendlela,owaziwa rhoqo njengoMsebenzisi Ophezulu okanye ingcambu.

input: Take care. As Super User root,you have complete control of your system,and a wrong command can easily do irrevocable damage.
target: Jonga.NjengoMsebenzisi Ophezulu ingcambu,unolawulo olugqityiweyo lwe ndlela yakho,kwaye umyalelo ongalunganga ungonakalisi lula ngesiphelo.

input: Also,connecting to the internet as root is an extremely bad idea,as it seriously increases your vulnerability to malicious hacking.
target: Kwakhona,ukudibanisa kwi Internet njengengcambu kuyingcamango embi kakhulu,njengoko isandisa ingozi kusiko.

input: Although konqueror is a very powerful and flexible GUI file manager,there are occasions when the experienced Linux UNIX user wants to get down to the basics and work at the text command line level.
target: Naxa i konqueror inamandla kwaye inecebo GUI umphathi wefayile,kukho izinto ezithile xa enolwazi i Linux umsebenzisi ufuna ukufumana izakhelo kwaye asebenze kumphakamo welayini yomyalelo wokubhaliweyo.

input: You can,of course,open an instance of konsole ,perhaps with konqueror 's Menubar Tools Open Terminal option or with Ctrl T.
target: Anga,nngenene,vula umzekelo we konsole,mhlawumbi nge konqueror s Menubar Izixhobo Vula Indlela yesiphelo ukhetho okanye nge Ctrl T.

input: If you only want to launch a program or view a URL ,the Tools Run Command Alt F2 option may be easier.
target: Anga,nngenene,vula umzekelo we konsole,mhlawumbi nge konqueror s Menubar Izixhobo Vula Indlela yesiphelo ukhetho okanye nge Ctrl T.

input: What you get is what you type.

As you type into the Location Toolbar window konqueror will automatically extend what you type to complete one possible path or URL ,highlighting the characters it has added. Continue typing if that's not what you wanted or press Enter to accept it.
target: Njengoko uchwetheza kwiwindowo yebar yeNdawo konqueror izakwandisa ngokuzenzekelayo okuchwethezayo ngokuphawula olunye ugqibo olwenzekayo okanye ugqibo olungenzekiyo.Qhubekeka ukuchwetheza ukuba leyo asiyonto oyifunileyo okanye cinezela Ngenisa ukuyamkela.

input: You should try out these different modes and pick the one that suits you best.
target: Kufuneka uzame iindlela ezahlukileyo ukhethe enye oyithandayo.

input: Selecting Settings Configure Konqueror... Plugins will give you a dialog box with two tabbed pages Scan and Plugins.
target: Ukuba ukhetha Ezikhethwayo Ukhangelo lwe Web Netscape iiPlagi kwi K menu uzakufumana ibhokisi yencoko yababini enamaphepha amabini anesithuba Scan ne iiPlagi.

input: The Scan page controls how kde scans for new Netscape plugins,either manually by pressing the Scan for New Plugins button or automatically each time kde starts up.
target: Eli phepha likuvumela wenze i kde uvavanyo lwentsha i Netscape iiplagi,noba ngencwadi ngokucinezela i Uvavanyo lwezintsha iiplagi iqhosha okanye ngokuzenzekelayo lonke ixesha kde iqala.

input: The Plugins page shows you the Netscape plugins that kde has found,and for each plugin it lists the MIME types and the filename suffixes it uses to recognize them.
target: Eli phepha likubonisa i Netscape iiplagi i kde ezifumeneyo,kwaye kwiplagi nganye idwelisa i MIME iindidi nezimamva zegama lefayile elisebenzisayo ukuqonda zona.

input: The package kdeaddons contains several useful plugins that interact with konqueror in various ways. These are explained briefly below,more detailed information may be obtained by looking through the Konqueror Plugins section in the kde Help Center.
target: Impahla ye kdeaddons iqulathe i plugins eziluncedo ezisebenza ne konqueror kwindlela eziliqela.Ezi zicaciswe ngezantsi.

input: This uses AltaVista's BabelFish site to translate the current HTML page to whatever language you want within reason. It can be launched with Tools Translate Web Page.
target: Oku kusebenzisa inxuwo le AlteVista ye BabelFish ukuguqulela eyangoku HTML iphepha kulonakweliphi ilwimi olifunayo ngesizathu.Ingaqhaliswa nge Izixhobo Guqulela Translate ipepha le Web.

input: This is controlled by Tools View Filter and allows you to choose which types of item are displayed in a folder.
target: Lena ilawulwa yi Izixhoboc Bonisela Icebo lokucoca ulwelo kwaye ikuvumela ukuba ukhethe udid lomba ongawukhetha esibonisiweyo kwisilawulo.

input: Selecting Tools Show DOM Tree opens a new window which displays the document object model DOM of the current HTML page.
target: Ukhetho Izixhobo Bonisa Umthi we DOM ivula ifestile entsha ebonisa uxwebhu displays the document wayo wenjongo DOM wangoku HTML iphepha.

input: This is started with Tools Validate Web Page Validate HTML. It uses the W3C HTML validator to validate the current page,very useful when creating web pages.
target: Iqalwe nge Tools Chazisa Iphepha le Web Chazisa HTML.It uses the W3C HTML ukuchaza validator to validate the current page,very useful when creating web pages.

input: Started with Tools Validate Web Page Validate CSS,it uses the W3C CSS validator to validate the current page's Cascading Style Sheets.
target: Iqalwe nge Izixhobo Qinisekisa Iphepha le Web qinisekisa CSS,isebenzisa W3C CSS umqinisekisi wokuqinisekisa Uhlobo Lowiswo lwe Sheets kwiphepha langoku.

input: Select Tools HTML Settings to enable or disable a number of HTML settings without going through the Settings dialog.
target: Khetha Izixhobo Izicwangciso ze HTML ukwenza okanye ukukhubaza izicwangciso ze HTML eziliqela ngaphandle kokudlula kwi Settings incoko yababini.

input: In File Manager mode,you can select Tools Create Image Gallery to create an HTML page with thumbnails of all the images in the current folder. By default the HTML page is called images. html and the thumbnails are put into a new thumbs folder.
target: Kwindlela Yomphathi Wefayile,uyakwazi ukukhetha Izixhobo Yenza Umfanekiso Wegalari ukwenza iphepha le HTML ene thumbnails zayoyonke imifanekiso kwisilawulo sangoku.Ngokungagqibekanga iphepha le HTML linikwe eligama images.html ne thunbnails ezibekwe kwentsha i thumbs isilawulo.

input: Select Tools Change Browser Identification to get a menu that allows you to change the User Agent string without going through the Settings dialog procedure.
target: Khetha Izixhobo Tshintsha Ulwaziso Lomkhangeli Zincwadi ukufumana i menu ekuvumelayo ukuba utshintshe i User Agent string ngaphandle kokudlula kwi Settings dialog procedure.
Iqela lenjongo ethile Lolawulo Lomdlali Wokwazisa umphakathi

input: This is a simple media player,embedded as a tab page in the Navigation Panel. You can drag songs or videos onto this page to play them.
This page shows a tree view of your Bookmarks. Left click on an item to open it in the main view.
target: Ekhohlo nqakraza kumba we menu ukwenza loo nto.
I Ibar yeSixhobo Engundoqo lt Konquerorgt.

input: Right clicking on a tab icon brings up a menu with the following options
target: Ekhohlo nqakraza kwikhonkco lephepha le web page ukwenza i konqueror landela elo khonkco.

input: To remove the tab page from the Navigation Panel.
konsole provides a number of actions located in the Scrollback menu.
Click on the menu entry Settings Manage Profiles...
konsole ships with the Shell profile as the default. Any new profiles added by the user will have its own menu item below File Shell.
Ctrl Shift ,Edit Copy Input To All Tabs in Current Window
Ctrl Shift . Edit Copy Input To Select Tabs...
Ctrl Shift Edit Copy Input To None
Ctrl Shift L View Split View Split View Left Right
Ctrl Shift T View Split View Split View Top Bottom
Ctrl Shift S View Split View Close Active
Ctrl Shift O View Split View Close Others
Ctrl Shift View Split View Expand View
Ctrl Shift View Split View Shrink View
Ctrl Shift I View Monitor for Silence
Ctrl Shift A View Monitor for Activity
Clears all text saved in current tab and resets the terminal
Ctrl Shift B Bookmarks Add Bookmark
Changes the profile for the current tab
Start konsole using a saved set of sessions.
Disable transparent backgrounds,even if the system supports them.
Do not close the initial session automatically when it ends.
This document is the user handbook for the konsole application.
konsole 's advanced features include simple configuration and the ability to use multiple terminal shells in a single window,making for a less cluttered desktop.
These sessions can be renamed to help you keep track of all your shells,or signaled STOP,CONT,HUP,INT,TERM,KILL.
For more control over konsole ,a user can
hide show the menubar and or frame
select the size of a konsole window,fonts,color schemes,and key mapping
change location of the scrollbar or hide the scrollbar
change location of the tabbar or hide the tabbar
All chosen settings can be made the default for forthcoming sessions by saving them.

For those with a deep interest in the taxonomy of free X terminals,xterm,the original,written even before X itself a month or two,and xvt,a lightweight xterm clone,on which most other currently available derivatives notably eterm are based.
When konsole is started,an application typically a UNIX shell runs in the window. Simply type at the prompt.
Ctrl Shift H Edit Find Selected Backwards
Ctrl G Edit Go to Line...
F7 View Switch to Command Line
View Show Static Word Wrap Marker
Backspace key in leading blank space unindents
The selected plugins are available in the Tools menu.
Indentations of more than the selected number of spaces will not be shortened.
target: Amathanda angaphezu kwenani elikhethiweyo ezithuba akazuku bamafutshane.

input: This allows the Tab key to be used to indent.
This allows the Tab key insert indent characters.
This allows the Tab key insert a tab.
This allows the Tab key indent the current line.
What can I do to help out with this FAQ

First,send us any errors that you may find. Also,any suggestions that you might have,are appreciated. Better yet,send us everything that you think is unclear,and if possible,send us what you think would be a clearer solution. The email address of the current maintainer is jhall kde. org.
target: Kuqala,sithumele naziphi iimposiso ozifumanayo.Kwakhona,naziphi na iziphakamiso onokubanazo ziyavuyelwa.Kungcono noko,nayiphi na into ocinga ukuba ayicacanga,kwaye ukuba kuyenzeka,sithumele ocinga ukuba kucacile.Idilesi yethun ye email ngu kde- faq kde.org.

input: Second,send us your solutions of those frequently-asked questions which are still not in this FAQ. We will put them in as soon as possible.
target: Okwesibini,sithumele izisombululo zakho zemibuzo ebuzwa- rhoqo ekwakule FAQ.Sizakuzibeka ngokukhawuleza.

input: Last but not least,please make full use of this FAQ. Read this FAQ and other relevant documentation well before asking questions on the various kde mailing lists or newsgroups.
target: Okokugqibela kodwa okunga kuncinananga,nceda yenza usebenziso olupheleleyo lwale FAQ.Funda oku FAQ nolunye uxwebhu olusondeleyo ngoko phambi kokubuza imibuzo kweyahlukileyo i kde uluhlu lokuposa okanye amaqela endaba.

input: You might also want to consider becoming a FAQ maintainer. Please refer to for more details.
target: Ungafuna kwakhona ukuqwalasela ukuba ngu FAQ mlondolozi.Nceda thelekisa ku kwinkcukacha ezininzi.

input: How do I become a FAQ maintainer
Actually,it is very easy to become an FAQ maintainer,and we are always in need of fresh blood. - Just send us an email at kde-doc-english kde. org.
target: Ngenene,kulula kakhulu ukuba yi FAQ umlondolozi.Kwaye sisoloko sifuna igazi elitsha.- Sithumele nje i email ku kde- faq kde.org.

input: Many of the answers in this FAQ are taken from the various kde mailing lists and newsgroups. Here is a big thank you to all of you who have contributed answers that eventually appear in this FAQ .
target: Iimpendulo ezininzi kule FAQ zithathwa kweyahlukeneyo i kde uluhlu lokuposa namaqela endaba.Nantsi i enkulu enkosi- kuni nonke abathe banikela iimpendulo ezivelayo kule FAQ.

input: Special thanks go to the former FAQ maintainers,Rainer Endres and Mr. Lee Wee Tiong
target: Imibulelo eyodwa iya kowokuqala FAQ umlondolozi,obhale okuninzi kwemisebenzi apha,kwaye wenze umsebenzi omkhulu kakhulu Mnu.Lee Wee Tiong

input: How do I set the language used by kde
target: Ndingalucwangcisa njani ulwimi olusetyenziswa yi kde

input: There are two ways to set the language kde uses in the messages it will display
target: Kukho iindlela ezimbini zokucwangcisa ulwimi kde ezisebenzisayo kwimiyalezo ezakuyibonisa

input: Fire up the kde Control Center and select Regional Accessibility followed by Country Region Language. You can select your language and location here. If kde cannot find a translation in the first language chosen,it will fall back on the default language. This is usually American English by default.
target: Gxotha i kde Umbindi Wolawulo kwaye khetha Ubuntu bakho ilandelwa yi Ilizwe no Lwimi.Ungakhetha olwakho ulwimi nendawo apha.Ukuba i kde ayinakufumana uguqulelo kulwimi lokuqalo elikhethiweyo,izakuwa kolungagqibekanga ulwimi.Oku ngesiqhelo kuzakuba Amelika isiNgesi.

input: Using the kde Control Center is the preferred way of choosing languages in kde .
target: Usebenzisa i kde Umbindi Wolawulo yindlela ekhethiweyo yokukhetha iilwimi kwi kde.
Usebenzisa i LANG umahluko wemeko- bume

input: The second method uses the standard locale setting on your system. To change the language,simply set the environment variable KDELANG accordingly. For example,if your shell is bash,execute export KDELANG de to set German as the language used.
target: Indlela yesibini isebenzisa isicwangciso esisezantsi kwindlela yakho.Ukutshintsha ulwimi,cwangcisa umahluko wemeko- bume LANG ngendlela.Umzekelo,ukuba iqokobhe lakho yi uvuthuzo,phumeza rhweba ngaphandle ukucwangcisa Isijamani njengolwimi olusetyenziswayo.

input: Is there any keyboard switcher for international keyboards for kde
target: Kukho iswitsha yebhodi yezitshixo yeebhodi jikelele ze kde

input: Yes,you can configure it using the kde Control Center Regional Accessibility Keyboard Layout configuration page.
target: Ewe ungayiqwalasela usebenzisa i kde UmbindiWolawulo Amacendo Ibhodi yezitshixo Ubeko incoko yababini yoqwalaselo.

input: How do I replace the standard text login screen with the kde login screen
target: Ndiyibuyisela njani esezantsi okubhaliweyo kongeniso lwegama nge kde ikhusi legama elithile

input: The location of kdm may differ on your system.
target: Indawo ye kdm ingahluka kwindlela yakho.

input: For changes to take effect immediately,type init 5 for RedHat systems at the shell prompt.
target: Utshintsho ukuthatha isiphumo ngokukhawuleza,chwetheza init 5 ye RedHat iindlela kukwenziwa kweqokobhe.

input: It is risky to initiate a graphical login without checking beforehand whether it works. If it fails to work,you would be in for a hard time getting back....
target: Kungumngcipheko ukuqupha igama lomzobo ngaphandle kokukhangela ngaphambili noba iyasebenza.Ukuba ayiphumeleli,uzakubakho kwixesha elinzima lokufumana kwakhona.

input: Where do I find information regarding kde themes
target: Ndilufumana phi ulwazi malunga nemixholo ye kde yokuxoxwa

input: How do I change MIME Types

If you are using konqueror ,first,open a konqueror window and choose Settings Configure Konqueror,then File Associations. Find the type you want to change eg text english or image gif,and set the application preference order to whatever you want.
target: Ukuba usebenzisa i konqueror,yenza oku endaweni yoko kuqala,vula i konqueror window kwaye khetha Hlela Udidi Lwefayile.Fumana udidi ofuna ukulitshintsha e.g.text english or image gif,nqakraza i RMB,khetha Ngokubanzi,kwaye cwangcisa isicelo sendlela ekhethiweyo naphi na apho ufuna khona.

input: kde kdm does not read my. bashprofile

input: How do I use TrueType fonts in kde
target: Ndiyisebenzisa njani i TrueType imigca kwi kde

input: You need to install TrueType font support into your X-Window configuration. Please take a look at x. themes. org for the fonts,TrueType Font Support For X11 or X-TrueType Server Project Home Page for the font servers.
target: Ufuna ukufaka i TrueType inkxaso yomgca kweyakho X- Windows.Nceda jonga kwi x.themes.org yemigca,ne xfsft TrueType Inkxaso Yomgca Ye X11 okanye X- TrueType Iphepha Lasekhaya Leprojekti Yomncedisi yabancedisi bomgca.

input: If you have a bunch of TrueType fonts from Microsoft Windows ,edit the xorg. conf file to get the fonts from the font folder. Then just tell kde to use these new fonts with the font administrator utility.
target: Ukuba unesiqhuma se TrueType imigca kwi Microsoft Windows,hlela i XF86Config ifayile ukufumana imigca kwincwadi eneenkcukacha yomgca.Ngoku xelela nje i kde isebenzise le migca mitsha ngento eluncedo yomphathi womgca.

input: Is it possible to enter,show and work with the Euro Symbol in kde
target: Kuyenzeka ukungenisa,ukubonisa nokusebenza ngophawu lwe Euro kwi kde

input: Yes and no. For details,www. koffice. org kword euro. php.
target: Ewe no hayi.Kwinkcukacha,jonga apha http www.koffice.org kword euro.phtml.

input: I would like to click the LMB anywhere on the desktop and have the K menu displayed.
target: Ndingathanda ukunqakraza i LMB naphi na kwi desktop kwaye ubene K menu eboniswayo.

input: Open the kde Control Center and choose Desktop Behavior. You can now choose the behavior of mouse clicks on the desktop. To have the K menu open from a single LMB click,change the entry labeled Left button to say Application Menu.
target: Vula i kde Umbindi Wolawulo kwaye khetha Jonga kwaye UveDesktop .Ungakhetha ukuziphatha konqakrazo lwe mouse kwi desktop.Ukuba ne K menu vula kweyodwa i LMB nqakraza,tshintsha ungeno olunombhalo Iqhosha lasekhohlo ukuthi Isicelo se Menu.

input: How can I contribute to kde

kde is a free software project that lives from voluntary contributions. Everybody is encouraged to contribute to kde . Not only programmers are welcome. There are many ways in which you can help to improve kde
target: kde yiprojekti ekhululekileyo ye computer ehlala kwiminikelo yokuncedisa.Wonke umntu uyakhuthazwa ukunikela kwi kde.Asingo badwelisi benkqubo kuphela abamkelekileyo.Kukho iindlela ezininzi apho unganceda ukunyusa i kde

input: Send in bug reports. For more information on this,see How do I submit a bug report .
target: Thumela kwiingxelo ze bug.Kulwazi oluninzi koku,bona Ndiyingenisa njani ingxelo ye bug.

input: Write documentation or help files. You can get some information by visiting the kde Editorial Team Home Page.
target: Uxwebhu lokubhala okanye iifayile zokunceda.Ungafumana ulwazi oluthile ngokundwendwela i kde Iphepha Lasekhaya Leqela Lokuhlela.

input: Translate programs,documentation,and help files. For more information on this,you should visit The kde Translators' and Documenters' Web Site.
target: Guqulela iinkqubo,uxwebhu,neefayile zokunceda.Kulwazi oluninzi koku,ungandwendwela I kde iWeb Site yaBaguquleli nabenzi bamaXwebhu.

input: Draw nice icons or compose sound effects. You can visit the kde artists page to find out more.
target: Zoba ii icon ezintle okanye qamba iziphumo zesandi.Ungandwendwela i kde iphepha labazobi ukufumana okuninzi.

input: Write articles and books about kde . If you want to help spread the word about kde ,simply send an email to kde-promo kde. org. This will get you in touch with the kde public relations volunteers.
target: Imiba yokubhala neencwadi malunga ne kde.Ukuba ufuna ukunceda ukwandisa igama malunga ne kde,thumela ngokulula i email ku kde- pr kde.org.Oku kuzakudibanisa nge kde amatsha- ntliziyo omsebenzi kawonke wonke.

input: Program new kde applications. Please refer to for more information.
target: Dwelisa entsha i kde izicelo.Nceda thelekisa ku kulwazi oluninzi.

input: There are several places to look for more information if you want to get involved in the development. The first step is to subscribe to some of the mailing lists. You will soon see something that can be improved or added.
target: Kukho iindawo ezininzi ukujonga ulwazi oluninzi ukuba ufuna ubandakanyo kubhekiso phambili.Inqwanqwa lokuqala ukunikela kwezinye ze uluhlu lokuposa.Uzakubona kufutshane into ezakunyuswa okanye idityaniswe.

input: How do I submit a bug report
bugs. kde. org. The system features a wizard to submit new bug reports and a list of all known bugs.
target: Kukho indlela yophawulo ye bug ekhoyo ku http bugs.kde.org.Indlela isebenzisa iwizard ukungenisa ingxelo ye bug noluhlu lwezaziwayo zonke iibug.

input: The easiest way to submit a bug is to select Help Report Bug... from the menu bar of the application with the bug. This will open a small dialog box with a link to the bug tracking system. Please make sure to follow the instructions of the bug reporting wizard.
target: Indlela elula yokungenisa ibug kukukhetha Uncedo Chaza iBug.kwi menu bar yesicelo nge bug.Oku kuzakuvula ibhokisi yencoko yababini encinane ngekhonkco kwindlela yophawulo ye bug.Nceda qiniseka ukulandela imiyalelo ye bug exela iwizard.

input: I want to program for kde . What should I do first
target: Ndifuna ukudwelisela i kde.Ndingenza ntoni kuqala

input: Everybody is encouraged to develop software for kde . What you should do first depends strongly on your experience,eg whether you have already learned C or have experience with the Qt toolkit and so on.
target: Wonke umntu uyakhuthazwa ukubhekisa phambili izixhobo zecomputer ze kde.Omawukwenze kuqala kuxhomekeke ngokuqinileyo kulwazi lwakho,eg noba sele ufunde i C okanye uno lwazi nge Qt izixhobo njalo- njalo.

input: To get into kde programming,cmake,and gcc. techbase. kde. org for more tips.
target: Ukuya kwi kde udweliso,uzakufuna izixhobo ezingundoqo ezithile automake,autoconf,ne egcs.Ungajonga ku http developer.kde.org ne http www.ph.unimelb.edu.au ssk kde devel iincam ezininzi.

input: There is,however,one thing that everybody interested in programming for kde subscribe to the developers mailing list. To subscribe,you have to send an email to kde-devel-request kde. org with the subject subscribe youremailaddress.
target: Kukho,ngoko ke,into enye umntu wonke anomdla kuyo kudweliso lwe kde enokuyenza nikela kubabhekisi phambili boluhlu lokuposa.Ukunikela,unokuthumela i email ku kde- devel- request kde.org ngomxholo nikela eyakho email idilesi.

input: Please read How to subscribe unsubscribe to these lists carefully. Everything said there applies to the development list as well.
target: Nceda funda Unikela awunikeli njani kolu luhlu ngononophelo.Yonke into ethethiweyo apho ifakwa kuluhlu lobhekiso phambili.

input: How do I get access to kde SVN

If you are doing this more or less regularly,techbase. kde. org Contribute GetaSVNAccount. But be aware that more users will slow down SVN access for all developers,so we want to keep the number of people with direct SVN access reasonably small. But feel free to ask

input: How do I add an application to the desktop
Just choose the desired application from the K menu and drag and drop it to the Desktop.
target: Khetha nje isicelo esifunwayo kwi K menu notsalo nolahlo lwayo kwi Desktop.Yiyo leyo.

input: For applications not listed in the K menu,use the RMB on the desktop and choose Create New Link to Application... and fill in the configuration for the application you want to link to.

input: How do I mount unmount a device from the desktop

input: The icons can be found only in KDEDIRS share icons or HOME . kde share icons. To use icons stored in other locations,you must either copy them into one of the above-mentioned fixed kde locations or make symlinks.

input: How do I use the mouse scroll wheel in kde
target: Ndilisebenzisa njani vili lorolo lwe imouse kwi kde

input: Mouse wheel support comes with Qt 2.0 and above,so kde based on that will automatically support the use of the mouse scroll wheel if your system is configured correctly. Check that your X-Server settings support the use of a scrollwheel if it is not working.
target: Inkxaso yevili le Mouse livela nge Qt 2.0 nangentla,ngoko kde ijoliswe kulo nto izakuxhasa ngokuzenzekelayo usebenziso lwevili lorolo lwe mouse.

input: kde comes with a program called kstart .kstart --desktop 2 --activate --window xterm xterm.
target: kde iza nenkqubo ebizwa nge kstart.Ukuqala Mozilla kweyesibini idesktop kwaye ngoko yenze isebenzise kstart netscape - desktop 2 - sebenzisa.

input: Please read kstart --help-all for more magic available with kstart and there is an abundance.
target: Nceda funda kstart -- nceda- zonke kwemininzi imilingo eyenziwe yi kstart kwaye kukho eminye.

input: Where do I save my files if I want them to appear directly on the desktop
target: Ndizigcina phi iifayile zam ukuba ndifuna ukuvela ngqo kwi desktop

input: HOME Desktop. You might need to refresh your desktop after you have saved your files.
target: HOME Desktop.Ungafuna ukuhlaziya eyakho ideskyop emva kokugcina iifayile zakho.

input: How can I do non-anonymous FTP transfers with konqueror
target: Ndingayenza njani enge- nagama laziwayo FTP inikeza nge kfm ne konqueror

input: Normally,if you enter a URL ftp. example. com,konqueror will attempt an anonymous login to the FTP server. If you want to login as a particular user,enter a URL username ftp. example. com instead. konqueror will ask for your password and connect to the server.
target: Ngesiqhelo,ukuba ungenisa i URL njenge ftp ftp.somehost.com,kfm ne konqueror izakuzama igama elingaziwayo kwi FTP umncedisi.Ukuba ufuna ukufaka igama njengomsebenzisi othile,ngenisa i URL njenge ftp username ftp.somehost.com endaweni.kfm ne konqueror izakubuza elakho igama eligqithisiweyo kwaye lidibanise kumncedisi.

input: How do I specify the startup folder for konqueror
target: Ndilukhankanya njani ulawulo lesiqalo lwe konqueror

input: Using the RMB ,click on the Home icon and choose Properties. Under the Application tab you will probably find something like kfmclient openProfile filemanagement whereever you want with the folder you would like konqueror to start in.
target: RMB nqakrzaza kwi konqueror icon kwaye khetha Ezikhethwayo.Phantsi kwe Phumeza isithuba ozakufumana into enjenge kfmclient incwadi fakela nje ifayile naphi na apho ufuna khona ngo lawulo onalo konqueror njengokuqala.

input: Simply right click on the file and select Rename or press the keyboard shortcut F2 with a file selected.
target: Okwenziwe lula ekunene nqakraza kulofayile ukhethe Nika igama kwakhona okanye nqakraza kanye kwifayile esele ikhetiwe.

input: How do I configure the programs that konqueror uses to open different types of files
target: Ndiyiqwalasela njani i konqueror ukwenza Java applets

input: In the kcontrolcenter ,go to Peripherals Mouse and in the General tab,select Double-click to open files and folders.
target: konqueror ingasetyenziswa nge HTTP ne FTP amagunya okusebenzela omnye.Ukucwangcisa umncedisi wegunya lokusebenzela omnye kwi konqueror,khetha nje izicwangciso Qwalasela konqueror.kwi konqueror menu kwaye yiya kwi Amagunya okusebenzela omnye isithuba.

input: In konqueror ,go to Settings Configure Konqueror and then to the File Associations page.
target: konqueror ingasetyenziswa nge HTTP ne FTP amagunya okusebenzela omnye.Ukucwangcisa umncedisi wegunya lokusebenzela omnye kwi konqueror,khetha nje izicwangciso Qwalasela konqueror.kwi konqueror menu kwaye yiya kwi Amagunya okusebenzela omnye isithuba.

input: What are i and m in the Execute line
target: Zintoni i ne m kwilayini yokuphumeza

input: They are used by all kde applications since they are implemented in KApplication and all good kde programs create a KApplication object before they even look at the command line arguments.
target: Zisetyenziswa zizo zonke kde izicelo ukusukela ukuba zizalisekiswe kwi KApplication nazo zonke ezilungileyo kde iinkqubo zenza i KApplication injongo phambi kokubakokuba zijonge kwiimpikiswano zelayini yomyalelo.

input: The main distribution site for kde is ftp. kde. org. However,this site is often under heavy load,so you might prefer to use download. kde. org which automatically redirects you to the mirror nearest to you. You can also have a look at the list of kde mirror sites.
target: Inxuwa lonikezelo elingundoqo le kde yi ftp.kde.org.Ngoko ke,eli nxuwa luphantsi kolayisho olunzima rhoqo,ngoko ungakhetha enye ye kde amanxuwa esibuko.

input: Are there Linux distributions that include kde
target: Kukho i Linux izinikezelo ezivela nge kde

input: Yes,major Linux distributions already ship kde . As building a distribution takes some time,they might not always contain the latest version,but for a start or to avoid downloading from the Internet,they do provide a good starting point.
target: Ewe,engundoqo Linux izinikezelo sele ziyinqanawa kde.Njengokwakha unikezelo luthatha ixesha,azinakuqulatha oko uguqulelo oludlulileyo,kodwa kwisiqalo okanye ukunqanda ulayisho ezantsi kwi Internet,zinikeza incopho elungileyo yesiqalo.

input: You can find an up-to-date list of distributions that ship with kde here.
target: Ungafumana eloku- gqi- ba uluhlu lwezinikezelo lo nqanawa nge kde apha.

input: The kde 4.2.1 Info Page contains a lot of information specific to this release.
target: I kde 3.0 Iphepha Lolwazi liqulathe ulwazi oluninzi oluthile kolu khupho.

input: Where do I find kde snapshots

ftp. kde. org pub kde unstable snapshots. You might also want to consider setting up your own SVN client in order to maintain the latest snapshot at all times. Please refer to Anonymous SVN and kde for further information.
target: Ungafumana iifoto ezikhawulezayo ezidlulileyo kwi ftp ftp.kde.org pub kde unstable CVS snapshots.Ungafuna kwakhona ukuqwalasela ukucwangcisa eyakho i CVS umxhasi ukuze ulondoloze ufoto olukhawulezayo oludlulileyo wonke amaxesha.Nceda thelekisa kwi Ungasisebenzisa njani cvsup ukufumana kde ekwenzeni oko.

input: Qt is a product of the Norwegian company Trolltech. You can always get the latest Qt version from their FTP server.
target: Qt yimveliso yenkampani ye Norwegian,Troll Tech.Ungasoloko ufumana edlulileyo Qt uguqulelo kweyabo FTP umncedisi.

input: And with most up-to-date Linux distributions,Qt is already included. Please see for the version of Qt you need.

input: So you have heard the rumors. Or you have seen the screenshots. And you are dying to get hold of kde . But you know next to nothing about this whole alternative OS business. Do n't worry You only need to do some well,maybe not some reading,that's all
target: Ngoko uve amahumhum.Okanye ubone udubulo lwekhusi.Kwaye uyafa ukufumana ubambo lwe kde.Kodwa uyakwazi okulandelayo kokungenanto malunga nale yonke ehambelanayo OS ishishini.Sukubanangxaki Ufuna kuphela ukwenza ezinye kuhle,mhlawumbi hayi ezinye ufunda,koko konke

input: kde does not run on any version of Microsoft Windows or OS 2 yet. To run kde ,you need to have a UNIX system. Please refer to for more details.
target: kde ayisebenzi kwi Windows 95 98 NT okanye OS 2 noko.Ukusebenzisa kde,ufuna ukuba ne UNIX indlela.Nceda bhekisa ku iinkcukacha ezininzi.

input: Decide on a platform and set it up for your system. This FAQ can not help you with this,since kde runs on many UNIX platforms.
target: Gqiba umgangatho kwaye uwucwangcisele indlela yakho.Le FAQ ayinakukunceda kule nto,ukusukela ukuba kde isebenza kwezininzi UNIX imigangatho.

input: The base distribution currently consists of twenty packages. Some are required,while others are optional. Each package is available in each of the aforementioned package formats.
target: Unikezelo olusiseko luqulathe iimpahla ezilishumi elinanye.Ezinye ziyafunwa,ngexesha ezinye zizodwa.Impahla nganye ikhona kuyo nganye ekhankanywe kuqala impahla yeefomati.

input: This package contains shared libraries that are needed by all kde applications.
target: Le mpahla iqulathe iilayibrari ezahlulwayo ezifunwayo zizo zonke i kde izicelo.

input: This package contains the base applications that form the core of the K Desktop Environment like the window manager,the terminal emulator,the control center,the file manager,and the panel.
target: Le mpahla iqulathe isiseko sezicelo ezenza ingaphakathi leMeko- bume ye K Desktop njengomphathi we window,umlinganiseli wesiphelo sendlela,umbindi wolawulo,umphathi wefayile,neqela lenjengo ethile.

input: Various plugins for kate ,kicker ,knewsticker ,konqueror and noatun
target: Iiplagi ezahlukeneyo ze kate,kicker,knewsticker,konqueror ne noatun

input: Various bindings for other languages,including Java ,Perl,Python,...
target: Izibophelelo ezahlukeneyo ze ithetha ukuba Java,Perl,Python,.

input: Various graphics-related programs like PostScript previewer,DVI previewer,and a drawing program.
target: Imizobo eyahlukeneyo- ezalana neenkqubo njenge PostScript umbonisi,DVI umbonisi,nenkqubo yokuzoba.

input: Various desktop tools like a calculator,an editor and other nifty stuff.
target: Izixhobo zedesktop ezahlukeneyo njengomatshini wokubala,umhleli kunye neninye imsebenzi ecocekileyo.

input: Multimedia applications like a CD player and a mixer.

Since there are always changes and updates to the way kde is compiled,please refer to Download and Install from Source for the most up to date installation instructions for the source packages.

input: The source. tar. bz2 package installs into usr local kde by default. You can override this setting by using the --prefix option of the configure script.

input: su -c make install if you are n't already root. If you already are,just type make install.

input: Please bear in mind that it is unwise to set LDLIBRARYPATH blindly. In the vast majority of cases it is unnecessary and can do more harm than good. There is a web page written by Dave Barr explaining the evils of LDLIBRARY www. visi. com barr ldpath. html.

input: Even though you can use most of the kde applications simply by calling them,you can only benefit fully from kde 's advanced features if you use the kde window manager and its helper programs.

input: In order to make it easy for you,we have provided a simple script called startkde which gets installed in KDEDIR bin and is therefore in your path.
target: Ukuze wenze lula kuwe,sikunike okushicilelweyo okucacileyo okubizwa nge startkde efumana ufako kwi KDEDIR bin kwaye ngoko ikumendo wakho.

input: Is it possible to install kde in a user folder

input: Yes,you can install kde in any folder you want. What you have to do depends on the kind of packages you want to install

input: Configure and install the package using configure --prefix users myhome kde make make install to install into users myhome kde.
target: Qwalasela kwaye ufake impahla usebenzisa qwalasela -- isimaphambili users myhome kde yenza,yenza ufako ukufaka kwi users myhome kde.

input: Add the following to your init files. Please note that if it is not necessary for you to set LDLIBRARYPATH,it is better to leave it out.
target: Dibanisa okulandelayo kwifayile zakho ze init.Nceda qaphela ukuba akuyomfuneko kuwe ukucwangcisa LD LIBRARY PATH,kungcono ukuyishiya ngaphandle.

input: setenv KDEDIR users myhome kde if LDLIBRARYPATH then setenv LDLIBRARYPATH KDEDIR LDLIBRARYPATH else setenv LDLIBRARYPATH KDEDIR lib endif if LIBRARYPATH then setenv LIBRARYPATH LDLIBRARYPATH endif
target: setenv KDEDIR users myhome kde ukuba LD LIBRARY PATH ngoko setenv LD LIBRARY PATH KDEDIR lib LD LIBRARY PATH enye setenv LD LIBRARY PATH KDEDIR lib phela ukuba ukuba LIBRARY PATH ngoko setenv LIBRARY PATH LD LIBRARY PATH phela ukuba

input: KDEDIR users myhome kde PATH KDEDIR PATH LDLIBRARYPATH KDEDIR LDLIBRARYPATH LIBRARYPATH LDLIBRARYPATH export KDEDIR PATH LDLIBRARYPATH LIBRARYPATH
target: KDEDIR users myhome kde PATHKDEDIR bin PATH LD LIBRARY PATHKDEDIR lib LD LIBRARY PATH LIBRARY PATHLD LIBRARY PATH rhweba ngaphandle KDEDIR PATH LD LIBRARY PATH LIBRARY PATH

input: rpm allows you to use the --prefix option to select the folder you want to install to. For example,executing rpm -i --prefix users myhome kde package. rpm will install the package to users myhome kde.
target: rpm ikuvumela usebenzise i -- isimaphambili ukhetho ukukhetha ulawulo ofuna ukulufaka ku.Umzekelo,iyaphumeza rpm - i -- isimaphambili users myhome kde package.rpm izakufaka imaphla ku users myhome kde.

input: Although kde will run from a user folder,there are some problems with programs that require suid root,eg the programs in the kdeadmin package. But since they are not meant to be run by users in the first place,this is nothing to worry about.
target: Noxa kde izakusebenza kulawulo lomsebenzisi,kukho ezinye iingxaki ngeenkqubo ezifuna ingcambu ye suid,umzekelo.iinkqubo kwimpahla ye kdeadmin.Kodwa ukusukela ukuba zingaxelwanga ukusebenza ngabasebenzisi kwindawo yokuqala,oku asiyo nto yakuzixhalisa malunga nayo.

input: However,on systems using shadow passwords,the screensavers have to be suid root to enable password access for unlocking the screen,so this option will not work.
target: Ngoko ke,kwindlela ezisebenzisa amagama agqithisiweyo omthunzi,abagcini bekhusi bazakuba yingcambu ye suid ukwenza unikezelo lwegama eligqithisiweyo lokuvula ikhusi,ngoko olu khetho aluzukusebenza.

input: startkde fails with can not connect to X server. What is wrong
target: startkde ayiphumeleli nge ayinakudibana ku X umncedisi.Yintoni engalunganga

input: You probably tried to start the X server with startkde. The X server is started with startx. startkde is the script that should be run from your. xinitrc,. xsession,or. Xclients to activate the window manager and the necessary server daemons for kde . See also.
target: Uzame kakhulu ukuqala i X umncedisi nge startkde.I X umncedisi uqalwe nge startx.startkde lushicilelo olunokusetyenziswa kweyakho.xinitrc,.xsession,okanye.Xclients ukusebenzisa umphathi we window kunye nezifunekayo idaemons zomncedisi ze kde.Bona kwakhona.

input: If you can get X-Window to run on your laptop,you should not have any problem getting kde to run on it. In addition,you might find the following links helpful

input: I do not like the default kde folder after installation. How do I move it without breaking anything
target: Andikuthandi okungagqibekanga kde ulawulo emva kofako.Ndiyisusa njani ngaphandle kokwaphula nto

input: Assuming the default is opt kde and you want to move it to usr local kde,here's what you have to do
target: Icingela okungagqibekanga yi opt kde kwaye ufuna ukuyisusa usr local kde,naku omele ukwenze

input: change to superuser if you are n't already
mv opt kde usr local kde
target: mv opt kde usr local kde

input: ln -s usr local kde opt kde
target: Kwi - s usr local kde opt kde

input: This will put all your kde files in usr local kde but everything is still accessible from opt kde.

input: You need the GNU msgfmt which is part of the GNU i18n package gettext. You should be able to download it from any GNU mirror.
