input: How do I uninstall kde applications compiled from source
target: Andiyifaki njani i kde izicelo ziqokelelwe ekuqaleni

input: You can uninstall your programs by typing make uninstall in the folder where you did make install. If you have already deleted that folder,then there is only one way,go to KDEDIR bin and start deleting files one by one.
target: Unokungazifaki iinkqubo zakho ngokuchwetheza yenza ukungafaki kulawulo apho wenze khona yenza ufako.Ukuba sele ulibekele kude olo lawulo,ngoku kukho kuphela indlela enye,kwaye ayilunganga yiya kwi KDEDIR bin kwaye qala ukucima iifayile nganye nganye.

input: What is up with GIF support

This has to do with issues with Unisys' LZW patent. GIF support is turned off from Qt 1.44 onwards by default. When you want to use GIF s and have the relevant license,recompile Qt with GIF support.. configure -gif.
target: Oku kunento yokwenza ne Unisys LZW patent.GIF inkxaso iyacinywa kwi Qt 1.44 ukuya phambili ngokungagqibekanga.kungcono usebenzise endala Qt ukuba usasebenzisa i kde 1.x,okanye yiqokelele kwakhona nge GIF inkxaso.configure - gif.

input: kde is the K Desktop Environment. It is a project initiated by Matthias Ettrich in 1996. The aim of the kde project is to connect the power of the UNIX operating systems with the comfort of a modern user interface.
target: kde yiMeko- bume ye K Desktop.Yiprojekti equtshwe yi Matthias Ettrich ngo 1996.Injongo ye kde projekti is to connect the power of the UNIX operating systems with the comfort of a modern user interface.

input: In short,kde will bring UNIX to the desktop
If you want further information about kde ,have a look at What is kde
target: Ukuba ufuna ulwazi oluninzi malunga ne kde,jonga kwi Yintoni i kde

input: On which platforms can I expect kde to work
target: Ndingayilindela kowuphi umgangatho i kde ukusebenza
Ingaba i kde ngumphathi we window

input: No,kde is not a window manager. While kde includes a very sophisticated window manager kwin ,kde is much more than that. It is a full-blown Integrated Desktop Environment.
target: Akukho,kde engengomphathi we window.Ngexesha i kde iquka othambe kakhulu umphathi we window kwin,kde ingaphezulu kunoko.Yimeko- bume ye Desktop edityanisiweyo evuthuza- ngokupheleleyo.

input: kde provides a complete desktop environment,including a web browser,a file manager,a window manager,a help system,a configuration system,uncountable tools and utilities,and an ever increasing number of applications,including but not limited to mail and news clients,drawing programs,a PostScript and a DVI viewer and so forth.
target: kde inikeza imeko- bume egqityiweyo ye desktop,iquka umkhangeli we web,umphathi wefayile,umphathi we window,indlela yoncedo,uqwalaselo lwendlela,izixhobo ezingabalekiyo nezinto eziluncedo,kwaye inani elinyusayo lezicelo,iquka kodwa enganqamlwanga ukuposa nabaxhasi bendaba,iinkqubo zokuzoba,i PostScript ne DVI umboniseli nnjalo- njalo.

input: Is kde a CDE,Windows or Mac OS clone
target: Ingaba i kde yi CDE,Windows 95 okanye Mac OS clone

input: No,kde is not a clone. Specifically kde is not a CDE or Windows clone. While the kde developers have and will continue to glean the best features from all existing desktop environments,kde is a truly unique environment that has and will continue to go its own way.
target: Akukho,kde ingeyo clone.Ngokhankanyo kde asiyo CDE okanye Windows clone.Ngexesha i kde ababhekisi phambili bene kwaye bezakuqhubeka ukuchola imisebenzi engcono kwiimeko- bume zonke ezikhoyo ze desktop,kde yimeko- bume enye enyanisekilyo ene kwaye ezakuqhubeka ukuya kwindlela yayo.
Ingaba i kde sisixhobo se computer esikhululekileyo

input: Yes,kde is free software according to the GNU General Public License. All kde libraries are available under the LGPL making commercial software development for the kde desktop possible,but all kde applications are licensed under the GPL.
target: Ewe,kde zizixhobo zecomputer ezikhululekileyo ngokwe GNU Ilayisenisi Kawonke- wonke Ngokubanzi.Zonke kde iilayibrari zikhona phantsi kwe LGPL isenza ingeniso yezixhobo zobhekiso phambili lwe kde desktop yenzeke,kodwa zonke kde izicelo zilayiseniswe phantsi kwe GPL.

input: kde uses the Qt C crossplatform toolkit,which is also released since version 2.2 under the GPL and since version 4.5.0 also under the LGPL.
target: kde isebenzisa i Qt C crossplatform izixhobo,ekhutshwayo nayo ukusukela kuguqulelo 2.2 phantsi kwe GPL.

input: It is absolutely legal to make kde and Qt available on CD-ROM free of charge. No runtime fees of any kind are incurred.
target: Kuyinene okusemthethweni ukwenza i kde ne Qt zibekhona kwi CD- ROM simahla.Akukho zimali sokusebenza kwexesha zalo naluphi na udidi ezinganyangwayo.

input: Many kde users report problems using kppp . But before you complain about kppp ,make sure you have already checked the following
target: Abaninzi kde abasebenzisi baxela iingxaki besebenzisa kppp.Kodwa phambi kokuba ukhalaze malunga ne kppp,qiniseka ukuba sele ukhangele okulandelayo

input: Can you dialup to your ISP without using kppp If you cannot,then perhaps kppp is not the culprit after all.
target: Ungacofa kweyakho i ISP ngaphandle kokusebenzisa i kppp Ukuba awukwazi,ngoku mhlawumbi kppp ngumtyholwa ngapha koko.

input: Have you gone through the kppp documentation at least three times and followed its instructions and trouble-shooting suggestions
target: Uyile ngapha kwe kppp uxwebhu noko amaxesha amathathu kwaye landela imiyalelo neziphakamiso zokudubula- ingxaki

input: The kppp documentation can be accessed through the kde Help Center. Last,but not least,the kppp ktown. kde. org kppp.
target: I kppp uxwebhu lunganikezelwa ngapha kwe kde Umbindi Woncedo okanye yiya ngqo kulawulo loxwebhu,ngesiqhelo KDEDIR share doc HTML default kppp.Ukongeza,i kppp kukho iphepha le web ku http devel- home.kde.org kppp .

input: Now,if you still encounter problems,here's what might help you solve them
How do I change the MTU setting in kppp
target: Ndiyitshintsha njani i MTU icwangcisa kwi kppp

input: To check whether the options took,do one of the following
In a terminal window,run sbin ifconfig ppp0 and look at the reported MTU in the output. It should match your request.
target: Kwi window yesiphelo sendlela,sebenzisa sbin ifconfig ppp0 kwaye jonga kwexeliweyo MTU kwimveliso.Inokuthelekiseka nesakho isicelo.

input: Add debug and kdebug each on a separate line to your etc ppp options file and restart your PPP session. You will find debugging messages in var log messages,including MRU and MTU settings.
target: Dibanisa debug ne kdebug nganye kwilayini eyahlulweyo kweyakho i etc ppp options ifayile kwaye ungaqala kwakhona eyakho PPP intlanganiso.Ungafumana imiyalezo edebugging kwi var log messages,iquka MRU ne MTU izicwangciso.

input: If you want,the MRU and MTU settings can be added to the options file,one complete setting per line,no quotes or dashes.
target: Ukuba ufunat,i MRU ne MTU izicwangciso zingadityaniswa kwi iinketho ifayile,isicwangciso esinye esigqityiweyo ngelayini nganye,akukho luphindo okanye oodwi.

input: kppp connects at a slower speed than normal.
The following might do the trick
The default MTU value is 1500,which maybe too large for a dialup connection. Try changing it to a smaller value like 296 or 576.
target: Okungagqibekanga MTU ixabiso yi 1500,elizakubalikhulul kakhulu kudibaniso locofo.Zama ukuyitshintsha kwixabiso elincinane njenge 296 okanye 576.

input: Check in your HOME . kde share config for the kppprc. Ensure the correct modem speed is actually defined there.
target: Khangela kweyakho i IKHAYA .kde share config ye kppprc.Qinisekisa ukuba isantya se modem esisiso sichazwe apho.

input: How do I page-up or page-down
target: Ndilisa njani iphepha- phezulu okanye iphepha- ezantsi

input: Is it really necessary to upgrade to the latest version

input: We recommend to always use the latest stable release. If you do n't,it will probably be difficult to get answers to your questions. If you have a problem with an old version,the answer will probably be Please upgrade and try again. Note that new versions also sometimes fix security problems.

input: How do I copy and paste in kde
target: Ndikhuphela kwaye ndicole njani kwi kde

input: The simplest method is to use your mouse
Highlight the text you want to copy by holding down the LMB and dragging across the text. This adds the selected text to the clipboard.

input: Click the MMB to paste. If you have a two button mouse and are emulating a three button mouse,push both buttons simultaneously.

input: Fire up the kcontrolcenter . It comes up with an Info Screen including the version of kde The kde version is also included in the application's About dialog. You can also check from the command line with the command kde-config --version

input: Yes. Here is a list of them
My non-kde applications like Emacs and kterm are running amok with strange colors
target: Eyam ezingeyo- kde izicelo njenge Emacs ne kterm zenza i amok ngezinkulu iiwindow nemigca engaqhelekanga

input: Start the kde Control Center and in Appearance Themes Colors uncheck the Apply colors to non-KDE applications checkbox and click Apply.
target: Qala i kde Umbindi Wolawulo kwaye sukusebenzisa kwi Jonga kwaye Uve Uhlobo sukukhangela i faka KDE izicwangciso kwengeyo- KDE apps ibhokisi yokukhangela ne Faka.

input: Not really kde -related,but frequently asked nevertheless.
target: Ayiyinyaniso kde - ezalanayo,kodwa ebuzwa rhoqo kodwa ke.

input: How do I change the screen resolution
Always make a backup copy of your XF86Config file before you start editing it. Errors in this file can render X-Window unusable.
target: Soloko usenza ukhuphelo lasemva lweyakho XF86Config ifayile phambi uqale ukuyihlela.Iimposiso kule fayile zingenza eyakho i X- Windows zingasebenzi.

input: These instructions are only valid if you are running version 3.3. x of the XFree86 server. If you are running XFree86 4. x,you must consult with the XFree86TM Home Page.
target: Le miyalelo isebenza kuphela ukuba usebenzisa uguqulelo 3.3.x lwe XFree86 umncedisi.Ukuba usebenzisa XFree86 4.x,kufuneka udibane nge XFree86 TM Iphepha Lasekhaya.

input: How do I change the color depth
You can also edit the XF86Config file and add a line like DefaultColorDepth number to Section Screen. The next time you start X,it will run with the newly-configured color depth.
target: Ungahlela i XF86Config ifayile kwaye dibanisa ilayini njenge Ubunzulu Bombala Ongagqibekanga inani kwiCandelo Ikhusi.Ixesha elizayo uqala i X,izakusebenza ngobunzulu bombala obuqwalaselwe- ngokutsha.

input: What can I do if I am using a 2-button mouse
target: Ndingenza ntoni ukuba ndisebenzisa imouse enamaqhosha- amabini

input: Go buy a 3-button one,or use third button emulation. The third button is emulated by pressing both the LMB and the RMB together. You would need to enable Emulate3Buttons in your XF86Config file.
target: Yiya kuthenga enamaqhosha- amathathu,okanye sebenzisa iqhosha lesithathu.Iqhosha lesithathu eliboniswa ngokucinezela zombini i LMB ne RMB kunye.Uzakufuna ukwenza Sebenzisa Amaqhosha amathathu kweyakho XF86Config ifayile.

input: How do I extract install diff files
target: Ndizitsala njani faka iifayile ze diff

input: To generate a context-diff suitable for patching,use diff -u old-file new-file gt patchfile. To apply the diff to a file i. e. patch the file,execute patch lt patchfile.
target: Ukujikelezisa intsingiselo- diff elungele ukulapha,sebenzisa i diff - u endala- ifayile entsha- ifayile gt ifayile yokwalapha.Ukufaka idiff kwi fayile i.e.lapha ifayile,phumeza lapha lt ifayile yokulapha.

input: How do I get Linux to mount the floppy device for use with both DOS and ext2 formatted floppies
target: Ndiyifumana njani i Linux ukunyusa icebo le floppy zombini kwi DOS ne ext2 floppies

input: Just specify the filesystem type as auto in etc fstab. Auto detection works fine for DOS and ext2.
target: Khankanya nje udidi lwendlela yefayile njengezenzekelayo kwi etc fstab.Ubhaqo oluzenzekelayo lusebenza kakuhle kwi DOS ne ext2.

input: Is there a tool to make webpages

Yes,and there are a lot of them out there,including StarOffice,Netscape Composer,and XEmacs. There are also many kde applications. To find the most current list,go to kde-apps.The Latest in kde Applications and search for web development. Try as many as possible and choose the one most suitable to your needs.

target: Ndizidibanisa njani izicelo kwiqela lenjongo ethile kicker

target: Kuyenzeka ukutshintsha i K iqhosha leqela lenjongo ethile komnye umfanekiso

input: command for man pages. It even unpacks on the fly if the man pages are gzipped.
target: Jonga iminicli window Alt F2 ngokungagqibekanga no didi umntuy umyalelo.Ayipakishi kubhabho ukuba amaphepha omntu a gzipped.
Shukuma okanye linganisela kwakhona iiwindow ngokukhawuleza

input: To move a window,use Alt left mouse button. Alt right mouse button will resize the window. Last but not least,Alt middle mouse button raises lowers the window. The kde Control Center allows you to change these mouse bindings.
target: Ukushukumisa iwindow,sebenzisa i Alt ekhohlo iqhosha le mouse.Alt ekunene iqhosha le mouse lizakulinganisela iwidow kwakhona.Okokugqibela kodwa okungakuncinananga,Alt phakathi iqhosha le mouse linyusa lihlisa iwindow.I kde Umbindi Wolawulo ukuvumela utshintshe ezi zibophelelo ze mouse.

input: There is a standard keybinding Ctrl Alt Esc that gives you a skull crossbones cursor. Click that cursor on a window to kill it. The keybindings are viewable changeable from the kde Control Center.
target: Kukho isibophelelo esingundoqo esisezantsi Ctrl Alt Esc esikunika ukhakhayi amathambo anqamlezayo esalathisi.Nqakraza eso salathisi kwi window ukuyibulala.Izibophelelo ezingundoqo ziyaboniselwa ziyatshintsheka kwi kde Umbindi Wolawulo.

input: The default window manager provided by kde is the K Window Manager kwin . Please read The K Window Manager Handbook which should be accessible from the kde Help Center for usage information.
target: Umphathi we window engagqibekanga enikezwe yi kde nhuMphathi we K Window kwm kwi kde 1.x ne kwin kwi kde 2.Nceda funda I K Window Umphathi weNcwadi yesandla unokunikezelwa kwi kde Umbindi Woncedo kulwazi lokusetyenziswa.

input: Are there keyboard shortcuts for kwin operations
target: Ingaba zikhona iindlela ezimfutshane ze kwm imisebenzi

input: Yes. Please refer to The K Window Manager Handbook for the list of shortcuts available.
target: Ewe.Nceda thelekisa kwi Incwadi yesandla yoMphathi we K Window yoluhlu lwendlela ezimfutshane ezikhoyo.

input: Can I define my own set of keyboard shortcuts
Yes. Launch the kde Control Center and select Regional Accessibility Keyboard Shortcuts to configure window manager bindings like maximizing windows,etc .
target: Ewe,ukuba usebenzisa i kde 1.1 ngasentla.Yazisa i kde Umbindi Wolawulo kwaye khetha Jonga kwaye Uve Izibophelelo ezingundoqo ukuqwalasela umphathi we window izibophelelo njengokwenza nkulu iiwindow,njalo- njalo.Ukuqala izicelo,ungafuna ukufaka KHotKeys,noxa.

input: When I iconify a window,it disappears. Where does it go

With many X-Window GUI s,the minimize button a little dot will erase the window that the program is running in and create,instead,an icon on the desktop. kde does not do this. Instead,when a window is iconified it is simply hidden but the program is still running.
target: Ngezininzi X- Windows GUI,iqhosha lokwenza ncinane ichaphaza elincinane lizaku phakamisa iwindow udweliso lwenkqubo eliyisebenzayo kwaye neliyenzayo,endaweni yoko,i icon kwi desktop.kde ayikwenzi oku.Endaweni yoko,xa iwindow yenziwe i icon ifihlwa ngokucacileyo kodwa udweliso lwenkqubo lusasebenza.

input: There are a few ways to access disappeared windows
target: Kukho iindlela ezimbalwa zokunikezela zilahlekile iiwindow

input: If you are running the taskbar part of kicker ,you can choose to have a list of tasks displayed on your desktop. Iconified tasks will have their names displayed in gray.
target: Ukuba usebenzisa ibar yomsebenzi ye kicker,ungakhetha ukuba snoluhlu lwemisebenzi eboniswe kwi desktop yakho.Imisebenzi eyenziwe i icon izakubanamagama wazo ajikelezwe sisivakalisi.

input: If you click the MMB on the root window ie ,the background of the desktop,kwin will give you a list of all available tasks.
target: Ukuba unqakraza i MMB kwi window yengcambu ithetha ukuba isiqalo sedesktop,kwm okanye kwin izakunika uluhlu lwemisebenzi yonke ekhoyo kwaye kwakhona,amagama wemisebenzi eyenziwe i icon izakufakwa kwizigweqi.

input: How do I maximize windows only vertically or horizontally
target: Ndizenza nkulu njani iiwindow ngokuthe nkqo okanye tye

input: Provided your window is not already maximized,clicking on the maximize button with the LMB MMB RMB will maximize fully vertically horizontally respectively.
target: Ukunikeza eyakho iwindow ayenziwanga nkulu,ukunqakraza kwiqhosha lokwenza nkulu nge LMB MMB RMB kuzakwenza nkulu ngokupheleleyo nkqo tye ngokulinganayo.

input: By shading a window we mean rolling up the window leaving just the title bar visible. You can do this by double clicking on the window title bar.
target: Ngoku yenza mnyama iwindow sithetha uku ukurola phezulu iwindow ushiya nje ibar yewonga ibonakala.Ungenza oku ngokunqakraza kabini kwibar yewonga.

input: IO Slaves enable kde applications to access remote resources as easily as local resources making them network transparent. Remote resources eg files might be stored on SMB shares or similar.
target: IO Slaves yenza kde izicelo ukunikeza amacebo obekelo kude lula njengamacebo obulali iwenza i uboniso ngaphaya lomsebenzi womnatha.Amacebo obekelo kude eg iifayile zingagcinwa kwi SMB izahlulo okanye efanayo.

input: The kde Input Output system which makes use of so-called IO Slaves.
target: I kde Igalelo Imveliso indlela eyenza usebenziso lokubizwa- nge IO Slaves.

input: KParts is an embedding technology which allows kde applications to embed other kde applications. For example,the text view used by konqueror is a KPart.
target: KParts yiteknoloji elungisayo evumela i kde izicelo zilungise ngendlela ezinye i kde izicelo.Umzekelo,imboniselo yokubhaliweyo esetyenziswa yi konqueror yi KPart.

input: KSycoca kde Sy stem Co nfiguration Ca che is a configuration cache which,for example,guarantees fast access to the menu entries.
target: KSycoca kde Sy tem Co nfiguration Ca che yindawo yokugcina uqwalaselo oluthethelela,umzekelo unikezelo olukhawulezileyo kumangeno emenu.

input: If mentioned in context with kde ,anti-aliasing often means the smoothing of the fonts visible on the screen. Qt version 2.3.0 or higher used together with XFree86 4. x makes this possible under kde as well.
target: Ukuba kukhankanywe kwintsingiselo nge kde,igama elichaseneyo lithetha rhoqo ukwenziwa mpuluswa kwemigca ibonakale kwikhusi.Qt uguqulelo 2.3.0 okanye ezisetyenziswa phezulu kunye nge XFree86 4.x yenza oku kwenzeke phantsi kwe kde nayo.

input: The X-Server represents a basic layer upon which the various GUI s like kde are built. It manages the basic mouse and keyboard input from the local host as well as from remote hosts and provides elementary graphic routines to draw rectangles and other primitives.
target: X- Server imele izaleko ezingundoqo apho ezahlukeneyo i GUI njenge kde zakhiwa khona.Iphatha engundoqo imouse negalelo lebhodi enezitshixo kumamkeli wobulali nayo nakwiinginginya zobekelo kude kwaye inikeza iindlela zomzobo ezinesiqalelo ukuzoba ooxande nezinye izinto.

input: KBuildSycoca4 is a command line program and regenerates the so-called KSycoca. This is useful,for example,if some or all modules in systemsettings are missing.
target: KBuildSycoca yinkqubo yelayini yomyalelo kwaye ijikelezisa kwakhona okubizwa- nge KSycoca.Oku kuluncedo,ukuba ezinye okanye yonke iminqongo kwi kcontrol ilahlekile.

input: This is the project and filename of the kde control center. systemsettings allows you to customize virtually every configuration option of kde .
target: Le yiprojekti negama lefayile le kde umbindi wolawulo.I kcontrol ekuvumela wenze isiqhamo kukhetho ngalunye loqwalaselo lwe kde.

input: konqueror is a web browser,picture viewer,file manager and more,and a core part of the kde project. You can find more information about konqueror at www. konqueror. org.
target: konqueror ngumphathi wefayile,umkhangeli we web,umboniseli womfanekiso,uyibiza ngokuba zitalente ezininzi kwaye liqela elingaphakathi le kde projekti.Ungafumana ulwazi oluninzi malunga ne konqueror ku www.konqueror.org.

input: This concept tries to replace many actions like copying files from one place to another by a certain mouse movement,eg clicking on an icon in a konqueror window,moving the mouse to another window while keeping the mouse button pressed,and releasing the mouse button dropping the object copies files.
target: lo mba uzama ukubuyisela iintshukumo ezininzi njengokukhuphela iifayile kwindawo enye ukuya kwenye ngentshukumo ethile ye mouse,eg unqakraza kwi icon kwi konqueror window,ushukumisa imouse kwenye iwindow ngexesha ugcina iqhosha le mouse licinezelwe,kwaye ukhupha iqhosha le mouse ilahla injongo ikhuphela iifayile.

input: Abbreviation for G raphical U ser I nterface. Every desktop environment like kde is a GUI . Most GUI s feature mouse support and or windows to manage the programs.
target: Ufinyezo lwe G nomzobo U msebenzisi U jongano.Imeko- bume nganye ye desktop njenge kde yi GUI.Ezininzi GUI s inkxaso yomsebenzi we mouse ne okanye windows uku phatha iinkqubo.

input: Abbreviation for K Desktop Environment,a leading GUI for UNIX -based systems. You can find more detailed information at www. kde. org.
target: Ufinyezo lwe K Desktop Imeko- bume,ephambili GUI ye UNIX - iindlela ezakhelweyo.Ungafumana oluninzi oluneenkcukacha ulwazi ku www.kde.org.

input: G NU N etwork O bject M odel E nvironment,one of the leading UNIX GUI s.
target: GN U O bject M odel E nvironment,one of the leading UNIX GUI s.

input: Refers to the panel which often resides at the bottom of the screen.
target: Thelekisa kwiqela lenjongo elaziwa kwakhona njenge kicker ehlala rhoqo ezantsi kwekhusi.

input: The process of reading audio data from a cdrom and storing it on the hard disk.
target: Uqhubekeko lokufunda idata evakalayo kwi cdrom nokuyigcina kwi diski enzima.

input: The GUI of kde is built on top of the Qt toolkit,which provides many graphical elements so-called Widgets which are used to construct the desktop. You can find more information about Qt at www. trolltech. com.
target: GUI ye kde yakhelwe ngaphakathi phezulu kwe Qt izixhobo,ezinikeza iziqalelo ezininzi zomzobo ebizwa- nge Widgets ezisetyenziswa ukulungisa idesktop.Ungafumana ulwazi oluninzi malunga ne Qt ku www.trolltech.com.

input: Abbreviation for internationalization. kde supports many different languages,and several i18n techniques make it easy to translate the GUI as well as the accompanying documents of kde into all these languages. More information about the i18n process is available at l10n. kde. org.
target: Ufinyezo lwe ubukho jikelele.kde ixhasa iilwimi ezininzi ezahlukeneyo,nemininzi imisebenzi i18n yenza lula ukuguqulela i GUI njengokukhapha amaxwebhu we kde kwezi lwimi zonke.Ulwazi oluninzi malunga ne i18n uqhubekeko lukhona ku i18n.kde.org.

input: Abbreviation for localization,the process of adapting a program to the local environment. This includes eg the currency used for monetary values or the time format.
target: Ufinyezo lwe Ubulali,uqhubekeko ludibanisa inkqubo kwimeko- bume yobulali.Oku kuquka eg okwangoku okusetyenziswe kumaxabizo emali okanye ifomati yexesha.

input: Graphical elements like scrollbars,buttons or input fields which are used by kde to construct the GUI .
target: Iziqalelo zomzobo njenge bar yokurola,amaqhosha okanye imihlaba yegalelo ezisetyenziswa yi kde ukulungisa i GUI.

input: S erver M essage B lock. A network protocol used in Microsoft Windows networks to access the file systems of other computers.
target: U mncedisi U myalezo B loko.Iprotocolo yomsebenzi womnatha esetyenziswa kwi Microsoft Windows yenza umnatha ukunikezela iindlela zefayile zezinye iicomputer.

input: I nternet R elay C hat. A protocol defined in RFC 1459,which handles the specification to enable real-time text chat.
target: I nternet B eka kwakhona N cokola.Iprotocol echazwe kwi RFC 1459,ephatha ukhankanyo ukwenza uncokolo lokubhaliweyo kwexesha elililo.

input: This can either be a name from your etc hosts file mycomputer,an Internet name www. kde. org or an IP-Address 192.168.0.10.
target: Oku kunokuba ligama kweyakho i etc hosts ifayile i computa yam,igama le internet www.kde.org okanye Idilesi ye- IP 192.168.0.10.

Use same family for all text

input: kde has several mailing lists up. See below for some of the most useful. Older articles can be found in the mailing list archive.

target: Yolwazi lobulali,olunokuquka uluhlu lomsebenzisi we email ne websites,khangela iphepha lamaqela oguqulelo kwengentla kwe URL.

input: Please visit our Official Representatives page for official enquiries regarding kde eg interviews.
target: Nceda ndwendwela eyethu i Abameli Abasemthethweni iphepha ukuba ufuna ukuqhagamshelana ne kde kwindlela esemthethweni.

input: More information about kde is available at kde-http .
target: Nceda fumana ulwazi oluninzi malunga ne kde e kde- http.

input: The kde help system is designed to make accessing the common UNIX help systems man and info simple,as well as the native kde documentation XML .
target: I kde indlela yoncedo iyilelwe ukwenza unikezelo eqhelekileyo i UNIX iindlela zoncedo umntu ne ulwazi cacileyo,njengeyohlanga kde uxwebhu XML.

input: All base kde applications come fully documented,thanks to the efforts of the Documentation team. If you are interested in helping with the documentation efforts,join the mailing list and write to the team at kde-doc-english kde. org. No experience is required,just enthusiasm and patience.
target: Zonke ezesiseko kde izicelo ziluxwebhu olupheleleyo,enkosi kwimisebenzi yeqela Loxwebhu.Ukuba ungathanda ukunceda,nceda bhalela umququzeleli Woxwebhu,Lauri Watts,ku lauri kde.org yolwazi.Akukho lwazi lufunekayo,nje ulangazelelo nomonde.

input: If you would like to help translating kde documentation to your native language,review the information,including coordinators for each language team,on the Localization web site,and in the Contact section of this document.
target: Ukuba ungathanda ukunceda ukuguqulela i kde Uxwebhu kolwakho ulwimi lobuhlanga,umququzeleli Woguqulelo ngu Thomas Diehl,thd kde.org,kwaye uzakwamkela uncedo.Ulwazi oluninzi,uquka abaququzeleli beqela ngalinye lolwimi,bangafunyanwa kwi i web site ekhoyo jikelele,and in the Qhagamshela icandelo lolu xwebhu.

input: khelpcenter is an integral part of the kde Base installation,and is installed with every copy of kde . It can be found in the kdebase-runtime package,and is available from the kde-ftp ,or will be found in your operating system's kdebase-runtime package.
target: khelpcenter liqela elipheleleyo le kde Ufako lesiseko,kwaye ifakwe ngokhuphelo ngalinye lwe kde.Ingafunyanwa kwimpahla ye kdebase,kwaye ikhona kwi kde.Izakufunyanwa kwimpahla yendlela yakho yokusebenza ye kdebase,kwaye iyafumaneka kwi kde- ftp,okanye ingafumaneka kwi ndlela yesebenzo yempahla ye kdebase.

input: khelpcenter can be called in several ways
The most common will probably be from within an application. Choose F1 Help Applicationapos s Handbook to open that application's handbook.
target: Eqhelekileyo kakhulu izakuba kwisicelo.Khetha Uncedo Imixholo ukuvula lo fayile yezicelo,kwiphepha lemixholo.

input: Choose the big K in your panel,and select the Applications tab followed by selecting Help to open khelpcenter ,which will open up to the default welcome page.
target: Khetha enkulu K kwiqela lakho lenjongo,kwaye khetha Uncedo ukuvula khelpcenter,uqala kwiphepha lokwamkela elingagqibekanga.

input: khelpcenter may be started using a URL to display a file. URL s have been added for info and man pages also. You can use them as follows
target: khelpcenter ingaqalwa usebenzisa i URL ukubonisa ifayile.URL s zongezelwe i ulwazi ne indoda amaphepha nawo.Ungazisebenzisa njengokulandelayo

input: Opens the kedit help file,at the contents page.
target: Ivula i kedit ifayile yoncedo,kwiphepha lemixholo.

input: usr local src qt html index. html
target: khelpcenter ifayile usr local src qt html index.html

input: Invoking khelpcenter with no parameters opens the default welcome page.
target: Iyabhenisa khelpcenter ngaphandle kwe parameters ivula iphepha lokwamkela elingagqibekanga.

input: The khelpcenter interface consists of two panes of information.
target: I khelpcenter ujongano luqulathe izahlulo ezimbini zolwazi.

input: The toolbar and menus are explained further in.
target: Ibar yesixhobo nee menu zichazwa kakhulu kwicandelo.

input: Documents contain their own navigation tools,enabling you to move either sequentially through a document,using Next,Previous,and Home links,or to move around in a less structured manner,using hyperlinks.
target: Amaxwebhu aqulathe izixhobo zawo zolawulo,ikwenza uye noba ngokwemiba ngapha koxwebhu,usebenzisa Elandelayo,Edlulileyo,ne Ekhaya namakhonkco,okanye ukuya jikelele kwindlela encinane eyakhiweyo,usebenzisa amakhonkco aphezulu.

input: Links can take you to other parts of the same document,or to a different document,and you can use the Back Left pointing arrow or Forward Right pointing arrow icons on the toolbar to move through the documents you have viewed in this session.
target: Amakhonkco angakusa kwamanye amaqela oxwebhu olunye,okanye kuxwebhu elahlukileyo,kwaye ungaserbenzisa i Emva Utolo olalathe Ekhohlo okanye Phambili Utolo olalathe Ekunene ii icon kwibar yesixhobo ukusa ngapha kwamaxwebhu owaboniseleyo kule ntlanganiso.

input: The two panes display the contents of the help system,and the help files themselves,on the left and right respectively.
target: Izahlulo ezimbini zibonisa imixholo yendlela yoncedo,kwaye iifayile zoncedo ngakwazo,ekhohlo nasekunene ngokuhloniphekileyo.

input: The Contents pane in khelpcenter is displayed on the left hand side of the window. As you might expect,you can move the splitter bar,to make sure you can comfortably read the contents of either pane.
target: I Imixholo izahlulo kwi khelpcenter siboniswe kwicala lesandla sasekhohlo se window.Njengoko unokulindela,ungasa ibar yokuchaka,ukuqiniseka ukuba ungafunda ngokukhululeka imixholo yesahlulo.

input: The Contents pane is further divided into two tabs,one containing a menu showing all the help information khelpcenter is aware of,and the other contains the kde glossary of terms.
target: I Imixholo isahlulo sahlulwe kwizithuba ezimbini,esinye siqulathe i menu ibonisa lonke ulwazi loncedo khelpcenter ulwazi oluthile,kwaye enye iqulathe i kde inkcazelo yamagama yemiba.

input: The Contents contains the following default entries
target: I Imixholo iqulathe amangeno angagqibekanga alandelayo

input: The kde User's manual is an in-depth exploration of kde ,including installation,configuration and customization,and use.
target: I kde Incwadi yomsebenzisi ikuvavanyo olunzulu lwe kde,iquka ufako,uqwalaselo nokwenziwa,nokusetyenziswa.

input: Native kde application documentation. All kde applications have documentation in XML format,which are converted to HTML when you view them. This section lists all the kde applications with a brief description and a link to the full application documentation.
target: Elobuhlanga kde uxwebhu lesicelo.Zonke kde izicelo zino xwebhu kwi XML fomati,eziguqulelwe kwi HTML xa uzibonisela.Eli candelo lidwelisa zonke i kde izicelo ngenkcazelo emfutshane nekhonkco kuxwebhu lesicelo elipheleleyo.

input: The applications are displayed in a tree structure that echoes the default structure of the K menu,making it easy to find the application you are looking for.
target: Izicelo ziboniswa kwisakhiwo somthi esilinganisa isakhiwo esingagqibekanga se K menu,isenza lula ukufumana isicelo osikhangelayo.

input: UNIX man pages are the traditional on-line documentation format for UNIX systems. Most programs on your system will have a man page. In addition,man pages exist for programming functions and file formats.
target: UNIX amaphepha omntu akwifomati yoxwebhu eliselayinini- yakwantu yendlela ze UNIX.Iinkqubo ezininzi kwindlela yakho zizakubane phepha lomntu.Ukongeza,amaphepha omntu akhona kwimisebenzi yenkqubo nee fomati zefayile.

input: TeXinfo documentation is used by many GNU applications,including gcc the C C compiler,emacs,and many others.
target: TeXinfo uxwebhu lusetyenziswa ngezininzi GNU izicelo,iquka gcc i C C umqokeleli,emacs,nezinye ezininzi.

input: Frequently asked questions about kde ,and their answers.
target: Imibuzo ebuzwa rhoqo malunga ne kde,neempendulo zayo.

input: Information on how to contact kde developers,and how to join the kde mailing lists.
target: Ulwazi lokuqhagamshela i kde ababhekisi phambili,nendlela yokudibanisa i kde uluhlu lokuposa.

input: Links to kde on the web,both the official kde website,and other useful sites.
target: Amakhonkco kwi kde kwi web,zombini esemthethweni kde website,namanye aluncedo amanxuwa.

input: How to help,and how to get involved.
Info documents are arranged hierarchically with each page called a node. All info documents have a Top node,ie the opening page. You can return to the Top of an info document by pressing Top.
target: Amaxwebhu olwazi alungiswe ngokwamaqela ngephepha ngalinye elibizwa nge dumbo.Wonke amaxwebhu olwazi ane Phezulu udumbo,ithetha ukuba.iphepha lokuvula.Ungabuyela kwi Phezulu koxwebhu lolwazi ngokucinezela Phezulu.

input: Prev Next are used to move to the previous next page at the current level of the hierarchy.
target: Edlulileyo Elandelayo asetyenziswa ukuya kwiphepha elidlulileyo elilandelayo kumphakamo wangoku weqela legunya.

input: Clicking on a menu item within a document moves you to a lower level in the hierarchy. You may move up the hierarchy by pressing Up.
target: Ukunqakraza kumba wemenu kuxwebhu kukusa kumphakamo osezantsi kwiqela elinegunya.Ungalisa phezulu iqela elinegunya ngokucinezela Phezulu.

input: Man is treated similarly to info,with the section index being the Top node and each man page on the level below. Man entries are one page long.
target: Umntu uphathwa ngokufanayo kulwazi,ngesalathiso secandelo esiludumbo Oluphezulu kwaye iphepha ngalinye lomntu kumphakamo osezantsi.Amangeno omntu aliphepha elinye ubude.

input: The glossary provides a quick reference point,where you can look up the definitions of words that may be unfamiliar to you. These range from kde specific applications and technologies,through to general UNIX computing terms.
target: Inkcazelo yamagama inikeza incopho yothelekiso ekhawulezayo,apho ungajonga iinkcazelo zamagama anokungaziwa kuwe.La aqala kwi kde izicelo ezithile neeteknoloji,ngapha ukuya ngokubanzi UNIX imiba yecomputing.

input: In the left hand pane you will see a tree view,Alphabetically or By topic. Both contain the same entries,sorted differently,to allow you to quickly find the item of interest.
target: Kwisahlulo sesandla sasekhohlo uzakubona imboniselo yomthi,eneenketho ezimbini Ngokonobumba okanye Nge sihloko.Zombini ziqulathe amangeno amanye,alungiswe ngokwahlukeneyo,ukukuvumela ufumane umba womdla ngokukhawuleza.

input: Navigate down the tree views to the left,and items you select will be displayed on the right.
target: Lawula ezantsi iimboniselo zomthi ekhohlo,kwaye imiba oyikhethayo izaku boniswa ekunene.

input: khelpcenter has a very minimal interface,allowing you to concentrate on getting help rather than learning how to use the help browser.
target: khelpcenter inojongano oluncinane kakhulu,elikuvumela ukuba uqwalasele ekufumanene uncedo kunokufunda indlela yokusebenzisa umkhangeli zincwadi woncedo.

input: The icons available to you in the toolbar are as follows
target: Ii icon ezikhoyo kuwe kwibar yesixhobo akokulandelayo

input: Print the contents of the currently visible page.
Find a word or words within the currently visible page.
target: Fumana igama okanye amagama kwiphepha elibonakalyo.

input: Increase the size of the text in the viewer pane.
Decrease the size of the text in the viewer pane. This icon is only enabled if you have previously enlarged the text.
target: Nciphisa ubungakanani bokubhaliweyo kwisahlulo somboniseli.Le icon yenziwa kuphela ukuba wenze nkulu okubhaliweyo kokudlulileyo.

input: The menus contain the following entries
Select all the text in the current page.
Find a word or words in the currently visible page.
target: Fumana igama okanye amagama kwiphepha elibonakalayo langoku.

input: Change the encoding of the current page. Normally,the default setting of Auto should be sufficient,but if you are having problems viewing pages written in languages other than English,you may need to choose a specific encoding in this menu.
target: Tshintsha i enkhowudingi yephepha langoku.Ngesiqhelo,ucwangciso olungagqibekanga lwe Ezenzekelayo inokwanela,kodwa ukuba uneengxaki zokubonisela amaphepha abhalwe kwilwimi ezingaphandle kwe siNgesi,ungafuna ukukhetha ethile i enkhowudingi kule menu.

input: Originally developed by Matthias. Elter Matthias. Elter. mail
target: Ibhekiswe ngoqobo ngu Matthias Elter me kde.org

input: By default,the kicker panel contains an icon to call khelpcenter . Again,the default welcome page is displayed.
target: Ngokungagqibekanga,i kicker iqela lenjongo liqulathe i icon ukubiza khelpcenter.Kwakhona,iphepha lokwamkela elingagqibekanga liyaboniswa.

input: Welcome to kde - an introduction to the K Desktop Environment.
target: Wamkelekile kwi kde - ukwazisa Kwimeko- bume ye K Desktop.

input: The kde Quickstart guide. Contains a tour of the kde Interface and specific help and tips on how to work smarter with kde .
target: I kde Isalathiso soqalo olukhawulezayo.Liqulathe utyelelo kwi kde Ujongano noncedo oluthile neencam zendlela yokusebenza ngokubukekayo nge kde.

input: View the HTML source of the page you are currently viewing.
target: Bonisela i HTML imvelaphi yephepha oliboniselayo okwangoku.

input: If you are new to kde ,the kde project might look like big machinery to you. Undoubtedly,kde is no longer a small project,nevertheless it is very important to realize that it is easy to make a difference in the kde world.
target: Ukuba umtsha kwi kde,i kde iprojekti ingajongeka nnjengomatshini omkhulu kuwe.Akukho mathandabuzo,kde asiyo projekti incinane nakanye Kodwa ke,kubaluleke kakhulu ukwazi ukuba kulula uku yenza umahluko kwi kde ihlabathi.

input: There is always a need for dedicated developers,graphic artists,sound engineers,translators and documentation writers. Consider jumping aboard this exciting international project and make yourself a name in the software world.
target: Kusoloko kukho imfuno ebhekisa kubabhekisi phambili,abazobi,iinjineli zesandi.Qwalasela uxhumo lulahla le projekti jikelele ivuyisayo kwaye zenze igama kwihlabathi lezixhobo zecomputer.

input: Subscribe to the kde mailing lists that interest you.
target: Nikela kwi kde uluhlu lokuposa okunika umdla.

input: Read the mailing list archives in order to get a feel for kde development.
target: Funda i uluhlu lokuposa iindawo zokugcina ukuze ufumane ukuva kwe kde ubhekiso phambili.

input: Learn how to program using the kde application framework and join the friendly kde developers' community.
target: Funda Funda indlela yokudwelisa usebenzisa i kde umsebenzi wesakhelo wesicelo kwaye dibanisa eyobuhlobo i kde abahlali bababhekisi phambili.

input: If your busy schedule or skills do not permit you to be actively involved in kde development,please consider supporting kde financially.
target: Ukuba ucwangciso lwakho oluxakekileyo okanye ubuchule abukuvumeli usebenze ngokubandakanywa kwi kde ubhekiso phambili nceda qwalasela ukuxhasa i kde ngezimali ngokunikeza umnikelo.

input: Your contribution is very much appreciated. Thank you
Please contact Mirko Boehm kde-ev-treasurer kde. org if you have any questions.
target: Nceda qhagamshela no Matthias Hoelzer hoelzer kde.org ukulalisela ukuba unemibuzo.

input: The kde team welcomes you to user-friendly UNIX computing.
target: Iqela le kde liyakwamkela kumsebenzisi- eyobuhlobo UNIX computing.

input: Welcome to the K Desktop Environment

kde is a powerful graphical desktop environment for UNIX workstations. A kde desktop combines ease of use,contemporary functionality and outstanding graphical design with the technological superiority of the UNIX operating system.
target: kde yimeko- bume yedesktop yomzobo onamandla wezitishi zokusebenza ze UNIX I kde desktop idibanisa ubulula bokusetyenziswa,olinganayo umsebenzi noyilo olumiyo lomzobo ngabaphathi abateknologikali bendlela yokusebenza ye UNIX.

input: What is the K Desktop Environment
Getting the most out of kde
A Quick Start Guide to the Desktop

target: kde Umsebenzi Wesakhelo Sobhekiso phambili Lwesicelo
kde Umsebenzi Wesakhelo Sobhekiso phambili Lwesicelo

input: kde is a desktop environment. In other words,kde is a collection of programs,technologies and documentation that attempt to make life easier for computer users. kde is targeted at UNIX workstations. It features network transparency and a contemporary work philosophy.
target: kde yimeko- bume ye desktop.Ngamanye amazwi,kde luqokelelo lwenkqubo,iiteknoloji nexwebhu ezizama ukwenza ubomi lula kubasebenzisi becomputer.kde utekeniswe kwizitishi ze UNIX Isebenzisa uboniso ngaphaya lomsebenzi womnatha nefilosofi yomsebenzi elinganayo.

input: The creators of the K Desktop Environment are a world-wide group of software engineers. This group's major goal in free software development is to provide high quality software that empowers the user with easy control of his computer's resources.
target: Abenzi bemeko- bume ye K Desktop liqela kwihlabathi- ngokubanzi lenjineli zezixhobo zecomputer.Oku kudibanisa umsebenzi ongundoqo kubhekiso phambili lezixhobo ezikhululekileyo zecomputer,kukunikela ubunjani obuphakamileyo bezixhobo ezigunyazisa umsebenzisi ngolawulo olulula lwamacebo ecomputer yakhe.

input: In combination with a free implementation of UNIX ,kde provides to the world an open and completely free desktop computing platform either at home or at work.
target: Kudibaniso ngozalisekiso olukhululekileyo lwe Unix,kde eyinikezayo kwihlabathi kwevuliweyo negqityiweyo idesktop ekhululekileyo yomgangatho wecomputing noba kusekhaya okanye emsebenzini.

input: This platform is available to anyone free of charge including its source code for anyone to modify.
target: Lo mgangatho ukhona nakowuphi na umntu okhululekileyo iquka ikhowudi yayo yemvelaphi ukuze nabani aguqule kancinane.

input: kde focuses on the user's needs,but it's obvious that this focus is more easily achieved by also giving developers the best tools. kde code contains,and comes with,some of the best development technologies of the modern computing age.
target: kde iqwalasele kwiimfuno zomsebenzisi,kodwa kuqhelekile ukuba olu qwalaselo lulula ukwenziwa ngokunika ababhekisi phambili izixhobo ezingcono.kde ikhowudi iqulathe,kwaye iza ngezinye iiteknoloji zobhekiso phambili ezingcono zobudala becomputing yeli xesha.

input: Authoring applications under UNIX X11 used to be an extremely tedious and labor intensive process. kde recognizes the fact that a computing platform is only as good as the number of first class applications available to the users of that particular platform.
target: Ibhala izicelo phantsi Unix X11 used to be an extremely tedious and labor intensive process.kde recognizes the fact that a computing platform is only as good as the amount of first class applications available to the users of that particular platform.

input: In its current form,kde provides,apart from the essential desktop component applications,a suite of powerful office programs known to the world by the name koffice .
target: Kwindlela yayo,kde inikeza,ngaphandle izicelo ezikhoyo ze desktop,isuti yeenkqubo ze ofisi ezinamandla,ezaziwayo lihlabathi phantsi kwegama koffice.

input: While some of those components are still in alpha development,others are already extremely powerful. For example,kpresenter ,kde 's presentation application,was successfully used at the 5th International Linux Congress in Cologne,Germany to deliver a kde presentation.
target: udweliso lwenquboXa amanye amaqela asekubhekiso phambili lokuqala amanye anamandla kakhulu.Umzekelo,kpresenter,kde isicelo sokubonisa sasetyenziswa ngempumelelo kweyesihlanu indibano jikelele ye Linux kwi Cologne,Ejamani ukuzisa uboniso lwe KDE.

input: We would like to invite you to learn more about kde and koffice .
target: Singathanda ukukumema kwi lfunda kakhulu malunga ne KDE ne koffice.

input: An introduction to the K Desktop Environment
target: Ukwazisa kwiMeko- bume ye K Desktop

input: This document is a brief introduction to the K Desktop Environment. It will familiarize you with some of the basic features of kde .
target: Olu xwwebhu kukwazisa okufutshane kwiMeko- bume ye K Desktop.Izakukuqonda ngeminye imisebenzi engundoqo ye kde.

input: This guide is far from covering all aspects of the K Desktop or even most of them. It will only describe some of the most basic ways to accomplish a few of the most common tasks.
target: Esi salathiso sikude ekugqumeni zonke iziphumo ze K Desktop okanye noba ezininzi zazo.Izakuchaza kuphela ezindle iindlela ezininzi ezingundoqo ukufeza embalwa kwemininzi eqhelekileyo imisebenzi.

input: We assume that you are already familiar with at least one graphical user interface,for example CDE ,Geos,GEM,NeXTSTEP ,Mac ,OS 2 or Microsoft Windows . So we will not explain the usage of the mouse or the keyboard but concentrate on hopefully more interesting things.
target: Sicinga ukuba sele usaziwa noko ngolunye olomzombo ujongano lomsebenzisi,umzekelo CDE,Geos,GEM,NeXTSTEP,Mac,OS 2 okanye Microsoft Windows.Ngoko asizukuchaza usebenziso lwe mouse okanye ibhodi yezitshixo kodwa qwalasela ngethemba kwizinto ezinomdla kakhulu.

input: kde provides a highly configurable desktop environment. This overview assumes that you are using the default environment.
target: kde inikeza imeko- bume ye desktop eqwalaselekayo ngokuphezulu.Lemboniselo engaphaya icingela ukuba usebenzisa im eko- bume yokungagqibekanga.

input: A typical kde desktop consists of several parts

A panel at the bottom of the screen,used to start applications and switch between desktops. Among other things,it contains the kmenu ,a large kicon which displays a menu of applications to start when clicked.
target: I qela lenjongo ezantsi kwekhusi,esetyenziswa ukuqala izicelo kwaye switsha phakathi kwe desktop.Phakathi kwezinye izinto,iqulathe Umqali Wesicelo,enkulu K icon ebonisa imenu yezicelo ukuqala xa kunqakraziwe.

input: A taskbar,by default embedded in the panel,used to switch between and manage currently running applications. Click on an application on the taskbar to switch to the application.
target: I ibar yomsebenzi,ngokungagqibekanga okulungiswe kwiqela lenjongo elisetyenziswa ukuswitsha phakathi kwaye iphathe izicelo ezisebenzayo ngoku.Nqakrzaza kwisicelo kwibar yomsebenzi ukuvala kwisicelo.

input: The desktop itself,on which frequently used files and folders may be placed. kde provides multiple desktops,each of which has its own windows. Click on the numbered buttons on the panel to switch between desktops.
target: I desktop ngokwayo,apho iifayile ezisetyenziswa rhoo neencwadi ezinenkcukacha zingabekwa khona.kde inikeza ezininzi idesktops,nganye eneyazo iiwindow.Nqakrzaza kumaqhosha anamanani kwiqela lenjongo ukuswitsha phggakathi kwedesktop.

input: Here are a few quick tips to get you up and running.
target: Nazi iincam ezikhawulezayo ezimbalwa ukukufumana nokusebenzisa.

input: To start an application,click on the kicon button on the panel called the kmenu and choose an item from the menu.
target: Ukuqala isicelo,nqakraza kwi K iqhosha kwiqela lenjongo ethile elibizwa nge Umqali Wesicelo kwaye khetha umba kwi menu.

input: Click the icon that looks like a picture of a house on the panel to access the files in your home folder using konqueror ,kde 's File Manager utility.
target: Nqakraza i icon ejongeka njengencwadi enenkcukacha ngomfanekiso wendlu kwiqela lenjongo ukunikeza iifayile kulawulo lakho lasekhaya usebenzisa i konqueror,kde s into eluncedo Yomphathi Wefayile.

input: Choose K menu System Konsole to get a UNIX command prompt,or press Alt F2 to get a mini command prompt window to execute a single command.
target: Khetha Umqali Wesicelo Indlela Isiphelo sendlela ukufumana i UNIX ukwenziwa komyalelo,okanye cinezela Alt F2 ukufumana iwindow encinane yomyalelo yokwenza ukuphumeza umyalelo owodwa.

input: Choose the Control Center item on the kmenu to configure kde .
target: Khetha i KDE Umbindi Wolawulo umba kuMqali Wesicelo ukuqwalasela i kde.

input: Press Alt Tab to switch between applications and Ctrl Tab to switch between desktops using the keyboard.
target: Cinezela Alt Tab ukuswitsha phakathi kwezicelo ne Ctrl Isithuba ukuswitsha phakathi kwedesktop usebenzisa ibhodi yezitshixo.

input: Use the RMB mouse button to access context menus for the panel,desktop,and most kde applications.
target: Sebenzisa i RMB iqhosha le mouse ukunikeza iimenu zentsingiselo zeqela lenjongo,desktop,nezininzi kde izicelo.

input: Using the kmenu and the Panel
target: Isebenzisa Umqali Wesicelo neqela lenjongo ethile

input: At the bottom of the screen you will find the desktop panel,which is called kicker . You use the panel to launch applications. Have a look at the button on the left with a large kicon .
target: Ezantsi kwekhusi ufumana iqela lenjongfo le desktop,elibizwa nge kicker.Usebenzisa iqela ukwazisa izicelo.Jonga iqhosha ekhohlo ngenkulu i K.

input: This button is called the kmenu . It has a small arrow on the top to indicate that it will pop up a menu if you click on it. Just do it The pop-up offers you easy access to all kde applications installed on your computer system.
target: Eli qhosha libizwa nge Umqali Wesicelo.Inotolo oluncinane phezulu ukubonisa ukuba izakuvelisa imenu ukuba unqakraza kuyo.Yenze nje Ujongo- phezulu lukunikeza unikezelo olulula kuzo zonke kde izicelo ezifakwe kwindlela yakho yecomputer.

input: There are other interesting things possible with the panel.it is the hide-and-show function,activated by clicking on the small arrowed button,which is at one or both ends of the panel.
target: Kukho ezinye izinto ezinomdla ezenzekayo ngeqela lenjongo.Omnye angabaluleka ukuba unesisombululo esisezantsi kumphathi wakho iyi fihla- kwaye- bonisa umsebenzi,owenziwe ngokunqakraza kwibar eyakhiweyo kumda osekhohlo kwiqela lenjongo.

input: If you're following along,and have that dialog open anyway,then feel free to play with all the options,and use the Apply to see the effect they have. You can easily reset everything to the default configuration,by simply pressing the Use Defaults button.
target: Ukuba uyalandela,kwaye unalo ncoko yababini ivuliwe nakanjani,ngoko khululeka ukudlala ngazo zonke iinketho,kwaye sebenzisa i Faka ukubona isiphumo ezinaso.Ungacwangcisa kwakhona lula yonke into kuqwalaselo olungagqibekanga,ngokucinezela ngokucacileyo i Sebenzisa Ezingagqibekanga iqhosha.

input: By the way,if you are not sure what a certain button does in kde ,kde has a built-in mini context help,called tool tips,which explains the functionality of such controls in a few words.
target: Ngendlela,ukuba awuqinisekanga ngokwenziwa liqhosha elithile kwi kde,yisa nje isalathisi semouse ngapha kwayo kwaye yilindele ixesha elifutshane kde inoncedo lwentsingiselo encinane eyakhelwe- ngaphakathi,ebizwa nge iincam zesixhobo,ezichaza umsebenzi wolawulo olunjalo kumagama ambalwa.

input: But I want my command line back
target: Kodwa ndifuna ilayini yam yomyalelo ubuye

input: kde provides a very sophisticated command line window called konsole . Choose K menu System Konsole to start it.luckily it's already there in the default configuration
target: kde inikeza i window ethambileyo yelayini yomyalelo ebizwa nge konsole.Khetha Umqali Wesicelo Indlela Isiphelo sendlela ukuyiqala.Oku kunokuba yinto oyifunayo kwiqela lakho lenjongo,ngethamsanqa sele ilapho kuqwalaselo olungagqibekanga

input: Sometimes,you only want to enter one command on the command line. In these cases,you do not need a full-blown terminal. Just hit Alt F2 and you get a small command line where you can enter one command. The command line window will disappear afterwards,but it remembers your command.
target: Ngamanye amaxesha,ufuna kuphela ukungenisa umyalelo omnye kwilayini yomyalelo.Kule mizekelo,awufuni isiphelo sendlela esivuthuzwe- ngokupheleleyo.Nje betha Alt F2 ne ufumana ilayini yomyalelo encinane apho ungangenisa khona umyalelo omnye.Iwindow yelayini yomyalelo izakulahleka emva koko,kodwa ikhumbula umyalelo wakho.

input: When you pop up this window which we call minicli by the way and hit the Up arrow,you can browse through all the commands you have previously entered. Also,you can enter URL s in minicli to open a konqueror window with the specified URL .
target: Xa uvelisa le window esiyibiza nge minicli ngendlela kwaye betha i Utolo- oluphezulu,ungakhangela ngapha kwayo yonke imiyalelo oyingenise kokudlulileyo.Kwakhona,ungangenisa URL s kwi minicli ukuvula i konqueror window enekhankanyiweyo i URL.

input: To display a UNIX man page,command in minicli,where command is the name of a UNIX command.
target: Ukubonisa iphepha le Unix ngenisa indoda umyalelo kwi minicli,apho umyalelo iligama le UNIX umyalelo.

input: To search for a word or words on the Google search engine,word or words. There are a whole lot more of these shortcut commands,and you can even add your own Take a look in kcontrol ,in the tab Web Browsing Enhanced Browsing.
target: Ukuphendla igama okanye amagama kwinjini yophendlo ye Google,unga zama gg igama okanye amagama.Kukho ezininzi yezi ndlela zimfutshane zemiyalelo,kwaye ungadibanisa eyakho Thatha ujongo kwi kcontrol,kwisithuba Ukhangelo lwe Web Ukhangelo Oluphawulweyo.

input: Finally,there's a way to have your command line always available,no matter what you're doing - add one to your kicker panel
target: Okokugqibela,kukho indlela yokuba nelayini yomyalelo esoloko ikhona,noba wenza ntoni - dibanisa enye kweyakho i kicker iqela lenjongo

input: Simply RMB click on an empty space in the panel,and choose Panel Add Applet Application Launcher. This will embed a mini-cli directly into your panel,complete with command history.
target: Ngokucacileyo RMB nqakraza kwisithuba esingenanto kwiqela lenjongo,kwaye khetha Iqela lenjongo Dibanisa Applet Umazisi Wesicelo.Oku kuzakulungisa i mini- cli ngqo kwiqela lakho lenjongo,gqibezela ngembali yomyalelo.

input: So,in conclusion,the command line is never far from view when you're using kde .
target: Ngoko,kwisiphelo,ilayini yomyalelo ayikho kude kwimboniselo xa usebenzisa i kde.

input: If you have not already done so,start an application using the kmenu say,Find Files.
target: Ukuba awusele wenze oko,qala isicelo usebenzisa i Umqali Wesicelo,njenge Fumana Iifayile.

input: Well,usually people work inside windows,but sometimes you may want to manipulate windows. Here's a quick overview of some of the most common window related functions
target: Kuhle,ngesiqhelo abantu basebenza ngaphakathi windows,kodwa ngamanye amaxesha ungafuna ukuhanahanisa iiwindow.Nantsi ekhawulezayo imboniselo engaphaya yeqhelekileyo imisebenzi ezalanayo ye window

input: Drag the window's title bar,or hold the Alt key down and drag anywhere in the window.
target: Tsala ibar yewonga ye window,okanye bamba i Alt isitshixo phantsi kwaye tsala naphi na kwi window.

input: Drag the window's border,or hold the Alt key down and drag with the RMB anywhere in the window.
target: Tsala umda we window,okanye bamba isitshixo se Alt phantsi kwaye tsala nge RMB iqhosha le mouse naphi na kwi window.

input: Click the maximize button in the titlebar in the default decoration it is the square,next to the X to make the window fill the screen,or if the window is already maximized,to shrink it back to its original size. Clicking with the MMB maximizes the window vertically,and with the RMB ,horizontally.
target: Nqakraza iqhosha lokwenza nkulu kwibar yewonga kolungagqibekanga uhombiso lisisikweri,ecaleni kuka X ukwenza iwindow igcwalise ikhusi,okanye ukuba iwindow sele yenziwe nkulu,ukuyishwabanisa kwakhona kubungakanani bayo boqobo.Ukunqakraza nge MMB kwenza nkulu iwindow ngokuthe nkqo i RMB,ngokuthe tye.

input: Click the iconify button in the titlebar next to Maximize to hide the window. Restore it by clicking on the window's icon in the taskbar.
target: Nqakraza iqhosha lokwenza i icon kwibar yewonga ecaleni Kokwenza nkulu ukufihla i window.Yifumane kwakhona ngokunqakraza kwi icon yewindow kwi bar yomsebenzi.

input: Aside from the usual mouse click to switch to another window,you can use Alt Tab to switch windows. See below for more techniques.
target: Ngaphandle konqakrazo lwemouse lwesiqhelo ukuswitsha kwenye iwindow,unga sebenzisa Alt Isithuba ukuswitsha iiwindow.Bona ngezantsi iindlela zokuphumeza.

input: kde windows have some pretty standard buttons on their title bars which give you fast access to some common operations. The default button layout looks like this
target: kde iiwindow zinamaqhosha amahle asezantsi kwibar zazo zewonga ezikunika unikezelo olukhawulezayo kwimisebenzi eqhelekileyo.Ubeko lweqhosha elingagqibekanga lujongeka kanje

input: A menu button. This usually shows a mini icon for the application. Click on it to get a window operations menu.Alt F3 opens the window menu.
target: Iqhosha le menu.Oku kuqhele ukubonisa i icon encinane yesicelo.Nqakraza kuyo ukufumana imenu yemisebenzi yewindow.Indlela emfutshane Alt F3 ivula imenu yewindow.

input: Optionally a sticky button. What the heck is this Stay tuned
target: Iqhosha elingasebenzisaniyo,ngomfanekiso obukhali.Yingxaki enjali le nto hlala usebenza

input: A close button. This closes the window.Alt F4.
target: Iqhosha lokuvala.Oku kuvala i window.Indlela emfutshane Alt F4.

input: Now that we know how to deal with windows,we encourage you to open some other windows using the panel,since we will now discuss how to switch between different windows. Since this is such a common activity,kde offers several ways to do it pick your favorite
target: Ngoku siyazi indlela yokusebenza ngee window sikukhuthaza uvule ezinye iiwindow ngeqela lenjongo ukusukela ukuba sizakuxoxa ngoku indlela yokuswitsha phakathi kwezahlukeneyo iiwindow.Ukusukela ukuba oku kungumsebenzi oqhelekilyo,kde inikeza iindlela ezininzi zokuyenza chola oyithandayo

input: Here are some other methods to switch windows

Pick a window from the window list menu. To open the menu,click the MMB on an empty area of the desktop,or click the icon with several windows on the panel,or finally click the up arrow at the left hand end of the taskbar in the panel.
target: Chola iwindow kwi uluhlu lwe window menu.Ukuvula i menu,nqakraza i MMB kwindawo engananto ye desktop,okanye nqakraza i icon ngezininzi ii window kwiqela lenjongo,okanye okokugqibela nqakraza utolo oluphezulu kwisiphelo sesandla sasekhohlo sebar yomsebenzi kwiqela lenjongo.

input: Hold down the Alt key and press Tab to cycle through the windows.
target: Bamba phantsi i Alt isitshixo kwaye cinezela Isithuba ukurhangqa ngapha kwee window.

input: The taskbar displays a list of small icons,one for each window on the desktop. In the default kde setup the taskbar is located inside the panel,but it can also be located at the top or the bottom of the screen.
target: I ibar yomsebenzi ibonisa uluhlu lwe icon ezincinane,enye yewindow nganye kwi desktop.Kwengagqibekanga kde cwangcisa ibar yomsebenzi ibekwe ngaphakathi kwiqela lenjongo,kodwa ingabekwa phezulu okanye ezantsi kwekhusi.

input: The icons on the taskbar resize themselves to make room for applications,so you can fit many more applications than you might think. Making the panel wider will let the taskbar icons take on a row and column layout,but they will still resize to fit more icons.
target: Ii icon kwibar yomsebenzi ziyazilinganisela ukwenza igumbi lezicelo,ngoko ungalunga kwizicelo ezininzi kunokuba ucinga.Yenza iqela lenjongo banzi,lizakuvumela ii icon zebar yomsebenzi zithatha umqolo nobeko lomhlathi,kodwa zizakulinganisela ukulungela ii icon ezingaphezulu.

input: It may happen that you have more windows open than space on your desktop. In this case you have three possibilities
target: Inokwenzeka ukuba unewindo ezininzi ezivuliweyo kunesithuba kweyakho idesktop.Kulo mzekelo unezinto ezintathu ezinokwenzeka

input: Leave all windows open cluttered desktop
target: Shiya zonke iiwindow zivuliwe echakiweyo idesktop

input: Iconify those windows which you do not need at present and use the taskbar or Alt Tab to switch between them still a bit confusing and much work
target: Iconifaya ezo window ongazifuniyo ngoku kwaye ezisebenzisa ibar yomsebenzi okanye Alt Isithuba ukuswitsha phakathi kwazo kwaye isadidekisa kancinane kwaye zingumsebenzi omninzi

input: Use virtual memory,in this case virtual desktops.
target: Ithethelelwe Yenza okwenziwa yindlela yokusebenza yenene ukuba akukho nkumbulo yaneleyo ebonakalayo Sebenzisa inkumbulo enesiqhamo,kulo mzekelo ezinesiqhamo iidesktop.

input: A common metaphor of graphical desktops is the use of folders to represent folders on your hard disk. Folders contain files and other folders. A kde application called konqueror ,the K File Manager,uses this metaphor to help you manage your files.
target: Oluqhelekileyo ufako lwegama lomzobo wee desktop lusebenziso lweencwadi ukumela abalawuli kwihard diski yakho.Iincwadi ziqulathe iifayile nezinye iincwadi ezineenkcukacha.I kde isicelo sibizwa nge konqueror,Umphathi weFayile ye K,usebenzisa olu fakelo lwegama ukunceda ukuphatha iifayile zakho.

input: To open a file or folder,simply click it once with the LMB . You can also choose Window Show Navigation Panel from the menu to display the folder hierarchy for more direct navigation. Or you can edit the path displayed under the toolbar to get to a specific folder quickly.
target: Ukuvula ifayile okanye incwadi eneenkcukacha,yinqakrzaze kanye nge LMB.Ungakhetha kwakhona Window Bonisa Ibar esecaleni kwi menu ukubonisa iqela lencwadi yolawulo oluthe ngqo olungaphezulu.Okanye ungahlela umendo oboniswe phantsi kwebar yesixhobo ukufumana ngokukhawuleza kulawulo olukhankanyiweyo.

input: konqueror uses MIME types to associate files with applications.
target: konqueror isebenzisa MIME iindidi ukudibanisa iifayile ngezicelo.

input: To copy or move a file,simply drag its icon to the desktop,to another konqueror window,or to a folder icon. When you release the button,konqueror displays a menu to allow you to choose to copy,move,or create a link to the file.
target: Ukukhuphela okanye ukusa ifayile,tsala ngokucacileyo i icon yayo kwi desktop,ukuya kwenye konqueror window,okanye kwi icon yencwadi eneenkcukacha.Xa ukhupha iqhosha,konqueror ibonisa imenu ukukuvumela ukhethe ukukhuphela,ukusa,okanye ukwenza ikhonkco kwifayile.

input: Note that if you choose to create a link,kde creates a UNIX symbolic link not a hard link,so if you move or delete the original file,the link will be broken.
target: Qaphela ukuba ukhetha ukwenza ikhonkco,kde yenza i UNIX ikhonkco elinophawu hayi ikhonkco eliqinileyo,ngoko ukuba usa okanye ucima ifayile yoqobo,ikhonkcolizakwaphulwa.

input: Most kde you can drag an icon on to a window of a running application,or on to an icon of an application that is not started,to have the application open the file. Try it
target: Ezininzi kde izicelo zixhasa kwakhona imisebenzi yotsalo nolahlo ungatsala kwaye ulahle i icon kwi window yesicelo esisebenzayo,okanye kwi icon yesicelo esingaqalwanga,ukuba nesicelo esivula ifayile.Yizame

input: To change file properties,such as its name and permissions,RMB click the icon and choose Properties from the menu.
target: Ukutshintsha iimpahla yefayile,njengegama neemvume,RMB nqakraza i icon kwaye ukhethe Iimpahla kwi menu.

input: In the recent past,you needed special software to access files on the Internet. Not any more
target: Ekusondeleni kwexesha elidlulileyo,ufune izixhobo ezithile zecomputer ukunikezela iifayile kwi Internet.Hayi kwakhona

input: kde supports a technology called Network Transparent Access NTA which allows you to work with files on the other side of the world as easily as those on your local hard disk.
target: kde ixhasa iteknoloji ebizwa nge Unikezelo Olubonisa ngaphaya Lomsebenzi Womnatha NTA ekuvumela ukuba usebenze ngeefayile kwelinye icala lehlabathi ngokulula njengezo kweyakho yobulali i hard diski.

input: Note that konqueror uses anonymous FTP access,which may restrict your access to files on the FTP server. If you have an account on the server,you can supply your user ID as part of the URL ,userid server folder
target: Qaphela ukuba konqueror isebenzisa engenagama FTP unikezelo,oluzakwenza umda kunikezelo lwakho kwiifayile kwi FTP umncedisi.Ukuba unetyala kumncedisi,unganikeza umsebenzisi wakho ID njengenxenye ye URL,njengoku ftp userid umncedisi ulawulo

input: konqueror will prompt you for your password,and if the login succeeds,you will have full access to your files on the server.
target: konqueror izakunceda ngegama lakho eligqithisiweyo,kwaye ukuba igama eligqithisiweyo liyaphumelela,uzakubanonikezelo olupheleleyo kwiifayile zakho kumncedisi.

input: Using Templates to access Applications and Devices
In kde it's easy to put icons on the panel or the desktop to access your applications. It's just as easy to add icons to access other items of interest. kde has templates for shortcuts to
target: Kwi kde kulula ukubeka ii icon kwiqela lenjongo okanye kwidesktop ukunikeza izicelo zakho.Kulula nje ukudibanisa ii icon ukunikeza eminye imiba enomdla.kde inetemplates zendlela ezimfutshane

input: Internet resources eg WWW documents,FTP folders
target: Internet amacebo umzekelo WWW amaxwebhu,FTP abalawuli

input: Documents for some of kde 's koffice applications.
target: Amaxwebhu ezinye i kde s koffice izicelo.

input: You can add any of these items to the desktop by RMB clicking where you want the icon,and choosing Create New and selecting the item you want to link to.
target: Ungadibanisa enye yale miba kwi desktop nge RMB unqakraza apho uyifuna khona i icon,kwaye ukhethe Yenza Entsha kwaye ukhethe umba ofuna ukudibanisa kuwo.

input: UNIX provides access to storage devices other than the primary hard disk through a process called mounting. kde uses. desktop files to allow you to easily mount,unmount,and access files on secondary storage devices such as floppy drives and cdrom drives.
target: UNIX inikeza unikezelo kumacebo okugcina angaphandle kwesezantsi hard diski ngapha kwenkqubela ebizwa ngokuba yi iyanyuka.kde isebenzisa.desktop iifayile ukukuvumela ukunyusa ngokulula,ukunganyusi,nokunikeza iifayile kumacebo okugcibnba aphakathi njenge floppy drives ne cdrom drives.

input: As an example,here are the steps needed to create an icon to access files on a floppy disk
target: Njengomzekelo,nanga amanqwanqwa afunwayo ukwenza i icon ukunikezela iifayile kwifloppy diski.

input: Many systems require you to be logged in as root to mount and unmount devices.
target: Iindlela ezininzi zikufuna ulogwe ngaphakathi njenge ingcambu ukunyusa nokunganyusi amacebo.

input: Right click on the desktop and choose Create New Device Floppy Device....
target: Ekunene nqakraza kwi desktop kwaye ukhethe Yenza Entsha Icebo le Floppy.

input: On the General tab of the resulting dialog,change the name to whatever you like,in the text box at the top.
target: Kwi Ngokubanzi isithuba sesiphumo sencoko yababini,tshintsha igama njengoko uthanda,kwibhokisi yokubhaliweyo ngasentla.

input: On the Device tab,enter dev fd0 or the path to the floppy device as it is named on your system as the Device.
target: Kwi Icebo isithuba,ngenisa dev fd0 okanye umendo kwicebo le floppy njengokubizwe kwindlela yakho njenge Icebo.

input: You can add a Mount Point here too. This should be an existing folder,but empty. Common mount points are mnt floppy or floppy,but you can just as easily have floppy disks mounted on mydisk if you want.
target: Ungadibanisa i Incopho Yokunyuka apha nayo.Oku kunokuba lolukhoyo ulawulo,kodwa olungenanto.Iincopho zokunyuka eziqhelekileyo zi mnt floppy okanye floppy,kodwa unganazo ngokulula floppy disks ezinyuswe njenge mydisk ukuba uyafuna.

input: Click the Unmounted Icon and select the picture of a floppy disk without the green light.
target: Nqakraza i I icon enganyuswanga kwaye khetha umfanekiso we floppy disk ngaphandle kokukhanya okuluhlaza.okwengca

input: Once you're happy with your choices,choose OK and you are finished
target: Xa wonwabile ngenketho zakho,khetha Kulungile kwaye ugqibile

input: Now,place a properly formatted floppy in the drive and click the Floppy icon to have kde mount the floppy drive and display the files on the disk. Before removing the disk from the drive,RMB click the Floppy icon and choose Unmount from the menu.
target: Ngoku,beka ifloppy efomatwe kakukhle kuqhubo kwaye nqakraza i Floppy icon ukubane kde nyusa ifloppy drive kwaye bonisa iifayile kwidiski.Phambi kokususa idiski kuqhubo,RMB nqakraza i Floppy icon kwaye khetha Sukunyusa kwi menu.

input: Launch the kcontrolcenter from the kmenu . A window with two panes appears,displaying a list of modules in the left pane.
target: Yazisa i kcontrol kwi Umqali Wesicelo.Iwindow enezahlulo ezimbinio iyavela,ibonisa uluhlu lweminqongo kwisahlulo sasekhohlo.

input: Open a module by clicking its name a list of submodules will appear. Then,click one of the submodule category names to edit its configuration in the right pane.
target: Vula umnqongo ngokunqakraza igama lawo uluhlu lweminqongo esezantsi izakuvela.Ngoko,nqakraza elinye lamagama odidi lomnqongo osezantsi ukuhlela uqwalaselo layo kwisahlulo esisekunene.

input: Changing the configuration is fairly straightforward. A help button is available on each configuration panel to explain settings that are not obvious. Each panel has buttons labeled Help,Use Defaults,Apply,and Reset,which work as follows
target: Ukutsintsha uqwalaselo kujonge phambili.Iqhosha loncedo likhona kwiqela ngalinye loqwalaselo ukuchaza izicwangciso ezingalindelwanga.Iqela ngalinye linamaqhosha anombhalo Uncedo,Sebenzisa okungagqibekanga,Faka,ne Cwangcisa kwakhona,esebenza njengokulandelayo

input: Displays a short help text in the left hand pane,including a link to a longer manual for the module in question.
target: Ibonisa okubhaliweyo koncedo olufutshane kwisahlulo sesandla sasekhohlo,iquka ikhonkco kwincwadi ende yombuzo womnqongo.

input: Sets all the options in the current module back to the default at the time kde was installed.
target: Icwangcisa zonke iinketho kumnqongo wangoku mva kokugqibekileyo ngexesha kde yafakwa.

input: Applies the current settings in the currently open module.
target: Ifaka izicwangciso zangoku kumnqongo wangoku wokuvula.

input: Resets the options to the state they were in when you opened the module. If you have already used the Apply button,then this button will reset the options to the state they were in when you pressed Apply.
target: Cwangcisa kwakhona iinketho kwindawo ezikuyo xa uvule umnqongo.Ukuba sele usebenzise i Faka iqhosha,ngoko eli qhosha lizakucwangcisa kwakhona iinketho kwindawo ebezikuyo xa ucinezele Faka.

input: If you make changes on one configuration panel and move to a different module without clicking OK or Apply first,kcontrolcenter will prompt you to ask whether your changes should be applied first.
target: Ukuba wenza utshintsho kwiqela elinye loqwalaselo kwaye uye kumnqongo owahlukileyo ngaphandle kokunqakraza i Kulungile okanye Faka kuqala,kcontrol izakuncedisa ukuba utshgintsho lwakho luzakufakwa kuqala.

input: We sincerely hope that using kde gives you so much fun and pleasure that you never want to log out. But if you do,simply choose K menu Logout.
target: Siyathemba kakhulu ukuba ukusebenzisa i kde kukunika indlalo enkulu kunye nolonwabo ongenakufuna ukuloga ngaphandle.Kodwa ukuba kunjalo,ngokucacileyo khetha Umqali wesicelo loga ngaphandle.

input: There is also a logout button directly on the panel,which looks like a small power button. Or you can press Ctrl Alt Delete to log out.
target: Kukho kwakhona iqhosha lokuloga ngaphandle ngqo kwiqela lenjongo,elijongeka njengeqhosha lamandla amancinane.Okanye ungacinezela Ctrl Alt Cima ukuloga ngaphandle.

input: Non-kde applications do not memorize their state on logout,and kde will warn you to make sure that you have saved any important data in them when you start to log out.
target: Ezingeyo eze- kde izicelo azinkqayi indawo yazo kulogo langaphandle,ne kde izakukulumkisa ukuqinisekisa ukuba ugcina nayiphi na idata ebalulekileyo kuzo xa uqala ukuloga ngaphandle.

input: We hope you enjoyed this brief tour of the K Desktop environment and that this unique desktop environment will help you get your work done faster and more comfortably than ever.
target: Sithemba ukuba ulonwabele olu tyelelo olufutshane lwemeko- bume lwe Desktop kwaye le inye imeko- bume ye desktop izakukunceda ufumane umsebenzi wakho wenziwe ngokukhawuleza kwaye ukhululeke kunakuqala.

input: As you can see there are many ways in which you can help. You are cordially invited to join this world-wide network of people dedicated to making kde the best desktop environment for any computer. Please visit www. kde. org for more information.
target: Njengoko unokubona kukho iindlela ezininzi apho unganceda khona.Umenywe kakhulu ukudibana nalo msebenzi womnatha wehlabathi- ngokubanzi wabantu owenzelwe ukwenza kde imeko- bume engcono ye desktop yayo nayiphi icomputer.Nceda ndwendwela www.kde.org ulwazi oluninzi.

input: Welcome aboard on this exciting journey,
Stephen Schaub sschaub bju. edu - Editor
Robert Williams rwilliams kde. org - Editor
Logging in via the Command Line
A visual guide to kde 's interface. This is a very early version of the document. Eventually,this will be a graphical tour of kde .
target: Isalathiso esibonakalayo se kde ujongano.Olu luguqulelo oluphambi kwexesha kakhulu loxwebhu.Ekugqibeleni,oku kuzakuba lutyelelo olubonakalayo lwe kde.

input: This project was started to help unify the vocabulary used in kde documentation.
target: Le projekti yaqalwa ukunceda ukudibanisa amagama asetyenziswa kwi kde uxwebhu.

input: We provide this for you here as an aid to learning your way around the kde Graphical User Interface. These names have been standardized within kde documentation,so that you will always find interface items referred to in the same way.
target: Sinikeza oku apha njengoncedo lokufunda indlela yakho jikelele kwi kde Ujongano Lomsebenzisi Lomzobo.La magama asiwe ezantsi kwi kde uxwebhu,ukuze usoloko ufumana imiba yojongano oluthelekiswa kwindlela enye.

input: The term Widget refers to the basic building block of a computer program's interface.
target: Umba Widget ubhekisa kwiibloko zokwakha ezingundoqo zojongano lweenkqubo ze computer.

input: Each widget operates in a similar manner each time it is used,but the effect that the widget has depends on its place within the program.
