For a start you could open an example file by using the File Open Example... menu. There are 2 files which you may use in order to get to know all the functions of parley . The file sample-en. kvtml eg shows you some vocabulary words in English,German and French.

A green check mark in the second column means that this entry is active. A red and white X indicates a deactivated entry that will not be practiced. See Editing Entries for more information on active entries.
Of course it is also possible to use the vocabulary list as an ordinary dictionary and to look up manually.
pronunciation. You can use IPA characters from the phonetic alphabet. See more about this in the according options dialog page.
If you only want entries that match from the beginning of the expression you must press Ctrl Return.
Pressing Shift Tab or Tab will move back to the vocabulary.
The cursor moves inside the vocabulary table one column or line accordingly. If it reaches the edge of the vocabulary table,it will not move.
The cursor in the vocabulary is moved up or down one page the amount of visible lines -1. If it has to jump beyond the edge of the vocabulary table,it will not move.
Invokes the Edit Properties dialogue for this entry.
Appends a new row at the end of the vocabulary. The cursor jumps into the Original row. You may type your entry right away or invoke the Edit Properties dialogue for modification of this entry.
If you have selected smart appending you will be prompted to enter expressions in the original language and their translations until you stop by pressing the ESC key.
After confirmation in a safety dialogue,the current row or selection is removed from the vocabulary.

Left mouse click on one of the header buttons will sort this column in ascending order. Another click will sort it in descending order. In case the column is displayed in alphabetical order,you can see a triangle at the end of the button showing the sorting direction.
Keeping the left mouse button pressed for about 1 second on one of the table header buttons will pop up its header menu.
The edit dialog has a different appearance for selections. Some properties are disabled as it does n't make sense to edit the expressions themselves or remarks of a whole range simultaneously.
All fields which may be modified are empty at the beginning to represent their unmodified state. Modifications of properties will only be saved if you confirm them by clicking on the Apply button.
All these settings can be summarized into profiles and retained under an arbitrary name.

Open this dialog with Vocabulary Document Properties. This dialog also consists of several pages the determine properties that belong only to the current document. They are stored with the vocabulary.
Here you enter the title of the document which is displayed in the window's title bar.
Usually you will enter your name in this field. If there are more than one author you might use a line for each person.
I recommend something like the Free Document License
This field should contain things that do not fall in one of the other categories.
Here you add,modify or delete descriptions of your lessons.
The buttons should be pretty selfexplanatory except Clean Up. This one will remove all lesson descriptions that are unused in the current document.
Similar to the previous section about lessons,you can edit your own expression types on this page.
Since the dialog page looks the same as the one before there is no picture.
On the next page you may add the tenses you need.
If you think an important item is missing from the above tense,type or usage label section you should tell me,so I can include them in the application as standard item.
This way all the other users can benefit.
If you have created your vocabulary with a certain order,you can use this check box to turn sorting off for this document. A click in the header button will then no longer sort the row.

Version 0.7 of parley additionally offered the choice to either use 8Bit or Unicode to store the vocabulary files. This is no more supported. The files are always stored in Unicode to prevent wrong rendering of characters.
Unfortunately there is no backwards compatibility to versions below 0.6 any more but I think the benefit is worth it.
Open this dialog with Vocabulary Language Properties.
The following pages of this dialog determine for each language of this dictionary several elements that are used in the according queries.
For every gender you enter here the definite and the indefinite article. If there is none for this language,you leave the field empty.
In the similar manner you input the descriptor for the first,second and third person each in plural and singular.
Because many languages do not distinguish in the third person plural,there is a check box to determine this.
Open this dialog with Settings Configure parley .... The settings in this dialog are global and affect all vocabularies equally.
Save vocabularies automatically on close and quit
If you check this option,parley will automatically save the document if it was modified when you use the close button or when you quit parley .
As a side effect it also does not ask for confirmation to save when quitting with modified data but saves the vocabulary without asking.
parley will automatically save the document if it was modified after the period you enter here when the option is checked.
An interval of 0 also stops this behavior.

If this feature is activated,you will repeatedly be prompted with the entry dialog. After entering the first original you have to enter the corresponding translations. Afterwards you proceed with the next original and its translations until you stop by pressing the Esc key.
When you are in this mode and modify the lesson in the dialog it has the same meaning as selecting the lesson in the toolbar. This way it is preselected when the next entry dialog appears.
The required lessons will have to be created in advance in the document settings.
When checked,all options are save upon termination of parley . Otherwise you have to select the appropriate menu item.
When you resize your main window it is convenient,if the columns resize automatically,too.
This is possible in two manners
The widths of the columns are altered with the same factor the main window grew or shrunk.
If the last button labeled Fixed is set,no resizing of the columns is done.
Each column can be assigned a language. This is internally done with the usual international language codes eg en,de,it. These codes are also stored with the document.
You should always use the correct codes to be able to share vocabularies with others. Merging vocabularies also relies on the correct language codes.
Here you can give the language code a descriptive name in your own language which is shown in the header buttons in the main view.
kde 2 stores those pixmaps under KDEDIR share locale l10n language -code.
Clicking an this button deletes the currently selected language code in the list.

After entering a new language code in the field to its left,you use this button to append it to your list. After that you need to fill in the fields for the long name and the picture for the header button.

Maybe you want to change the language name or the according picture but I strongly recommend you keep at least the 2-byte language code and its 3-byte alternative if you do not have a special reason. This is to achieve compatible document files that can be shared among all users.
Clicking on this drop down box opens a list that contains all the language codes that are covered by ISO639-1.

kjumpingcube is a simple tactical game. You can play it against the computer or against a friend. The playing area consists of squares that contain points. Each square starts with just one point,no owner and a neutral color.
Yes. To change kolorlines visual theme you can use Settings Configure kolorlines ... option on the menubar.

These shortcuts can be changed by selecting Settings Configure Shortcuts... from the menubar.
Yes,click on the Settings menu and select Configure kmines ....
The game settings can be configured by selecting Settings Configure kmines ... from the menubar. A dialog will appear.

When you uncover a square,it indicates how many mines surround this square. If there is no number the neighboring squares are automatically uncovered. When you find a square that you are sure contains a mine,it is very useful to put a flag on it by right-clicking.
The left button will uncover a square. If there is a bomb below that square,the bomb will explode,and the game will be over.
If there is not a bomb under the square,a number will appear. That is the number of neighboring squares that contain bombs. Which ones That's the point of the game.
For each square excluding edge and corner squares,there are 8 neighboring squares.
If none of the neighboring squares has a bomb,then a blank will be shown under the square,and all neighboring squares will be automatically uncovered.

The right button will mark a square as containing a mine by drawing a red flag on it or,if the option is set,as being uncertain by drawing a question mark on it. The uncertain tag can be useful when you are puzzled about the positions of mines.
The middle button will clear the surrounding squares if the right number of squares is already flagged. It is very useful since it is much quicker than uncovering all individual squares.
If your flags are not properly positioned,you will explode a bomb.
Pressing the yellow smiley will start a new game.
These are the default settings. The mouse buttons can be reprogrammed. For more information,see the section entitled Game Options.
A Box showing you the number of mines still left to be marked. Every time you flag a bomb site,this number will decrease by one.
This box does not determine if you are right or wrong,but only how many mines you need to theoretically mark before you are done with this game.
In this example,there are 40 mines to be marked.
A Yellow Smiley Face. Clicking this will start a new game. If you lose the game,it will become a frown.
The box on the right shows how much time this round has taken. The shortest time for each level is listed as the high score.

target: Elicandelo likuvumela utshintshe umbala wokubhaliweyo.Rhangqa imibala kuphindo olunzulu ithetha ukuba noba okubhaliweyo okuphindiweyo ngapha kwamaxesha amathathu kuzakuvela kumbala.Qaphela i Okubhaliweyo okukhuphelweyo imibala isebenza kuphela kumfundi womyalezo,hayi kumqambi.

input: With Message header threading options you can select whether threads should appear expanded open by default or whether they should be collapsed closed. You can of course still open close threads using the - buttons.
target: Nge iinketho zomsonto ze header yomyalezo ungakhetha phantsi kweziphi iimeko imisonto ingavela ivulwe kokungagqibekanga ie ayiwanga phantsi.Ungavula vala imisonto usebenzisa i - amaqhosha ukuba awukhubazi oko apha.

input: If checked,kmail will break long lines but will try to keep the correct quoting eg the gt will always be at the start of the line.
target: Sebenzisa uphindo olubukekayo izakwaphula iilayini ezinde kodwa izakuzama ukugcina uphindo olululo eg i gt izakusoloko ikwisiqalo selayini.

input: Lets you turn word wrapping on and off in the composer window and lets you set the column at which words will be wrapped you probably should not need to change the default value,which is 78.

input: The Define custom mime header fields list sets the headers that kmail will use for its outgoing messages. You can both invent new fields and overwrite existing ones. This feature is only useful for advanced users.
target: I Chaza amaphetshana eheader yemime esiko icandelo licwangcisa okubhaliweyo okuphezulu kwephepha i kmail ezakuzisebenzisa kwimiyalezo ephumayo.Ungafaka yomibini imihlaba emitsha kwaye ubhale ngaphezulu esele ikhona.Lo msebenzi uluncedo kuphela kubasebenzisi abaphambili.

input: If checked,kmail will show html messages with their html formatting and layout. We strongly recommend to leave this option off,as security problems with html might show up. When this option is off,you can still read html messages,but only as plain text.
target: Khetha HTML kokubhaliweyo okungenanto kuzakubonisa i HTML imiyalezo ngeyazo i HTML ufomato nobeko.Sazisa ngamandla ukushiya olu khetho lucimile,njengeengxaki zokhuseleko nge HTML inoku za.Xa olu khetho lucimile,ungafunda kwakhona HTML imiyalezo,kodwa njengokubhaliweyo okungenanto kuphela.

input: Enable this option if you want to be asked for confirmation whenever you use Folder Move All Messages to Trash.
target: Uqwalaselo lwe window ye kamil lukwenza ukwazi ukuqwalasela kmail kwiindlela ezininzi.Ungayifumana via Izicwangciso Qwalasela i kamil.

input: kmail provides a simple and easy-to-use interface for the basic functions of these programs still you should understand how these programs work and what might make their use insecure. Some important issues

input: You really should test if encryption works before you use it. kmail partly relies on PGP GnuPG's error strings,which often change between different versions.

How can I use mail folders that are not in the normal kmail message folder location
target: Ndingazisebenzisa njani iincwadi ezingekho kwi Mail

input: I'm one of those people whose mails consist of 100 quoted lines and one line written by myself. For some reason this annoys other people. Can kmail help me and make everyone's life better
target: Ndingomnye wabo bantu abaneposi equlathe iilayini eziphindiweyo eziyi 100 ne layini enye ebhalwe ndim.Ngesinye isizathu endingayifumaniyo oku kucaphukisa abanye abantu.Inga kmail ndinceda kwaye yenze bonke ubomi bukabani bubengcono

input: Sure. Just select a short relevant part of the original mail with the mouse before you reply. Only this part will then be quoted in your reply.
target: Kulungile.Khetha nje iqela elifutshane lweposi yoqobo nge mouse phambi kokuphendula.Leli qela kuphela elinokuphindwa kwimpendulo yakho.

input: For some messages the value in the Date field is unknown or it is not correct.
target: Kweminye imiyalezo ixabiso kwi Umhla Umhla awaziwa okanye akalunganga.

input: My signature has two dashes above it. What's up
target: Utyikityo lwam lunezithuba ezimbini ngaphezu kwalo.Oku kundenza lusizi

input: Separating the signature from the message body with two dashes and a space on a single line is common usage. These symbols permit mail clients who recognize them to trim the signatures from a reply. If your signature does not already have this separator,kmail will automatically add it.
target: Ukwahlula utyikityo kumzimba womyalezo ngodwi ababini nesithuba yindlela eqhelekileyo neluncedo yodidi olusezantsi.Ukuba utyikityo lwakho alikabinawo olulwahlulo,i kmail izakongeza olutyikityo ngokuzenzekelayo.

input: kmail fetches the same messages over and over again.
target: kmail ithatha imiyalezo eminye ngapha nangapha kwakhona.

input: This happens if you have enabled Leave fetched messages on the server and your POP3 server does not support the UIDL command. There is currently no workaround besides disabling Leave fetched messages on the server. A more detailed explanation can be found in this mailing list post.
target: Oku kuyenzeka ukuba une Cima iposi ku mncedisi engakhethwanga kwaye i POP3 umncedisi wakho akawuxhasi umyalelo we UIDL.Okwangoku akukho sebenzo jikelele ngaphandle kokukhetha i Cima iposi kumncedisi.Inkcazelo eneenkcukacha ezininzi ingafumaneka kolu luhlu lokuposa leposi.

input: Are there any known bugs in kmail
A list of submitted bugs is linked at the kmail homepage. Note that not all these bugs are valid. All in all we think that kmail is a very robust piece of software.
target: Ungalufumana uluhlu lwe bugs ezingenisiweyo kwi bugs.kde.org.Qaphela ukuba ayisizizo zonke ezi bugs ezisebenzayo.Ngoko ke sicinga ukuba i kmail liqhekeza elilungileyo lezixhobo ze computer.

input: However,you should not run kmail while another email client is already accessing the files in Mail if you try to do so,you might lose messages. Note that you should make backups of your messages anyway.
target: Ngoko ke,awunakwenza kmail xa omnye umxhasi weposi sele enikezela iifayile kwi Mail.Ukuba uzama ukwenza oko,ungalahla imiyalezo.Qaphela ukuba ungenza izimamva zemiyalezo yakho nangayiphi na indlela.

Spellchecking does not recognize non-English characters.
target: Ukhangelo lopelo alubaqondi abasebenzi abangengo- Mangesi.

input: Before you can use spellchecking the first time,you have to configure it. You can do so in the composer window's menu under Settings Spellchecker.... You can set the dictionary and the encoding there.
target: Phambi kokuba ungasebenzisa ukhangelo lopelo kwixesha lokuqala,ungayi qwalasela.Ungakwenza oko kwi Umqambi window s menu phantsi Izicwangciso Umkhangeli wopelo.Ungacwangcisa idikshinari nokhowudo apho.

target: Bona icandelo Usebenzisa ezinye iifayile zebhokisi yePosi Nge kmail.

input: Can I use encryption with my normal non- SSL POP3 account
target: Ndingasebenzisa ufihlo ngeyam yesiqhelo engeyo - SSL POP3 ityala

input: If your POP3 server runs an ssh daemon,you can use ssh to tunnel your POP3 connection using the following command
target: Ukuba owakho umncedisi usebenzisa i ssh daemon,ungasebenzisa i ssh ukugquma eyakho i POP3 udibaniso usebenzisa umyalelo olandelayo

input: Modify your kmail configuration to fetch the mail via POP3 from localhost and ssh will tunnel the connection for you.
target: Guqula kancinane uqwalaselo lwakho lwe kmail ukuthatha iposi egqitha kwi POP3 kwi inginginya yobulali ne ssh izakugquma udibaniso kuwe.

input: If non-encrypted messages have already been sent via Internet,the only advantage of using ssh is that your password will be sent encrypted to the POP3 server.
target: Ukuba imiyalezo enga- fihlwanga sele ithunyelwe ngokugqitha kwi internet,uncedo kuphela lokusebenaisa i ssh lelokuba elakho igama eligqithisiweyo lizakuthunyelwa ngokufihlakeleyo kwi POP3 umncedisi.

input: Does kmail lock the folders it uses
target: Ingaba i kmail iyazitshixa iincwadi ezisebenzisayo

input: kmail does not lock the files in Mail.
To avoid the risk of losing mail if using a local account it is necessary to ensure that kmail uses the same type of locking as your mail delivery agent.
target: Ukunqanda umngcipheko wokulahla iposi ukuba usebenzisa elobulali ityala kuyimfuneko ukuqinisekisa ukuba i kmail isebenzisa udidi olunye lokutshixa njengommeli wophathelo lweposi.

input: There are five different locking options you can use
target: Kukho iinketho ezintlanu ezahlukileyo zotshixo onokuzisebenzisa

input: FCNTL will use the fcntl system call.
target: FCNTL izakusebenzisa i fcntl ubizo lwendlela yokusebenza.

input: If you do not want to use any locking,the none option is what you want. However,there are risks of losing mail when no locking is used.
target: Ukuba awufuni ukusebenzisa naluphi na utshixo,i akukho nanye ukhetho yilento uyifunayo.Ngoko ke,kukho imingcipheko yokulahla iposi xa kungekho lutshixo lusetyenziswayo.

input: How do I leave messages on the server

See the Download filters chapter.open up the Settings Configure kmail ... window. Click on the Network page. Select your account from the account list and click the Modify... button. This dialog contains the Leave fetched messages on the server setting which you must enable.
target: Bona i Layisah ezantsi Amacebo okucoca isiqendu.Ukuba ufuna ukushiya yonke imiyalezo kumncedisi vula i Izicwangciso Qwalasela i kmail.window.Nqakraza kwi Umsebenzi womnatha tab.Khetha ityala lakho kuluhlu lwetyala kwaye nqakraza i Guqula kancinane.iqhosha.Le ncoko yababini iqulathe i Cima iposi ku mncedisi isicwangciso omawungasikhethi.

input: How do I automatically insert a text footer within my messages
target: Ndifaka njani ngokuzenzekelayo okubhaliweyo okusezantsi kwephepha kwimiyalezo yam

input: The text footer is also called a signature not to be confused with a cryptographic signature. Select Settings Configure kmail ... Look in the Identity page for the Signature tab and add your signature there. Then go to the General tab on the Composer page and enable
target: Okubhaliweyo okusezantsi kwephepha kubizwa ngokuba yifayile yotyikityo.Khetha i Izicwangciso Qwalasela i kmail.Khangela kwi Uchazo iphepha le Utyikityo isithuba notyikityo lwakho kulo ndawo.

input: How do I set up Sendmail to work with kmail if I have a dial-up connection
target: Ndiyicwangcisa njani i Sendmail ukuba isebenze ne kmail ukuba ndinodibaniso locofo- phezulu

input: First you should check if your distribution can do this for you. It probably has already been set up during installation.
target: Kuqala ungakhangela ukuba eyakho i Linux BSD naluphi na unikezelo lungakwenzela oku.Sele icwangcisiwe ngexesha lofako.

input: If that is not the case,you may want to have a look at the Mail Queue HOWTO.
target: Ukuba asingomzekelo,ungafuna ukujonga kwi iposi Fola HOWTO okanye kwi UCT Linux Iphepha leqela lomsebenzisi ekuqwalaseleni iposi ethunyelwayo yodibaniso locofo - phezulu.

input: I've seen demonstrations of remote control behavior with kmail . Is there any documentation on the available interfaces
target: Sizibonile iinkcazelo zokuziphatha kolawulo lobekelo kude nge kmail.Ilapho naluphi na uxwebhu kujongano olukhoyo

input: dcop kmail KMailIface. Some documentation is also available in kdenetwork kmail kmailIface. h and kdenetwork kmail mailcomposerIface. h.
target: Ungafumana uluhlu lwemisebenzi ngokusebenzisa lo myalelo kwiqokobhe dcop kmail KMailIface.Olunye uxwebhu kwakhona likwi kdenetwork kmail kmailIface.h ne kdenetwork kmail mailcomposerIface.h.

input: This is a short introduction to kmail and its usage so you can start working with it right away. For more in-depth information see the Using kmail section. Note that kmail 's installation is described in the appendix.
target: Olu kukwazisa okufutshane kwi kmail nosebenziso lwayo ukuze uqale ukusebenza ngayo.Oluninzi- olunzulu ulwazi bona i Usebenzisa i kmail icandelo.Qaphela ukuba i kmail ufako lwayo luchazwa kwi i appendix.

input: Invoking kmail for the first time creates a folder called Mail in your home folder. This folder contains the initial folders inbox,outbox,sent-mail,trash and drafts. Use Settings Configure kmail ... to enter some initial information so kmail will be able to properly retrieve and send your messages.
target: Ibhenisa i kmail ngexesha lokuqala lenza ulawulo olubizwa ngokuba yi Iposi iqulathe iifayile eziquphayo inbox,outbox,iposi- ethunyelweyo,umonakalo ne imizobo kulawulo lwakho lasekhaya.Sebenzisa i Izicwangciso Qwalasela i kmail.ukungenisa ulwazi oluquphileyo ngoko i kmail izakukwazi ukugcina ngendlela kwaye ithumele imiyalezo yakho.
Window yokuqwalasela iqulathe amacandelo asixhenxe Uqwalaselo,Umsebenzi womnatha,Inkangeleko,Umqambi,Ukhuseleko,ne Exubeneyo.

input: To begin sending and receiving messages you will only have to change some settings in the Identities and Network pages.
target: Ukuqala ukuthumela nokwamkela imiyalezo uzakutshintsha kuphela izicwangciso kwi Isazisi ne Umsebenzi womnatha amaphepha.

input: If you do want to use Sendmail and you are using a dial-up connection,follow the instructions for setting up sendmail for a dial-up connection in the FAQ section.
target: Ukuba ufuna ukusebenzisa i Sendmail kwaye usebenzisa udibaniso locofo- phezulu,landela imiyalelo yokucwangcisa yodibaniso locofo- phezulu kwi FAQ icandelo.

input: Options only relevant to DIMAP Kolab server

If you check Automatically compact folders kmail removes the messages you deleted from the server as soon as you leave a folder. Otherwise the messages are only marked as deleted and it is up to you to compact the folders manually by using the menu item File Compact All Folders.
target: Ukuba ukhangela Cima ngokuzenzekelayo iincwadi ezineenkcukacha kmail isusa iiposi ozicimileyo kuMncedisi nje ukuba ushiya incwadi eneenkcukacha.Kungenjalo iiposi ziphawulwe kuphela njengezicinyiweyo kwaye kuxhomekeke kuwe ukuphawula iincwadi ngokusebenzisa umba wemenu Cima Zonke Iincwadi ezineenkcukacha.

input: If you check Show hidden folders,folders whose name starts with a dot are also displayed.
target: Ukuba ukhangela Bonisa iincwadi ezifihlakeleyo,iincwadi ezinamagama aqala ngechaphaza ayaboniswa nawo.

input: Select Leave fetched messages on the server if you want to leave your messages on the server after you downloaded them.
target: Khetha Cima iposi kumncedisi ukuba awufuni ukushiya imiyalezo yakho kumncedisi emva kokuba uyilayishe ezantsi.

input: Select Exclude from quot Check Mailquot if you do not want to check this account whenever you use File Check Mail. You can still check for new messages on this account with File Check Mail In.
target: Khetha Khupha ngaphandle kwi quot Khangela Iposiquot ukuba awufuni kukhangela ityala naphi na usebenzisa i Khangela iposi.Ungakhangela kwakhona imiyalezo emitsha kweli tyala nge Ifayile Khangela Iposi kwi.

input: Select Enable interval mail checking if you want kmail to check for new messages automatically. The interval can be specified below under Check interval.
target: Khetha Yenza ukhangelo lweposi lexeshana ukuba ufuna i kmail ukukhangela imiyalezo emitsha ngokuzenzekelayo.Isithuba singakhankanywa ngezantsi phantsi kwe Khangela isithuba imizuzu.

input: inbox is the default folder for incoming messages. If you want to change that for some reason,you can do so with Destination folder. But what you probably want is a filter,which has nothing to do with this option.
target: ibhokisi yangaphakathi iyincwadi engagqibekanga yeposi engenayo.Ukuba ufuna ukutshintsha lo nto ngesizathu esithile,ungakwenza oko nge Incwadi yendawo engongileyo.Kodwa okufunayo yi filter,engenanto yakwenza nolu khetho.

input: With Precommand you can specify any program that kmail will execute just before fetching mail. Please specify the full path do not use and note that kmail will not continue until the program returns.
target: Nge Umyalelo wokuqala ungakhankanya naluphi na udweliso lwenkqubo i kmail ezakuliphumeza nje phambi kokuthatha iposi.Nceda khankanya umendo opheleleyo sukusebenzisa kwaye qaphela ukuba i kmail ayizukuqhubeka lude lube udweliso lwenkqubo lubuyiselwe.

input: Options for both IMAP and POP3
target: Iinketho zazo zombini i IMAP ne POP3

input: If you select Store POP password in configuration file or Store IMAP password in configuration file kmail will remember your password so you will not have to type it every time you start kmail and fetch new mail.
target: Ukuba ukhetha Gcina POP igama eligqithisiweyo kwifayile yoqwalaselo resp.Gcina IMAP igama eligqithisiweyo kwifayile yoqwalaselo kmail izakukhumbula igama lakho eligqithisiweyo ukuze ungabinakuchwetheza yona lonke ixesha uqala i kmail kwaye thatha iposi entsha.

input: Be warned that kmail cannot really encrypt your password,so people who can access your configuration files eg system administrators can easily get your password if you select this option.
target: Lumkiswa ukuba kmail asinakuguqulela kwi khowudi ngenene igama lakho oligqithisileyo,ngoko abantu abanokunikeza iifayile zakho zoqwalaselo eg umphathi wendlela angafumana lula igama lakho ukuba ukhetha olu khetho.

input: kmail supports encryption via SSL and TLS TLS should be preferred if it is available.

input: You are now ready to send and receive mail. For IMAP,just open your folders in the folder tree in kmail 's main window. kmail then connects to your server and displays the messages it finds. For POP3 use File Check Mail.

input: To write your message,fill in the appropriate fields in the composer window. Use the View menu to select which header fields are displayed. The Identity field offers a Sticky option if it is checked,the current identity will become the default identity when you open a new composer next time.
target: Ukubhala umyalezo wakho,gcwalisa imihlaba eyiyo kwi window yomqambi Umqambi.Sebenzisa i Imboniselo menu yokukhetha eyiphi imihlaba wokubhaliweyo okuphezulu kwephepha window ebonisiweyo.Uchazo umhlaba unikezela i Encangathi ukhetho.Ukuba ikhangelwe,ukuzichaza kwangoku kuzakujika kubengokungagqibekanga xa uvula umqambi omtsha ngexesha elizayo.

input: There are a variety of shortcuts to help you with writing your messages. The... buttons next to the To,CC,fields will call up the address book so that you can select addresses from there.
target: Kukho ezahlukileyo iindlela ezimfutshane ukukunceda nokukubhala imiyalezo yakho.I ellipsis amaqhiosha ecaleni kwe Kwi,Cc,ne Bcc imihlaba izakubiza incwadi yedilesi ukuze ukhethe iidilesi apha.

input: fields,a popup will appear that offers matching addresses that have been used recently and matching addresses from your address book if you do not like the automatic popup you can disable it by clicking with the RMB on the field and choosing a different completion mode.
target: Xa uqala ukuchwetheza idilesi kwi Kwi Cc Bcc imihlaba,i popup izakuvela enikeza iidilesi ezithelekisekayo ezisetyenziswe ngoku nedilesi ezithelekisekayo kweyakho incwadi yeedilesi.Ukuba awuyithandi ezenzekelayo i popup ungayikhubaza ngokunqakraza nge RMB kumhlaba kwaye khetha eyahlukileyo indlela yogqibo.

input: Whenever you want to add more than one recipient in one of the fields,use a comma to separate each address from the next one. You may need to specify fully qualified addresses ie user example. com even for local users,depending on your system configuration.
target: Naxa ufuna ukudibanisa ngaphezu kwesinye somamkeli komnye wemihlaba,sebenzisa isiphumlisi ukwahlula idilesi nganye kwelandelayo.Ungafuna ukukhankanya iidilesi ezipheleleyo ezilungileyo ie user domain.com nakubasebenzisi bobulali,ngokuxhomekeke kuqwalaselo kwendlela yokusebenza yakho.

input: You can attach files to your message by using one of the methods below
target: Ungafakela iifayile kumyalezo wakho ngokusebenzisa enye kwindlela ezingezantsi

input: Click the Attach File paper clip icon and select the file you wish to attach
target: Nqakraza i uqhobosho lwephepha iqhosha kwaye khetha ifayile onqwenela ukuyifakela.

input: Drag a file from the desktop or another folder into the composer window
target: Tsala ifayile kwi desktop okanye olunye ulawulo kwi window yomqambi.

input: Select one of the options in the Attach menu.
target: Khetha enye yeenketho kwi Fakela menu.

input: Once a file is attached to your message,it appears in the attachments pane at the bottom of the composer window. You can use the RMB on each attachment to View,Save or Remove the attachment.
target: Xa ifayile ifakelelwe kumyalezo wakho,ivela kwi kulwahlulo lwezifakelo emazantsi kwi window yomqambi.Ungasebenzisa i RMB kufakelo ngalunye kwe Imboniselo,Gcina okanye Susa ufakelelo.

input: You can also attach public keys to the message by using the appropriate options in the Attach menu. PGP key attachments are handled like file attachments.
target: PGP GnuPG izitshixo zingafakelwa kwakhona kumyalezo wakho ngokusebenzisa ezizezona iinketho kwi Fakela menu.PGP izifakelo ezingundoqo ziphathwa njengezifakelo zefayile.

input: Checking the Spelling of your Message

To check the spelling of your message using a dialog,select Tools Spelling.... kmail uses sonnet to check spelling,which is the kde frontend to the ispell or aspell spelling checker. Note that you may first need to configure the spellchecker using Settings Spellchecker....
target: Ukukhangela upelo lomyalezo wakho,khetha i Hlela Upelo.kmail isebenzisa kspell ukukhangela upelo,oluyi kde isiqalo sesiphelo kwi ispell okanye aspell umkhangeli wopelo.Qaphela ukuba ungafuna ukuqwalasela umkhangeli wopelo usebenzisa i Izicwangciso Umkhangeli wopelo.

input: Where kmail by default puts your new messages when you ask it to check your mail.
target: Apho i kmail ngokungagqibekanga ibeka imiyalezo yakho emitsha xa ucela yona ikhangele iposi yakho.

input: By default copies of all messages that you have sent are put into this folder.
target: Iqulathe ukhuphelo lwayo yonke imiyalezo oyithumeleyo.

input: By default all messages that you have moved to trash are moved into this folder.
Contains messages you started to edit but then saved to this folder instead of sending them.
target: Iqulathe imiyalezo oyiqalileyo ukuhlela kodwa egcinwe kulencwadi eneenkcukacha endaweni yokuzithumela.

input: If you want to clear all of the messages out of a folder choose Folder Move All Messages to Trash. You can use Folder Delete Folder to remove a folder and all its messages and subfolders.
target: Ukuba ufuna ukucacisa yonke imiyalezo ngaphandle kwencwadi khetha i Incwadi eneenkcukacha Engenanto.Yonke imiyalezo kwincwadi ekhethiweyo izakusiwa kweyomonakalo.Ukuba incwadi ekhethiweyo yi umonakalo incwadi eneenkcukacha,yonke imiyalezo izakucinywa ngokupheleleyo.

input: The Folder Icons section lets you choose icons that are different from the default ones in the folder list.
target: I Iimpahla icandelo likuvumela uqwalasele njani nanini imiyalezo ithunyelwa.

input: After using kmail for a while,you may find that you have trouble sorting out the new messages in your inbox when they arrive. Filters allow you to automatically perform certain actions on incoming messages and to manually perform actions on selected messages in a folder.
target: Emva kokusebenzisa i kmail ixesha elithile,ungafumana ukuba unengxaki yokulungisa imiyalezo emitsha kwibhokisi yakho yangaphakathi xa zifika.Amacebo okucoca akuvumela wenze ngokuzenzekelayo iintshukumo ezithile kwimiyalezo engenayo nokwenza iintshukumo ngokwencwadi kwimiyalezo ekhethiweyo kwincwadi eneenkcukacha.

input: Filters are considered one after the other,starting with the first filter in the list. The first one whose pattern matches the given message gets executed you can request that the remaining filters also be applied,but the default is to stop processing at the first matching filter.
target: Amacebo aqwalaselwa elinye emva kwelinye,uqala ngelokuqala kuluhlu.Elokuqala elinomlinganiselo othelekisekayo nomyalezo onikiweyo uyaphunyezwa.Ungacela ukuba amacebo asaleleyo anokufakwa nawo,kodwa okungagqibekanga kukumisa uqhubekeko kwicebo elithelekisekayo.

input: When creating a filter on mailing list messages this method will try really hard to find a criterion that uniquely identifies messages from that list If it succeeds,the guessed name of the list is presented in the Message Create Filter Filter on Mailing-List... menu entry.
target: Into enika umdla malunga nale ndlela kukuba ukwenza icebo lokucoca kuluhlu lokuposa lizakuzama ngenene nzima ukufumana i header eqwalasela kanye iiposi kolo luhlu.Ukuba iyaphumelela,igama elithekelelwayo loluhlu linikwa kwi Umyalezo Yenza icebo lokucoca Icebo lokucoca Kuluhlu- Lokuposa.ungeno lwe menu.

input: The second method is to manually construct a filter from scratch by calling the filter dialog through Settings Configure Filters.... The filter dialog is described in detail in the following subsection.
target: Indlela yesibini kukulungisa icebo lokucoca ekuqaleni ngoku biza incoko yababini yecebo lokucoca ngapha kwe Izicwangciso Qwalasela Amacebo okucoca.Incoko yababini yecebo lokucoca ichazwe ngokwenkcukacha kwicandelo elisezantsi elilandelayo.

input: This dialog allows you to manage and edit your list of filters.
target: Oku kukuvumela ukuba uphathe kwaye uhlele uluhlu lwakho lwamacebo okucoca.

input: You can reach it either via Message Create Filter or Settings Configure Filters....
target: Ufikelele kuyo noba ugqitha i Umyalezo Yenza Icebo lokucoca okanye Izicwangciso Qwalasela Amacebo okucoca.

input: The dialog is divided into four main sections
target: Incoko yababini yahlulwe kumacandelo angundoqo amane
Into ethathwa njengegweba Icebo lokucoca ulwelo

input: You can click on More to get an additional initially empty rule if you want to define more-complex patterns and on Fewer to remove the last rule. Clear clears the pattern,ie it removes all but two rules from screen and resets those two.
target: You can click on More to get an additional initially empty rule if you want to define more complex patterns and on Fewer to remove the last rule.Clear clears the pattern,ie it removes all but two rules from screen and resets those two.

input: In this group you can edit the list of actions that are applied to all messages that match the defined filter criteria. See Filter Actions below for a detailed description of each action type.
target: Kweli qela ungahlela uluhlu lweentshukumo olufakwa kuyo yonke imiyalezo ethelekiseka nomlinganiselo ochaziweyo wophendlo.Bona Iintshukumo zecebo lokucoca ngezantsi zenkcazelo eneenkcukacha zodidi lwentshukumo ngalunye.

input: You can click on More to get a new,empty action if you want to define more than one action and on Fewer to remove the last action. Clear clears the list,ie it removes all but one action and resets that one.
target: Unganqakraza kwi Ngaphezulu ukufumana entsha,engenanto intshukumo ukuba ufuna ukuchaza ngaphezulu kwenye intshukumo kunye ne Mbalwa ukusyusa intshukumo yokugqibela.Cacisa icacisa uluhlu,ie isusa konke kodwa intshukumo enye kwaye icwangcisa kwakhona leyo.

input: In this group you can define a few advanced options for filters that allow you to refine your filtering.
target: Kweli qela ungachaza iinketho ezimbalwa zaphambili zamacebo okucoca ezikuvumela ukucola ucoco lwakho.

input: Filters are automatically named unless you explicitly rename them using the Rename... button. The dialog assumes that it should continue auto-naming the filter as long as the filter name starts with lt .
target: Amacebo okucoca anikwa amagama ngokuzenzekelayo ngaphandle kokuwanika amagama usebenzisa i Nika igama kwakhona.iqhosha.Incoko yababini icinga ukuba izakuqhubeka ngokunika igama- ngokuzenzekelayo icebo lokucoca nje ukuba igama lecebo liqale nge lt.

input: If you apply filter changes,via OK or Apply,only valid filters are actually copied to the internal filter manager.
target: Ukuba ufaka utshintsho lwecebo lokucoca,ugqitha KULUNGILE okanye Faka,kuphela asebenzayo amacebo okucoca akhutshelweyo ngaphakathi kumphathi wecebo lokucoca.

input: Similarly,empty rules and actions are removed from the pattern and action list respectively,before the filter is saved.
target: Ngokufanayo,imithetho engenanto neentshukumo iyasuswa kumlinganiselo kunye noluhlu lwentshukumo,phambi kokuba icebo lokucoca ligcinwe.

input: The most common use of filters is to filter on the sender of messages this can be done by choosing From. A good bet for a mailing list would be lt recipientsgt ,but there are other criteria a filter can search for note that all patterns are interpreted case-insensitively
target: Umsebenzi oqhelekileyo wamacebo okucoca kumthumeli wemiyalezo.Oku kunokwenziwa ngokukhetha i Kwi.Ubhejo olulungileyo loluhlu lokuposa luzakuba yi lt kubamkeligt.Kodwa kukho ezinye ezithathwa njengesigwebo icebo lokucoca elingaziphendlayo ze

input: Searches the whole message ie headers,body and attachments,if any
target: Iphendla umyalezo wonke ie headers,umzimba nezifakelo,ukuba zikhona.

input: Searches the body of the message ie the whole message except the headers
target: Iphendla umyalezo wonke ie headers,umzimba nezifakelo,ukuba zikhona.

input: Searches the headers of the message
Searches the To and CC header fields of the message
target: Iphendla i Ku ne Cc imihlaba ye header yomyalezo.

input: Sets upper or lower bounds on the message size
target: Icwangcisa imida ephezulu nesezantsi yobungakanani bomyalezo.

input: Sets upper or lower bounds on the message age
target: Icwangcisa imida ephezulu nesezantsi yobudala bomyalezo.

input: Sets restrictions on the status of the message
Searches the header field that is given by that name.
target: Iphendla umhlaba wokubhaliweyo okuphezulu enikwe ngelogama.

input: The most common use of filters is to sort incoming messages to certain folders this can be done by choosing Move into Folder. Here is a list of all possible actions
target: Usebenziso oluqhelekileyo lecebo kukulungisa imiyalezo engenayo kwiincwadi ezineenkcukacha ezithile.Oku kunokwenziwa ngokukhetha i yiya kwincwadi eneenkcukacha.Nalu uluhlu lweentshukumo ezinokwenzeka

input: This will file the message into another folder,removing it from its current folder if necessary you cannot,currently use imap folders as a target.
target: Oku kuzakusa umyalezo kwenye incwadi eneenkcukacha.Eyangoku ayinaku sebenzisa IMAP iincwadi ezinenkcukacha njengetekeni.

input: This will copy the message to another folder.
target: Izakubonisa kwakhona umyalezo kwenye idilesi ye email.

input: This will set the identity that will be used if you reply to this message.
target: Oku kuzakucwangcisa eyakho uqwalaselo ukuba uphendula kulo myalezo.

input: This allows you to mark the message as read or important flagged,but also as forwarded,replied,etc
target: Oku kukuvumela ukuphawula umyalezo njengofundo okanye okubalulekileyo enendwe,kodwa kwakhona isiwe phambili,yaphendulwa,etc

input: This will set the method of transport eg SMTP that will be used if you reply to the message.
target: Oku kuzakucwangcisa indlela yezithuthi eg SMTP ukuba uphendula kumyalezo.

input: This will modify the Reply-To field of this message. This can be useful for mailing lists that automatically set a Reply-To which you do not like.
target: Izakuguqula kancinane i Phendula- Ku umhlaba walo myalezo.Oku kunokuba luncedo kuluhlu loposo olucwangcisa ngokuzenzekelayo Phendula- Ku ongayithandiyo.

input: This will redirect the message as-is to another email address.
target: Izakubonisa kwakhona umyalezo kwenye idilesi ye email.

input: Will try to return a message to the sender that indicates successful delivery of their message,if the sender requested that.
target: Izakuzama ukubuyisela umyalezo kumthumeli owalathisa ngempumelelo uphathelo lomyalezo wakhe okanye wakhe.

input: This action allows you to select who will get delivery receipts from you. Though you can globally enable the sending of delivery confirmations in the Configure kmail ... dialog Security page we recommended not to send them to everyone,since this makes tracking of spam messages,for example,very easy for the sender.
target: Le ntshukumo ikuvumela ukhethe ozakufumana iirisiti zophathelo kuwe.Noxa ungenza uqinisekiso lothumelo lophathelo kwi Qwalasela kmail.incoko yababini Ukhuseleko iphepha siyaleza ukungazithumeli kuwo wonke umntu,ukusukela ukuba oku kwenza uphawulo lwezinto ezinjenge spam ilula kakhulu kumthumeli.

input: This currently only works if the message has at least one attachment. No,not even percnt 0 will work in the general case
target: Oku kusebenza ngoku ukuba umyalezo une noko enye ufakelo.Hayi,noba percnt 0 izakusebenza kumzekelo ngokubanzi

input: You can enter arbitrarily-complex shell commands here,since kmail uses a sub shell to execute the command line therefore,even this command will work within its limits uudecode -o mktemp kmail-uudecoded. XXXXXX amp echo '\\a
target: Ungafaka imiyalelo yeqokobhe enegama apha,ukusukela ukuba i kmail isebenzisa iqokobhe elisezantsi ukuphumeza ilayinim yomyalelo.Ngoko ke,noba lo myalelo uzakusebenza kwimida yayo uudecode - o mktemp kmail- uudecoded.XXXXXX amp echo a

input: Be cautious with this action,as it will easily mess up your messages if the filter program returns garbage or extra lines.
target: Lumka ngale ntshukumo,njengoko izakonakalisa eyakho imiyalezo ukuba udweliso lwenkqubo yecebo lokucoca lubuyisela inkunkuma okanye iilayini ezingaphezulu.

input: Will remove all header fields with the given name from the message. This is useful mainly for removing bogus Reply-headers.
target: Izakususa zonke imihlaba ye header ngegama elinikwe kum,yalezo.Oku kuluncedo kakhulu ekususeni i bogus Phendula- Ku iiheader.

input: Analogous restrictions as in the add header action apply here,too.
target: Imida engqongo njengakwi dibanisa iheader intshukumo iyafakwa apha,nayo.

input: Open up the Settings Configure Filters... dialog and click the New icon below the Available Filters list.
In the Filter Criteria area,type Priority in the text field of the first drop-down box,and type urgent in the text field of the second drop-down box.
target: Kwi Into ethathwa ngegweba icebo lokucoca ariya,khetha i lt abamkeligt kwi menu yotsalo- phantsi lokuqala,iqulathe kwi menu yotsalo- phantsi lwesibini,nodidi kde lists.netcentral.net kumhla wokubhaliweyo.

input: Skip down to the Filter Actions area. Select Mark As from the first drop-down box. A new drop-down box containing a list of marker flags is shown to the right. Select Important from the drop-down box.
target: Tsiba phantsi icandelo lweentshukumo.Khetha i yiya kwincwadi eneenkcukacha kwimenu yotslao- phantsi lokuqala.Imenu entsha yotsalo- phantsi equlathe uluhlu lweencwadi ezinenkcukacha izakuvela.Khetha incwadi eneenkcukacha ofuna imiyalezo ecociweyo ithunyelwe kuyo ukuba ziyathelekiseka nogwebo olukhethileyo.Kulo mzekelo,ungakhetha i KDE- Ngokubanzi kwimenu yotsalo- phantsi.

input: If that does not work,think of a unique way of identifying the messages you want to filter. The almost unique property of my kde List messages is that they always contain kde kde.field. It is only almost unique,because this fails for cross-posted messages.
target: Ukub aoko akusebenzi,cinga ngndlela eyodwa yokuqwalasela imiyalezo ofuna ukuyicoca.E phantse impahla eyodwa yeyam i kde Dwelisa imiyalezo esoloko iqulathe i kde lists.netcentral.net kwi Ku okanye Cc umhlaba Iphantse yayodwa kuphela,kuba oku akuphumeleli kwimiyalezo eposwa- ngokunqamleza.

input: Press the New button to create an empty filter. It will appear as lt unknowngt .
target: Cinezela i Entsha iqhosha ukwenza elingenanto icebo lokucoca.Izakuvela njenge lt engenagamagt.

input: In the Filter Criteria area,select lt recipientsgt from the first drop-down box,contains from the second drop-down box,and type kde kde. org in the text field.
target: Kwi Into ethathwa ngegweba icebo lokucoca ariya,khetha i lt abamkeligt kwi menu yotsalo- phantsi lokuqala,iqulathe kwi menu yotsalo- phantsi lwesibini,nodidi kde lists.netcentral.net kumhla wokubhaliweyo.

input: Skip down to the Filter Actions section. Select file into folder from the first drop-down box. A new drop-down box containing a list of folders will appear. Select the folder that you want the filtered messages to be transferred to. For this example,you would select KDE-General from the drop-down box.
target: Tsiba phantsi icandelo lweentshukumo.Khetha i yiya kwincwadi eneenkcukacha kwimenu yotslao- phantsi lokuqala.Imenu entsha yotsalo- phantsi equlathe uluhlu lweencwadi ezinenkcukacha izakuvela.Khetha incwadi eneenkcukacha ofuna imiyalezo ecociweyo ithunyelwe kuyo ukuba ziyathelekiseka nogwebo olukhethileyo.Kulo mzekelo,ungakhetha i KDE- Ngokubanzi kwimenu yotsalo- phantsi.

input: Open up the Configure Filters... window and select the filter you just created.
target: Vula i Qwalasela Amacebo okucoca.window kwaye khetha icebo lokucoca olenzileyo nje.

input: Since you want to filter all messages that have kde kde.field and that are from Fred,check the Match all of the following radio button.
target: Ukusukela ukuba ufuna yonke imiyalezo ene kde lists.netcentral.net kwi Ku okanye Cc umhlaba ne avela ku Fred,khangela i Thelekisa zonke ezilandelayo iqhosha lonomathotholo.

input: Now,go to the second search rule and select the following from the pull-From,contains. Now,type fj anywhere. com in the text field.
target: Ngoku,yiya kowesibini umthetho wophendlo kwaye khetha okulandelayo kwii menu zotsalo- phantsi Kwi,iqulathe.Ngoku,chwetheza i fj anywhere.com kumhlaba wokubhaliweyo.

input: You now have a filter that transfers all kde List messages that are from fj anywhere. com.
target: Ngoku unecebo lokucoca oluthumela zonke i kde Dwelisa imiyalezo evela kwi fj anywhere.com.

input: Check the order of your filters
If you want to verify that your filters work as intended,you can open a viewer for the filter log via Tools Filter Log Viewer....
Be careful with the Delete mail from server option since once a mail is deleted on the server there is no way to get it back.
target: Yiba nenyameko Cima iposi kumncedisi ukuba awufuni ukushiya imiyalezo yakho kumncedisi emva kokuba uyilayishe ezantsi.
Qwlasela Icebo lokucoca ulwelo le Pop Incoko yababini

input: To check for messages from a particular account,use the File Check Mail In submenu to select the account to check for mail. You can also press the mouse button on the Check Mail icon for some time to get a list of accounts.
target: Ukukhangela imiyalezo kwityala elithile,sebenzisa i Ifayile Khangela iposi kwi.imenu esezantsi ukukhetha ityala ukukhangela iposi.Ungacinezela kwakhona iqhosha le mouse kwi Khangela Iposi icon ngexesha elithile ukufumana uluhlu lwamatyala.

input: Signing and Encrypting Messages with PGP or GnuPG
target: Ityikitya Ufihle Imiyalezo nge PGP okanye GnuPG

input: Please also check out the FAQ item about PGP.
target: Nceda khangela kwakhona phandle i FAQ umba malunga PGP.

input: kmail expects that your PGP binary is called pgp in the case of GnuPG,it expects the binary to be called gpg. If this is not the case for you,just make a symlink.
target: kmail ilindela ukuba esakho PGP okubini kubizwa ngokuba pgp.Kumzekelo we GnuPG,ilindela okubini kubizwe gpg.Ukuba asingomzekelo wakho,yenza nje i symlink.

input: Select the OpenPGP tab on the Security settings page there you will find the following options
target: Ngenisa eyakho PGP uqwalaselo lomsebenzisi kumhlaba wohambelwano lwe Uqwalaselo izicwangciso.Ngokuy khetha i PGP tab kwi Ukhuseleko iphepha lezicwangciso.Apho uzakufumana iinketho ezilandelayo

input: Here you can choose if you want to use PGP,GnuPG or no encryption software at all of course,the program you select has to be installed on your system it is also important to select the correct version.
target: Apha ungakhetha ukuba ufuna ukusebenzisa i PGP,GnuPG okanye akukho zixhobo zecomputer zoguqulelo kwi khowudi nakanye.Kunjalo udweliso lwenkqubo olukhethayo luzakufakwa kwindlela yakho.Kubalulekile kwakhona ukukhetha uguqulelo kolunye ulwimi olululo.

input: If this option is off and you want to send an encrypted message to somebody,then you cannot read this message any longer after you have composed and encrypted it. Turn this option on to keep sent encrypted messages readable for you too.
target: Ukuba olukhetho lucimile kwaye ufuna ukuthumela umyalezo ofihliweyo komnye umntu,ngoku awunakufunda lo myalezo nakanye emva kokuba uqambe kwaye wayifihla.Qala olu khetho ukugcina imiyalezo ethunyelwe ifihliwe efundekayo kuwe.

input: Show signed encrypted text after composing
This will show you the result of encrypting and signing before the message gets sent this way,you can still cancel sending if encrypting failed. It is strongly recommended to use this option.
target: Oku kuzakubonisa iziphumo zofihlo kwaye zityikitya phambi kokuba umyalezo ufumane uthumelo.Le ndlela ungacima uthumelo ukuba ufihlo aluphumelelanga.Yaziswa ngamandla ukusebenzisa olu khetho.

input: This lets you toggle whether to automatically sign your messages by default of course,it is still possible to send unsigned messages by deselecting the icon in the composer window.
target: Tyikitya ngokuzenzekelayo imiyalezo usebenzisa i OpenPGP ikuvumela uqhoboshe noba utyikitye ngokuzenzekelayo imiyalezo yakho ngokungagqibekanga.Kunjalo ungangakhethi i icon kwi window yomqambi yomyalezo ngamnye ukuba kuyimfuneko.

input: As mentioned above,you will not be able to read your own encrypted sent messages if you do not check Always encrypt to self in the settings' Security page.
target: Njengoko kukhankanyiwe ngasentla,awunakwazi ukufunda iiposi zakho ezifihliweyo ukuba awukhangeli i Soloko ufihla kuyo kwisicwangciso Ukhuseleko iphepha.Kodwa qhaphela ukuba isitshixo sakho asibhalwanga kuluhlu Uvumo Lwesitshixo Soguqulelo kwi khowudi incoko yababini nokuba olokhetho lucwangcisiwe.

input: Prepare a message to the person to whom you want to send your public key then,choose,in the composer window's menu,this will attach the public key you defined for the current identity to the message. Now you can send the message.

input: Welcome to kate ,a programmer's text editor for kde version 4 and above. Some of kate 's many features include configurable syntax highlighting for languages ranging from C and C to HTML to bash scripts,the ability to create and maintain projects,a multiple document interface MDI,and a self-contained terminal emulator.
target: Wamkelekile ku kate,umhleli wokubhaliweyo wabadwelisi we kde uguqulelo 2.2 na ngaphezulu.Eminye ye kate imisebenzi emininzi iquka isivakalisi esiqwalaselweyo uphawulo lwelwimi ukusuka ku C no C ukuya HTML ukunqgubanisa izishicilelo,indlela yokwenza nokulondoloza iiprojekti,oluninzi ujongano loxwebhu MDI,noziqulathe- ngokwakhe umlinganisi wendlela yesiphelo.

input: But kate is more than a programmer's editor. Its ability to open several files at once makes it ideal for editing UNIX 's many configuration files. This document was written in kate .
target: Kodwa kate ingaphezu komhleli wabadwelisi.Yindlela yokuvula ezininzi iifayile kubekanye kuyenza ilungele ukuhlela UNIX ezininzi iifayile zoqwalaselo.Olu xwebhu labhalwa kwi kate.

input: KParts - the building blocks of koffice
The alternative to this is KParts.let every application do what it does best.
target: Uhambelwano koku yi KParts.Ifilosofi yayo ilula vumela zonke izicelo zenze okungcono.

input: With KParts,your documents can use all functionality offered by all koffice applications. You can take advantage of this by inserting so-called parts into your document. Every one of those parts is essentially another document,that is,a document within a document.
target: Nge KParts,amaxwebhu wakho angasebenzisa i zonke umsebenzi onikiweyo yi zonke koffice izicelo.Ungathatha ingqalelo yoku ngokufaka ebizwa- ngokuba yi amaqela kuxwebhu lwakho.Wonke ubani walo maqela lolunye uxwebhu,yi,uxwebhu phakathi koxwebhu.

input: If you have never worked with compound documents,you may find them confusing at first. The following step-by-step instructions show you that using KParts is just as easy as working with a single application.

input: While koffice automatically can handle all X11 fonts on screen,on most systems,printing is done via ghostscript. Now,while koffice knows the font names used by X-Window ,it does normally not know the font names used by ghostscript. koffice tries to guess these names,which unfortunately does n't work all of the time.
target: Xa koffice ingaphatha ngokuzenzekelayo yonke imigca ye X11 kwi khusi,ushicilelo lungadala ingxaki kwiindlela ezininzi,ushicilelo lwenziwa ngokugqitha kwi ghostscript.Ngoku,xa koffice iwazi amagama omgca osetyenziswa yi X Windows,ayi ngesiqhelo hayi yazi amagama omgca osetyenziswa yi ghostscript.koffice izama ukuthelekelela la magama,apho ngelishwa angasebebnzi lonke ixesha.

input: An alias in the ghostscript Fontmap
While koffice comes out of the box with a GUI graphical user interface that should suit most people's needs,there are good reasons why you may want to change the way the programs look.

input: My mother,for example,is a bit afraid of buttons and menu entries she does n't understand. To tailor koffice to her needs,I reduced the GUI to a bare minimum of functionality. As she only needs to write letters and use certain templates,there is no need for much more functionality than saving,loading,printing,etc

input: This handbook describes kdeprint . kdeprint is not a standalone program. It is the new printing framework for kde 2.2. kdeprint is an intermediate layer between kde or other applications and the selected and installed print subsystem of your OS OS .
target: Lencwadi yesandla ichaza i kdeprint.kdeprint asiyonkqubo yakuma wedwa.Lushicilelo olutsha lomsebenzi wesakhelo lwe kde 2.2.kdeprint lulwaleko oluphakathi phakathi kwe kde isicelo nekhethiweyo nefakiweyo indlela yoshicilelo esezantsi yendlela yakho Yokusebenza OS.

input: It should be noted that both the developer of this application,and the author of this document are most familiar with CUPS as a printing system. At the time of writing,CUPS is the best supported printing subsystem,and it is the best documented.
target: Inokuqatshelwa into yokuba umbhekisi phambili wesi sicelo,nombhali wolu xwebhu baqhelene ne CUPS njenge ndlela yoshicilelo.Ngexesha lokubhala,CUPS yengcono indlela esezantsi yoshicilelo exhaswayo,kwaye yengcono elixwebhu.

input: This handbook is a work in progress,and later versions of the kdeprint software and editions of this handbook will support and explore more closely other printing systems.
target: Lencwadi yesandla engumsebenzi oqhubekayo,nenguqulelo zamva ze kdeprint izixhobo zecomputer namahlelo ale ncwadi yesandla azakuxhasa kwaye ziveze ngokusondeleneyo kakhulu ezinye iindlela zoshicilelo.

input: In the meantime,even if your printing subsystem is not yet well covered,you are encouraged to explore the Printing Manager module in kcontrol ,and you will find its operation to hopefully be fairly self evident,no matter what printing subsystem you use.
target: Ngokwelithuba,noba indlela esezantsi yoshicilelo ayigqitywanga kakuhle,uyakhuthazwa ukuvelisa i Umphathi Woshicilelo umnqongo kwi kcontrol,kwaye uzakufumana olwayo usebenzo ukuthemba ukuba nobungqina obubobakho,akukhathaliseki nokuba yeyiphi indlela esezantsi yoshicilelo oyisebenzisayo.

input: All of the most often used features and functions CUPS provides are supported in kdeprint .

target: Shicilela iinketho zolawulo olupheleleyo ezinikezwe yi CUPS.

input: Where to find help when using CUPS
target: Ungalufumana phi uncedo xa usebenzisa i CUPS

input: CUPS is accessible through other means than kdeprint commandline and browser are two native CUPS interfaces. The many commandline utilities add up to the most complete control you have on CUPS . The web interface is only a subset of all available configuration or control options.
target: CUPS iyanikezwa ngapha kwezinye iindlela kune kdeprint ilayini yomyalelo nomkhangeli zezobuhlanga ezimbini i CUPS injongano.Ezininzi izinto eziluncedo zelayini yomyalelo zidibanisa kulawulko olugqityiweyo onalo kwi CUPS.Ujongano lwe web liqela elisezantsi kuphela zoqwalaselo lonke olukhoyo okanye iinketho zolawulo.

input: This is also true for kdeprint . Generally,as CUPS develops,most new features will first be implemented through the commandline. Be sure to check the latest versions of the man pages for CUPS to stay up-to-date with new features after you install a new version.
target: Oku kuyinyaniso kwi kdeprint.Ngokubanzi,njenge CUPS ibhekisa phambili,emininzi imisebenzi emitsha ezakuqala yenziwe ngapha kwelayini yomyalelo.Qiniseka ukukhangela iinguqulelo ezidlulileyo zamaphepha omntu we CUPS uku hlala- ku- mhla ngemitsha imisebenzi emva kokufaka inguqulelo entsha.

input: Depending on your update method for CUPS ,your active configuration file might not have been re-placed by a new one thus your new,more capable CUPS -daemon might not have been told by the old configuration file about the new features to use.
target: Kuxhomekeka kwindlela yakho yokugqiba ye CUPS,esebenzayo yakho ifayile yoqwalselo isenokuba khange ibuyi- selwe ngentsha ngoko eyakho entsha,esebenza kakhulu CUPS - daemon isenokuba zange ixelelwe ngendala ifayile yoqwalaselo malunga nemisebenzi emitsha ezakusetyenziswa.

input: Outside kdeprint Hints Tips Tricks with CUPS on the Commandline
target: Ngaphandle kdeprint Othsuphe Iincam Amaqhinga nge CUPS kwi layini yomyalelo

input: Here are a few examples of options that are presently only available if you use the commandline.
target: Nantsi imizekelo embalwa yeenketho ngoku ezikhoyo ukuba usebenzisa ilayini yomyalelo.

input: Allowing or denying printer access for certain users
target: Ivumela okanye ikhanyela unikezelo lomshicileli kubasebenzisi abathile

input: When installing or modifying a printer through the command line,you can either deny or allow the usage of that printer to certain users
target: Xa ufaka okanye uguqula kancinane umshicileli ngapha kwelayini yomyalelo,ungakhanyela okanye uvumele usebenziso lwalo mshicileli kubasebenzisi abathile

input: lpadmin -p HeidelbergDigimaster9110 - 10.160.16.99 mqueue -kurt,sylvi,hansjoerg -E -P home kurt PPDs DVHV. ppd
target: lpadmin - p HeidelbergDigimaster9110 - v lpd 10.160.16.99 mqueue - u allow kurt,sylvi,hansjoerg - E - P home kurt PPDs DVHV.ppd

input: lpadmin -p HeidelbergDigimaster9110 - 10.160.16.99 mqueue -tackat,boss,waba -E -P home kurt PPDs DVHV. ppd
target: lpadmin - p HeidelbergDigimaster9110 - v lpd 10.160.16.99 mqueue - u deny tackat,boss,waba - E - P home kurt PPDs DVHV.ppd

input: will deny the usage of this same printer to the three mentioned users and at the same time allow it to all others. If denied user wants to print on the DigiMaster via this CUPS server,he will receive an error message along the lines client-error-not-possible.
target: izakukhanyela usebenziso lwalo umnye umshicileli kwabathathu abakhankanyiweyo abasebenzisi ngexesha elinye yivumele kwabanye.Ukuba i ikhanyelwe umsebenzisi ufuna ukushicilela kwi DigiMaster ugqitha oku CUPS umncedisi,uzakwamkela umyalezo wemposiso ngapha kwelayini imposiso- yomxhasi- aye- nzeki.

input: Only one of the two options may be used at one time at present there is no support to have a similar option in a per-group based way. This will be implemented in the future.
target: Lunye kuphela ukhetho kwiinketho ezimbini olunokusetyenziswa ngexesha elinye okwangoku akukho nkxaso ukuba nenketho efanayo ngokwe- qela lwendlela esekiweyo.Oku kuzakwenziwa kwixesha elizayo.

input: Sometimes you want to impose quotas for certain printers. With quotas you can set upper limits for the number of pages or the amount of data to be printed over a certain period to a certain printer.
target: Ngamanye amaxesha ufuna ukubeka iquotas zabashicileli abathile.Nge quotas ungacwangcisa imida ephezulu yenani lamaphepha okanye ixabiso lwedata ezakushicilelwa ngapha kwethuba elithile ukuya kumshicileli othile.

input: Quotas can be set with the -o option when installing a printer with the lpadmin command,or afterwards for an already existing printer. Following are some guidelines which are missing at the time of writing in the,official CUPS documentation
target: Quotas zingacwangciswa nge - o option xa ufaka umshicileli nge lpadmin umyalelo,okanye emva koko kosele ekhona umshicileli.Okulandelayo zezinye iilayini zokwalathisa ezilahlekileyo ngexesha lokubhalwa kwi,eye ofisi CUPS uxwebhu

input: With CUPS you may have pagecount- and filesize-based quotas for individual printers.
target: Nge CUPS unokuba nobalo lwephepha - nobungakanani bephepha- elisekwe kwi quotas yabashicileli ababodwa.

input: Quotas are calculated for each user individually so a single set of limits applies to all users for the printer concerned.
target: Quotas zibalelwa umsebenzisi ngamnye ngokwakhe ngoko iqela elilodwa lwemida lifakwa kubo bonke abasebenzisi bomshicileli owaziwayo.

input: Quotas include banner pages if those are used.
target: Quotas ziquka amaphepha amalaphu anomyalezo ukub aezo ziyasetyenziswa.

input: you can limit every user to 20 pages per day on an expensive printer,but you cannot limit every user except Kurt or root.
target: Oku kuthetha unganqamla umsebenzisi ngamnye kumaphepha ayi 20 ngemini koxabisa phezulu umshicileli,kodwa awunakunqamla umsebenzi ngamnye ngaphandle kwe Kurt okanye ingcambu.

input: There are job-k-limit,job-page-limit,and job-quota-period options to give when setting up a printer.
target: Kukho i umsebenzi- k- umda,umsebenzi- iphepha- umda,ne umsebenzi- quota- ithuba iinketho ukunika xa ucwangcisa umshicileli.

input: job-quota-period sets a time interval for quota computing intervals are determined in seconds so a day is 60x60x2486.400,a week is 60x60x24x7604,800,and a month is 60x60x24x302.592.000 seconds.
target: umsebenzi- quota- ithuba icwangcisa ixesha lokuphumla le quota computing amathuba agqitywa kwimizuzwana,ngoko imini yi 60x60x2486.400,iveki yi 60x60x24x7604,800,ne nyanga yi 60x60x24x302.592.000 imizuzwana.

input: For quotas to be enforced,the time-period plus at least one job-limit must be set to non-zero.
target: Ukuze iquotas zinyanzelwe,ixesha- ithuba ne noko omnye umsebenzi- womda kufunekwa ucwangciswe kwengenge- nothi.

input: The default value of 0 for job-k-limit specifies that there is no limit.
target: Ixabiso elingagqibekanga lika 0 we umsebenzi- k- umda ikhankanya ukuba akukho mda.

input: The default value of 0 for job-page-limit specifies that there is no limit.
target: Ixabiso elingagqibekanga lika 0 we umsebenzi- iphepha- umda ikhankanya ukuba akukho mda.

input: The default value of 0 for job-quota-period specifies that the limits apply to all jobs that have been printed by a user that are still known to the system.
target: Ixabiso lokungagqibekanga lo 0 we umsebenzi- quota- ithuba ikhankanya ukuba imida ifakwa kuyo yonke imisebenzi eshicilelweyo ngumsebenzisi eyaziwayo kwindlela yakho.

input: Working,as both,time-period plus one or both job-limits are defined
target: Iyasebenza,zombini,ixesha- ithuba ne enye okanye yomibini eyomsebenzi- imida ichaziwe
lpadmin - p danka infotec 4850 - o job- quota- period604800 - o umsebenzi- k- umda1024

input: This sets a limit of a file size of 1 MB in total for each user of existing printer dankainfotec4850 during one week.
target: Oku kucwangcisa umda wobungakanani befayile we 1 MB ewonke kumsebenzi ngamnye wo mshicileli okhoyo danka infotec 4850 ngeveki enye.
lpadmin p danka infotec 4105 - o job- quota- period604800 - o umsebenzi- wephepha- umda100

input: This sets a limit of 100 pages in total for each user of existing printer dankainfotec4105 during one week.
target: Oku kucwangcisa umda wamaphepha ayi 100 ewonke kumsebenzisi ngamnye womshicileli okhoyo danka infotec 4105 ngeveki enye.
lpadmin - p danka infotec P450 - o job- quota- period604800 - o job- k- limit1024 - o job- page- limit100

input: This sets a combined limit of 1 MB in total and 100 pages in total for each user of existing printer dankainfotecP450 during one week. Whichever limit is reached first will take effect.
target: Oku kucwangcisa umda odityanisiweyo we 1 MB iuwonke namaphepha ayi 100 e wonke kumsebenzisi ngamnye womshicileli okhoyo danka infotec P450 ngeveki enye.Umda ngamnye ofikelelwayo kuqala uzakuthatha isiphumo.

input: NOT working,as only one,time-period or job-limit is defined
target: HAYI iyasebenza,njegekuphela enye,ixesha- ithuba okanye umda- womsebenzi uchaziwe

input: lpadmin -p dankainfotecP320 -o job-quota-period604800 lpadmin -p dankainfotecFullColor -o job-page-limit100 lpadmin -p dankainfotecHiSpeed -o job-k-limit1024
target: lpadmin - p danka infotec P320 - o job- quota- period604800 lpadmin - p danka infotec FullColor - o job- page- limit100 lpadmin - p danka infotec HiSpeed - o job- k- limit1024

input: Once a user reaches his quota limit,he'll get a client-error-not-possible message,if he wants to print.
target: Xa umsebenzisi efikelela kumda we quota yakhe,uzakufumana i umxhasi- imposiso- aye- nzeki umyalezo,ukuba ufuna ukushicilela.

input: There are different ways to define a raw printer. One comfortable one is to use the lpadmin command. Just do n't define a PPD file to be used for that printer and it will be a raw one
target: Kukho iindlela ezahlukileyo ukuchaza i ekrwada umshicileli.Enye ethambileyo kukusebenzisa i lpadmin umyalelo.Sukuchaza nje i PPD ifayile ezakusetyenziswa kulo mshicileli kwaye izakuba yekrwada
lpadmin - p Raw Danka infotec - E - v lpd 10.160.16.137 PORT1

input: This section of the kdeprint Handbook will live from the readers' feedback. Here is just a small beginning.
target: Eli candelo le kdeprint Incwadi yesandla izakuhlala kubafundi bengxelo.Nasi isiqalo esincinane.

input: What does the error client-error-bad-request mean
target: Ithetha ntoni umxhasi- imposiso- esibi- isicelo semposiso

input: The user sent a file to the CUPS which the server could not process. You get this also upon sending an empty file.
target: Umsebenzisi uthumele ifayile kwi CUPS apho umncedisi angenaku qhubekeka.Ufumana oku kuthumelo lwe engenanto ifayile.

input: User is either not allowed to print to a certain printer or has achieved his quota based on file size and or page number
target: Umsebenzisi akavumelekanga ukushicilela kumshicileli othile okanye wenze eyakhe iquota esekwe kubungakanani befayile ne okanye inani lephepha
Kunjani malunga umxhasi- imposiso- ayi- fumaneki

input: The user tried to access a nonexistent resource on the CUPS server,such as trying to print a nonexistent file,or one that you are denied permission to read.
target: Umsebenzisi uzame ukunikeza elicebo elingekhoyo kwi CUPS umncedisi,njengokuzama ukushicilela ifayile engasekhoyo,okanye enye okhanyelwa imvume yokuyifunda.

input: Why ca n't I re-start my jobs
To be able to re-start your completed jobs from the web interface,you need a setting in the etc cups cupsd.set PreserveJobFiles True.
target: Ukuze ukwazi ukuqala- kwakhona eyakho igqityiwe imisebenzi kujongano lwe web,ufuna isicwangciso kwi etc cups cupsd.conf ifayile iqela PreserveJobFiles True.

input: How do I get rid of the long list of completed jobs in the web interface
target: Ndilufumana njani uluhlu olude lwemisebenzi egqityiweyo kujongano lwe web

input: CUPS does the print accounting by passing nearly every job through the pstops filter. This one does,amongst other things,the page counting. Output of this filter there may be piped into other filters like pstoraster -- rastertopcl or sent to the printer directly if it is a PostScript printer.
target: CUPS ingaba i ishicilela ubalo ngokugqithisa kufutshane umsebenzi ngamnye ngapha kwe pstops icebo.Le yenza,ngaphandle kwezinye izinto,ubalo lwephepha.Imveliso yeli cebo apho inokuba ngumbhobho kwamanye amacebo njenge pstoraster -- rastertopcl okanye yathunyelwa kumshicileli ngqo ukuban yi PostScript umshicileli.

input: on my personal wishlist is a hack of webalizer to read and analyze the pagelog and give a similar output. Anyone
target: Ngendlela kubuntu bam uluhlu lomnqweno yimfumba ye webalizer ukufunda kwaye nokuchaza i page log kwaye inike efanayo imveliso.Nawuphi na umntu

target: Imisebenzi ishicilelwe njenge ekrwada zisoloko zibalwa njengobungakanani belinye iphepha kwaye mhlawumbi amaphepha amaninzi.

input: See the man page for the lpoptions command. You may investigate a CUPS -enabled box about any option of its available printers. There is no need to have the printer installed locally. As long as the printer is available locally through the CUPS printer browsing feature,it will also work remote.
target: Bona iphepha lomntu kwi lpoptions umyalelo.Unga khangela i CUPS - ibhokisi eyenziweyo malunga naluphi na ukhetho lwabashicileli bayo abakhoyo.Akukho mfuneko yokuba nomshicileli ofakiweyo ngobulali.Nje ukuba umshicileli ukhona ngokobulali ngapha kwe CUPS ukhangelo lomshicileli umsebenzi,izakusebenza kwakhona ubekelo kude.

target: Ndilufunda njani udweliso olugcinwa yi lpoptions command

input: Let's take an example. Looking at Hitachi's DDP70 printer and how it implements duplex printing is revealing somehow. How do you tell how to print double sided duplex or Duplex Or another name altogether .
target: Masithathe umzekelo.Ukhangela kwi Hitachi s DDP70 umshicileli nendlela eyenza ngayo ushicilelo kabini oluvela nakanjani.Uyixelela njani ukushicilela amacala amabini kabini okanye Kabini Okanye elinye igama lonke.

input: lpoptions -h transmeta -p HitachiDDP70ClusterPrintingSystem -l BAR grep uplex
target: lpoptions - h transmeta - p Hitachi DDP70 ClusterPrintingSystem - l BAR grep uplex

input: This is to be interpreted like follows
The name of the investigated option is TR-Duplex
target: Igama lokhetho olujongiweyo yi TR- Duplex

input: Behind the slash you see the translation of the option,as it should be shown in a GUI or Web interface Duplex
target: Emva kwesithuba ubona uguqulelo lokhetho,njengoko izakuboniswa kwi GUI okanye Ujongano lwe Web Kabini

input: The option may take one of the two values False or True
target: Ukhetho lungathatha elinye kumaxabiso amabini Bubuxoki okanye Yinyaniso

input: The present setting is True to be recognized by the marking with a star .
target: Isicwangciso esikhoyo yi Yinyaniso ukuqondwa ngokuphawula ngenkwenkwezi .

input: To override the present default setting duplex and print a job in simplex,you need to use the following command
target: Ukuqhub angaphezulu esikhoyo isicwangciso esingagqibekanga kabini kwaye shicilela umsebenzi kokucacileyo,ofuna ukusebenzisa lo myalelo ulandelayo.

input: lpr -P HitachiDDP70ClusterPrintingSystem -o TR-DuplexFalse path to your printjob
target: lpr - P Hitachi DDP70 ClusterPrintingSystem - o TR- DuplexFalse path to your printjob

target: Ndilufumana njani uluhlu olufomatwe kakuhle lweenketho ezikhoyo zonikiweyo umshicileli okanye PPD

target: Sebenzisa i lphelp umyalelo onokufakwa kwindlela yakho yobulali.Akukho phepha lomntu le lphelp.

input: This lists the available options for the named printer. It is nicely formatted and does explain every available option and how to use it. You can query different printers' options at once
target: Oku kudwelisa iinketho ezikhoyo zomshicileli onegama.Ifomatwe kakuhle kwaye ichaza lonke ukhetho olukhoyo nendlela yokulisebenzisa.Ungakhalazela iinketho zabashicileli abohlukeneyo kanye

input: You need to define your print subsystem,before you are able to install any printer with the kdeprint framework.either in kcontrol The Printing Manager section,or directly and on the fly from the print dialog.
target: Ufuna ukuchaza indlela esezantsi yoshicilelo yakho,phambi kokuba ukwazi ukufaka nawuphi na umshicileli nge kdeprint umsebenzi wesakhelo.Kukho ii ariya ezimbini apho ungachaza khona oku noba kwi kcontrol I Umphathi Woshicilelo icandelo,okanye ngqo ne kubhabho kwincoko yababini yoshicilelo.

input: Navigate to K Menu Preferences System Printing Manager. At the bottom you can see a button that lets you select which printing subsystem you want to use. In kde 2.2 you can choose from the following alternatives

target: Kwisiqalo sayo,kdeprint izakuzama ukubhaqa ngokuzenzekelayo.Oku kusebenza kuphela kwi

input: The Print Job Viewer is automatically started by kprinter . It may be docked into the kde panel in the system tray. The Print Job Viewer allows full job management,if supported by the print subsystem.

input: kdeprint uses different modules to realize the interface to the possible print subsystems. Not all the modules are yet developed fully,but you will have basic printing functionality with
target: kdeprint isebenzisa iminqongo eyahlukeneyo ukuqonda ujongano kwiindlela ezisezantsi zoshicilelo ezenzekayo.Ayisiyiyo yonke iminqongo ebhekiswa phambili ngokupheleleyo,kodwa uzakubanoshicilelo olungundoqo lomsebenzi nge

target: Kukho amacebo ambalwa aluncedo asele echazwe phambili.La nga

target: I amaphepha amaninzi ngekhasi icebo lokucoca,

CUPS the Most Important Module in kdeprint
target: CUPS Xhasa Umnqongo obaluleke kakhulu kwi kdeprint

input: qtcups and kups mdash The Predecessors

kups was a graphical wrapper to do the administration tasks for your CUPS server,and the CUPS daemon at the heart of it. You could add,delete,modify,configure,start,and stop printers. You could cancel,delete,move,stop and restart print jobs,and you could change the settings of the daemon,start,stop,and restart it.
target: kups ngumsongi womzobo ukwenza immisebenzi yokwamkela weyakho i CUPS umncedisi,ne CUPS daemon kwintliziyo yayo.Ungadibanisa,ucime,uguqule kancinane,uqwalasele,uqale kwaye uyeke,abashicileli.Ungalahla,ucime,ushukumise,uyeke kwaye uqale kwakhopna imisebenzi yoshicilelo,kwaye ungatshintsha izicwangciso zedaemon,qala,misa,kwaye yiqale kwakhona.

input: The CUPS Module in kdeprint now contains all and more functions that were provided by qtcups and kups in former kde versions.
target: I CUPS Umnqongo kwi kdeprint ngoku iqulathe yonke nemininzi imisebenzi eyanikezwayo yi qtcups ne kups kweyokuqala i kde iinguqulelo.

input: kdeprint 's CUPS module gives you access to a graphical print command,like qtcups did before.
target: kdeprint s CUPS umnqongo ukunika unikezelo kwi umyalelo woshicilelo lomzobo,njenge qtcups zenzile kuqala.

input: The most important improvement in the near future will be a completion of the LPRng plugin. This at present is still very basic. It is restricted to the pure classical LPD part of LPRng.
target: Unyuselo olubalulekileyo kwixesha elizayo elisondeleyo izakubalugqibeko lwe LPRng iplagi.Oku okwangoku kusengundoqo omkhulu.Inomda kwecocekileyo eluhlobo LPD inxenye ye LPRng.

input: Also,you may be able to add printers directly from the print dialog to your system just in time,without going to kcontrol first.
target: Kwakhona,ungakwazi ukudibanisa abashicileli ngqo kwincoko yakho yababini kwindlela yakho nje ngexesha,ngaphandle kokuya kwi kcontrol kuqala.

Plain old LPR support. An LPRng module is in development,and hopefully available for 2.3 release.
target: Engenanto endala LPR inkxaso.I LPRng umnqongo ukubhekiso phambili,kwaye ngethemba ikhona nge 2.3 ukhupho.

target: Abaphathi bomshicileli inkxaso engundoqo ukudibanisa ukususa ukuqwalasela umshicileli,ophawulwe nge RedHat - 6.x iindlela printtool rhs- impahla zamacebo oshicilelo.
