Umnqongo wakhiwe jikelele rlpr Into eluncedo

input: basic operations are supported add remove modify.
target: Abaphathi boshicilelo imisebenzi engundoqo ayixhaswa dibanisa susa guqula kancinane.

input: Each user can predefine the printers he wants to use by specifying the host and related printer queues. Printers are stored on a per user basis. This module is built around the rlpr utility rlpr
target: Umsebenzisi ngamnye angachaza abashicileli abafunayo ukubasebenzisa ngokukhankanya umamkeli nofolo lomshicileli ozalanayo.Abashicileli bagcinwa kwi kwisiseko somsebenzisi.Lo mnqongo wakhelwe jikelele kwi rlpr into eluncedo rlpr

input: kdeprint is a new and revolutionary tool to give easy access to printing services for both kde users and kde developers.
target: kdeprint intsha kwaye isisixhobo esenza utshintsho ukunika olulula unikezelo kwiinkonzo zoshicilelo zazo zombini i kde abasebenzisi ne kde ababhekisi phbambili.

input: You can access the functions of kdeprint through the Printing Manger in the kcontrol ,through the kprinter command or through the dialog that pops up if you want to print.
target: Unganikeza imisebenzi ye kdeprint ngendlela ezahlukeneyo ngapha koMphathi Woshicilelo kwi kcontrol,ngapha kwe kprinter umyalelo okanye ngapha kwencoko yababini ejongayo ukuba ufuna ukushicilela.

input: kdeprint -- Different Usage for Different People
kdeprint has different faces for different people.
What users and administrators can do with kdeprint
target: Bangenza ntoni abasebenzisi nabaphathi nge kdeprint

input: What kde developers can do with it...
target: Abanga kde abangakwenzayo ngayo ababhekisi phambili.

input: kdeprint can use CUPS to support
Querying the LAN for available printers,
Access Control based on IP addresses,net addresses,netmasks,host- and domain names,
target: Ulawulo lonikezelo lusekwe kwi IP iidilesi,iidilesi zomnatha,isigqumathelo zomnatha,umamkeli- namagama ethambeka,

input: and 128-Bit TLS or SSL3 encryption of print data,to prevent eavesdropping,or at least make it much more difficult.
target: ne 128- Bit TLS okanye SSL3 guqulela kwi khowudi lwedata yoshicilelo,ukunqanda ukuwisa i eaves,okanye noko yenze nzima kakhulu.

input: This makes kdeprint a much more robust and reliable solution than using the venerable LPD.
target: Oku kwenza kdeprint esinzi esinzima kwaye esithembekileyo isisombululo kuno kusebenzisa ehoniphekileyo i LPD.

input: Printing is one of the more complicated chapters in IT technology.
target: Ushicilelo sesinye seziqendu ezinzima kwi IT technology.

input: Having to support ten application programs and a dozen printers,meant a system administrator had to deal with 120 drivers. So the development of unified interfaces between programs and printers became an urgent need.
target: Ukuxhasa iinkqubo zesicelo ezilishumi nabashicileli abalishumi elinesibini,kwakuthetha umphathi wendlela ukuba uzakusebenza ngabaqhubi abayi 120.Ngoko ubhekiso phambili lwenjongano ezidityanisiweyo phakathi kweenkqubo nabashicileli kubeyimfuno ekhawulezayo.

input: PostScript in memory - Bitmaps on Paper
PS 100 100 moveto 0 50 rlineto 50 0 rlineto 0 -50 rlineto closepath .7 setgray fill first box over next 160 100 moveto 0 60 rlineto 45 10 rlineto 0 -40 rlineto closepath .2 setgray fill
target: PS 100 100 moveto 0 50 rlineto 50 0 rlineto rlineto umendo okufutshane.5 setgray ugcwaliso ibhokisi yokuqala ngapha elandelayo 160 100 moveto 0 60 rlineto 45 10 rlineto rlineto umendo okufutshane.2 setgray ugcwaliso
RIP Ukusuka ku PostScript ukuya ku Raster

input: Before the final raster images are put on paper cut-sheets,they have to be calculated somehow out of their abstract PostScript representation. This is a very computing-intensive process. It is called the Raster Imaging Process,more commonly RIP.
target: Phambi kwemifanekiso yeraster yokugqibela ibekwe kwiphepha lamakhasi- asikiweyo,azaku balwa ngenye indlela ngaphandle kokuya kwi PostScript umboniso.Oku kuyacomputha- inkqbela ekhoyo ibizwa ngokuba yi Raster Inkqubo Yomfanekiso,iqheleke kakhulu RIP.

input: But what happens,if you are not lucky enough to have a PostScript printer available
target: Kodwa kwenzeka ntoni,ukuba awunathamsanqa ngokwaneleyo ukubane PostScript umshicileli ukhona

input: In other words,as you ca n't rely on the printer to understand and interpret the PostScript itself,the issue becomes quite a bit more complicated. You need software that tries to solve for you the issues involved.
target: Ngamanye amazwi,njengoko ungenakuxhomekeka kunshicileli ukuqonda i PostScript ngokwayo,umba ubanzima noko kakhulu.Ufuna izixhobo zecomputer ezizama ukukusombululela imiba emininzi equkiweyo.

input: PostScript is what most application programs produce for printing in UNIX and Linux . Filters are the true workhorses of any printing system there. Essentially they produce the right bitmaps from any PostScript input for non-PostScript target engines.
target: PostScript kulapho iinkqubo ezininzi zesicelo zivelisa ushicilelo kwi UNIX ne Linux.Amacebo angamahashe okusebenza anyanisileyo azo naluphi na ushicilelo apho.Avelisa ibitmaps ezilungileyo kwi PostScript igalelo lengeyo- PostScipt iinjini zetekeni.

input: Besides the heavy part of the filtering task to generate a print-ready bitmap,this is to line up different jobs from different users for different printers and different filters and send them accordingly to the destinations. The printing daemon takes care of all this.
target: Ngaphandle kweqela elinzima lomsebenzi wokucoca ukujikelezisa ushicilelo- olulungilyo lwe bitmap,naziphi na izixhobo zoshicilelo zifuna ukusebenzisa i SPOOLing ezenzekelayo oku kukulayinisha imisebenzi yabasebenzisi abohlukeneyo babashicileli abohlukeneyo namacebo ohlukeneyo kwaye wathumele ngqo kwiindawo zawo ezingqongileyo.Idaemon yoshicilelo ithatha unonophelo lwako konke oku.

input: How CUPS uses the power of PPD s
target: Uhambo olufutshane Njani CUPS isebenzisa amandla we PPD s

input: PPD s were invented by Adobe to make it easy for manufacturers to implement their own features into PostScript printers,and at the same time retain a standard way of doing so. PPD s are well documented and described by Adobe. Their specification is a de-facto open standard.
target: PPD s ibiyi efakiweyo ngu Adobe ukuyenza lula kubavelisi ukwenza imisebenzi yabo kwi PostScript abashicileli,kwaye ngexesha elinye ibuyisela indlela esezantsi yokwenza oko.PPD s benziwe uxwebhu kakuhle kwaye bachazwe ngu Adobe.Ezabo izikhankanyo yi de- facto evuliweyo esezantsi.

input: Where to get the PPD s for PostScript Printers
target: Ingafumaneka phi i PPD s ye PostScript Abashicileli

input: How Special PPD s are Now Useful Even For Non-PostScript Printers.
target: Ibaluleke njani PPD s Ngoku ziluncedo nakwengeyo- PostScript Abashicileli.

input: Different Ways to get PPD s for non-PostScript Printers
target: Iindlela ezininzi ukufumana i PPD s engeyo- PostScript Abashicileli

input: You can get PPD s to be used with CUPS and non-PostScript printers from different areas in the Web
target: Ungafumana i PPD s ezakusetyenziswa nge CUPS nengeyo- PostScript abashicileli kwi ariya ezahlukeneyo kwi web

input: third,there is the commercial extension to CUPS from the CUPS it is called ESP PrintPro and comes with more than 2.300 printer drivers. There are even improved imagetoraster and pstoraster filters included.
target: okwesithathu,kukho ulwandiso legalelo ukuya kwi CUPS ukusuka kwi CUPS ababhekisi phambili ngokwabo ibizwa ngokuba yi ESP PrintPro kwaye iza neninzi kune 2.300 abaqhubi babashicileli.Kukho ezinyuselweyo zomfanekiso weraster ne pstoraster amacebo aqukiweyo.

input: CUPS makes it really easy for manufacturers to start supporting Linux and UNIX printing for their models at reasonably low cost. The modular framework of CUPS facilitates to plug in any filter driver with minimal effort and to access and utilize the whole printing framework that CUPS is creating.
target: CUPS iyenza ngenene lula kubavelisi ukuqala ukuxhasa i Linux ne UNIX beshicilelela imifanekiso yabo ngexabiso elisezantsi.Umnqongo womsebenzi wesakhelo we CUPS ifakwa kwiplagi nakweliphi icebo driver ngamandla amancinane nokunikeza nokwenza umsebenzi wesakhelo woshicilelo wonke i CUPS eziwenzayo.

input: Read more about the exciting CUPS features in the available CUPS www. cups. org documentation. www. danka. de printpro faq. html. www. linuxprinting. org is a universal repository for all issues related to Linux and UNIX printing.
target: Funda okuninzi malunga nezivuyisayo CUPS imisebenzi kwekhoyo CUPS uxwebhu kwi http www.cups.org documentation.html ne http www.danka.de printrpo faq.html.Kwakhona kwi http www.linuxprinting.org ngumnikezi omnye wemiba yonke ezalana ne Linux ne UNIX ushicilelo.

input: How IPP Support Makes CUPS the Best Choice Around
target: Njani IPP Inkxaso yenza i CUPS ukhetho olungcono jikelele

input: Having seen the development of not just one,but different viable alternatives to venerable BSD -style LPD,Grant Taylor,author of the Linux Printing HOWTO,finally rallied the call LPD Must Die in his Campaign To Abolish The Line Printer Daemon.
target: Xa ubone ubhekiso phambili lokungekho kanye,kodwa eyahlukileyo uhambelwano kwiwonga BSD - uhlobo LPD,Grant Taylor,umbhali we Linux Ishicilela i HOWTO,ibize ndaweninye okokugqibela LPD Kufuneka Ife kweyakhe Ukhankaso Ukutshabalalisha Owelayini Umshicileli Daemon.

input: How the IPP Came to Be
Why IPP is Solving Many Problems
target: Kutheni i IPP Isombulula iingxaki ezininzi

input: IPP promises to solve a lot of problems network administrators face. This trade normally deals with heterogeneous network environments and spends more than half of its working hours dealing with printing problems.
target: IPP ithembisa ukusombulula iingxaki ezininzi zobuso babaphathi bomsebenzi womnatha.Olu shishino lusebenza neemeko- bume zomsebenzi womnatha owahlukeneyo kwaye ochitha ngaphezulu kwecala leeyure zayo zokusebenza ujongene neengxaki zoshicilelo.

input: Basic,Digest,and Certificate Authentication for users seeking access to print services.
target: Engundoqo,Ginya,noBubhali beSiqinisekiso sabasebenzisi abakhangela unikezelo ukushicilela iinkonzo.

input: SSL3 and TLS encryption for transferring data.
target: SSL3 and TLS uguqulela kwi khowudi lokuthumela idata.

input: Bi directional communication of clients with print devices,using the HTTP IPP GET and POST mechanism.
target: Uthungelwano olwalatha kabini lwabaxhasi ngamacebo oshicilelo,usebenzisa i HTTP IPP FUMANA ne POSA ngokukhanda.

input: LDAP directory service integration to keep a consistent database of available printers,their capabilities and page-costs,etc ,as well as user passwords,ACL s etc .
target: LDAP uphawulo lwenkonzo yolawulo ukugcina isiseko sedata esendaweni yabakhoyo abashicileli,imisebenzi yabo namaxabiso- ephepha,etc,njengawo nawo amagama agqithisiweyo omsebenzisi,ACL s etc.

input: Pull as opposed to the usual Push model printing,where a server or printer just needs to be told the URL of a document,whereupon it is retrieved from the resource on the internet and printed.
target: Tsala ngokuchasiweyo kwisiqhelo Tyhala umfanekiso ushicilelo,apho umncedisi okanye umshicileli afuna ukuxelelwa i URL yoxwebhu,apho igcinwayo kwicebo kwi internet kwaye ishicilelwe.

input: Have you ever seen a demonstration about CUPS capabilities in the network You must have been quite impressed if you did n't know in advance what to expect.
target: Sowukhe wawubona umboniso malunga ne CUPS imisebenzi kumsebenzi womnatha Umele ukuba uyaqononondisa ukuba awazanga kwangaphambili okulindeleyo.

input: Your users print,but not a single driver had been installed on the clients,nor a printer queue defined.
target: Ushicilelo lwabasebenzisi bakho,kodwa akukho nomqhubi omnye ofakiweyo ku baxhasi,okanye ufolo lomshicileli ochaziweyo.

input: The answer is not complicated at all.

And more,the clients basically can administer and use any printer they see,just as if it was a locally installed one. Of course,you can set restrictions on it with access control lists etc ,so that not any clients may use any printer as it likes.
target: Ngaphezulu,abaxhasi banga mkela ne sebenzisa nawuphi umshicileli abambonayo,njengokungathi yafakwa ngobulali.Kunjalo,ungacwangcisa imida kuyo ngoluhlu lolawulo lonikezelo etc,ukuze hayi nayiphi abaxhasi bayisebenzise nayiphi umshicileli njengoko ethanda.

input: The clients even are able to print without the appropriate filter or driver installed locally.
target: Abaxhasi bayakwazi ukushicilela ngaphandle kwelona cebo lokucoca okanye umqhubi ufakwe ngokobulali.

input: This way a client prints without needing to install a driver locally.
target: Ngale ndlela umxhasi ushicilela ngaphandle kokufuna ukufaka umqhubi ngokobulali.

input: Any change on the server,such as adding or modifying a printer,is instantly known to the clients with no further configuration.
target: Naluphi na utshintsho kumncedisi,njengokudibanisa okanye ukuguqula kancinane umshicileli,ngoko nangoko yi eyaziwayo kubaxhasi ngaphandle koqwalaselo oluphambili.

input: Some other advanced features built into CUPS are the capacity to do load balancing.
target: Eminye imisebenzi ephambili eyakhelwe kwi CUPS yindawo yokwenza layisha uxhathiso.

Draws a few views of a few ants walking around in a simple maze. Written by Blair Tennessy 2005.
target: Ibonisa imigca embalwe yombhalo ojikeleza jikelele kuhlobo lwamagama esithathu oluqinileyo.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinki.

input: A cellular automaton that is really a two-as the heads ants walk along the screen,they change pixel values in their path. Then,as they pass over changed pixels,their behavior is influenced. en. wikipedia. org wiki Langton27s en. wikipedia. org wiki Turingmachine Written by David Bagley 1997.
target: Imfonomfono ezenzekelayo eneendawo ezimbini zokwenyani Iguqula umatshini njengee ntloko ants zihamba ecaleni kwe khusi,zitshintsha amaxabiso amachatshazana enza umfanekiso kumendo wazo.Ze,njengoko zidlula kumachatshazana enza umfanekiso atshintsiweyo,ukuziphatha kwazo kunikwe amandla.Ibhalwe ngu David Bagley.

input: a fractal packing of circles with smaller circles,demonstrating Descartes's theorem. en. wikipedia. org wiki Apollonian en. wikipedia. org wiki Descartes27theorem Written by Allan R. Wilks and David Bagley 2002.
target: Ipakisha izangqa ezinkulu ngezangqa ezincinane,ibonisa izangqa Zokubonwa njengomthetho Wesangqa se Descartes.Ibhalwe ngu Allan R.Wilks no David Bagley.

input: A 3D animation of a number of sharks,dolphins,and whales. Written by Mark Kilgard 1998.
target: Le yi xfishtank writ enkulu i GL yokwenza impiliso yenani lookrebe,dolphins,no mnenge.Intshukumo yokuqubha ilungile.Iqalwe ukubhalwa ngu Mark Kilgard.

input: Draws a simulation of flying space-combat robots cleverly disguised as colored circles doing battle in front of a moving star field. Written by Jonathan Lin 1999.
target: Izoba uqikelelo lwee robhothi ze space- combat ezibhabhayo zizijika ngobukrelekrele njengezangqa ezinikwe umbala zisenza imfazwe bhambi kwendawo yenkwenkwezi ehambayo.Ibhalwe ngu Jonathan Lin.
Yenza Bomvu Luhlaza njenge sibhaka- bhaka i3D ulwahlulo

input: This draws what looks like a spinning,deforming balloon with varying-sized spots painted on its invisible surface. Written by Jeremie Petit 1997.
target: Oku kuzoba ekhangeleka njengo jikelezo,ibhaloni engagqitywanga ukwakhiwa ngobungakananani- obengxenye bamachaphaza apeyintiweyo kumphandle wayoobanakalayo.Ibhalwe ngu Jeremie Petit.

input: Draws a box full of 3D bouncing balls that explode. Written by Sander van Grieken 2002.
target: Izoba ibhokisi egcwele ziibhola ezibhampayo ezithi ziqhushumbe.Ibhalwe ngu Sander vana Grieken.

input: Draws random color-cycling inter-braided concentric circles. Written by John Neil 1997.
target: Izoba umbala- ojikelezayo jikelele lophotho- olungaphakathi lwezangqa ezinombindi ofanayo.Ibhalwe ngu Johjn Neil.

input: BSOD stands for Blue Screen of Death. The finest in personal computer emulation,BSOD simulates popular screen savers from a number of less robust operating systems. Written by Jamie Zawinski 1998.
target: BSOD imele i Blue Screen of Death.Elona lingano lwe khompyutha yobuqu entle,olu qhubo lulinganisa izigcini zekhusi ezaziwayo ezisuka kwinani elingaphantsi kolomelelo lwe ndlela yokusebenza.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.
X isixhobo sangaphandle sekhompyutha se NCD

input: Draws a stream of rising,undulating 3D bubbles,rising toward the top of the screen,with transparency and specular reflections. Written by Richard Jones 1998.
target: Izoba umphunga wophakamo,wonyuko usehla lwe 3D amaqampu,aphakama ukuza ngasentla kwekhusi,ngeembuyiselo zokukhanya zesibuko esihle.Ibhalwe ng Richard Jones.

input: Do n't hide bubbles when they pop
Draw circles instead of bubble images
target: Zoba izangqa indaweni yamaqampu e pixmap

input: small bubbles appear,and as they get closer to each other,they combine to form larger bubbles,which eventually pop. Written by James Macnicol 1996.

input: This draws Escher's Impossible Cage,a 3d analog of a moebius strip,and rotates it in three dimensions. en. wikipedia. org wiki MauritsCornelisEscher Written by Marcelo Vianna 1998.
target: Oku kuzoba i Impossible Cage,ka Escher,i analog yesithathu yeceba le moebius,ze iyijikelezise kumacala amathathu.Ibhalwe ngu Marcelo Vianna.

input: Generates self-similar linear fractals,including the classic C Curve. en. wikipedia. org wiki LevyCcurve Written by Rick Campbell 1999.
target: Yenza ufano lwayo olufana umgca othe ngqo womlinganiselo we geometry,ukuquka okwamandulo kwe C Curve.Ibhalwe ngu Rick Campbell.

input: Animates a number of 3D electronic components. Written by Ben Buxton 2001.
target: Yenza impiliso zenani leengxenye ze 3D usebenzo ngombane.Ibhalwe ngu Bena Buxton.

input: This draws a compass,with all elements spinning about randomly,for that lost and nauseous feeling. Written by Jamie Zawinski 1999.
target: Oku kuzoba ikhampasi,ngeengxenye ezijikelezayo malunga ngokuthe jikelele,yenzela olo luvo lwe lost and nauseous .Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: Simulates coral growth,albeit somewhat slowly. Written by Frederick Roeber 1997.
target: Ilinganisa okukhulayo okubomvu,i albeit into ethile ecothayo.Lo mfanekiso awenzi ngokwenyani ubulungisa.Ibhalwe ngu Frederick Roeber.

input: Draws a system of self-organizing lines. It starts out as random squiggles,but after a few iterations,order begins to appear. Written by Martin Pool 1999.

input: Moving polygons,similar to a kaleidoscope. See also the Kaleidescope and GLeidescope screen savers. en. wikipedia. org wiki Kaleidoscope Written by Jouk Jansen 1998.
target: Ihambisa amacala epolygon,afanayo kwi kaleidescope ifana kakhulu ne kaleidescope kunoqhutyo olubizwa ngokuthi yi kaleid,actually.Le yona ngu Jouk Jansen.

input: Draws a pulsating set of overlapping boxes with ever-chaning blobby patterns undulating across their surfaces. It's sort of a cubist Lavalite. Written by Jamie Zawinski 2002.
target: Izoba iqela elishukumayo leebhokisi ezilala phezu kwezinye ngobotsho lezilinganiso ze blobby inyuka isihla ukunqamleza imiphakama yayo.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

target: Oku kuphinda- phinda kusenza okumile njengojijeko lwemilinganiselo ongathi ngumzobo weqela lamagama.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: Draws a ball that periodically extrudes many random spikes. Ouch Written by Jamie Zawinski 2001.
target: Izoba ibhola eneencopho ezibukhali ezininzi ecudisela ngaphandle jikelelela.Awu Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: Subdivides and colors rectangles randomly. It looks kind of like Brady-Bunch-era rec-room wall paneling. en. wikipedia. org wiki PietMondrian Paris1919. E2.80.931938 Written by Jamie Zawinski and Michael Bayne 1997.
target: Le inye ihlula- hlula ezantsi nemibala yemaxande ngokujikelezayo.Ikhangeleka njengentlobo lodonga olulungiswayo le Brandy- Bunch- era rec- room.uthi u Raven esi sigcini sekhusi sibi ngokwaneleyo ekuxobuleni ipeyinti.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski,ecetyiswe yikhowudi ye Java ngo Michael Bayne.

input: Draws a pulsing sequence of transparent stars,circles,and lines. Written by Jamie Zawinski 1999.
target: Oku kuzoba ujikelezo lwenombala namaxanda anamachaphaza.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: A cellular automaton that starts with a random field,and organizes it into stripes and spirals. en. wikipedia. org wiki Maxwell27sdemon Written by David Bagley 1999.
target: Iingxenye zomatshini oqala ngojikelezo lwendawo,kwaye iququzelela kwimigca nemijijo.Ibhalwe ngu David Bagley.

input: More discrete map systems,including new variants of Hopalong and Julia,and a few others. See also the Hopalong and Julia screen savers. Written by Tim Auckland 1998.
target: Iindlela zokusebenza ezininzi,ukuquka oomahluko abatsha baka Hopalong no Julia,nabanye abambalwa.Ibhalwe ngu Tim Auckland.

input: Grabs an image of the screen,and then lets a transparent lens wander around the screen,magnifying whatever is underneath. Written by Jonas Munsin 1998.
target: Olu qhutyo luxutha umfanekiso wekhusi,ze ivumele ilens ezula jikelele kwi khusi,yandisa nantoni na engaphantsi.Ibhalwe ngu Jonas Munsin.

input: Drifting recursive fractal cosmic flames. Written by Scott Draves 1997.
target: Olunye uphinda- phindo lomenzi we fractal.Ibhalwe ngu Scott Draves.

input: Simulates two dimensional incompressible inviscid fluid flow. en. wikipedia. org wiki Eulerequations28fluiddynamics29 en. wikipedia. org wiki Inviscidflow Written by Stephen Montgomery-Smith 2002.
target: Ilinganisa amacala amabini angacinezelwanga Lumpompozo Olungamanzi lwe Inviscid.Ibhalwe ngu Stephen Montgomery- Smith.

input: Draws various rotating extruded shapes that twist around,lengthen,and turn inside out. Written by Linas Vepstas,David Konerding,and Jamie Zawinski 1999.
target: Iziba ujikelezo oluninzi olucinezela ngaphandle izimo ezijijeka jikelele,zibude,kwye ziguquka ngaphakathi nangaphandle.Yenziwe ngu David Konerding esuka kwii sampuli eziza nge librari ye GL Yocudiselo ngaphandle ngu Linas Vepstas.

input: Draws what looks like a waving ribbon following a sinusoidal path. Written by Bas van Gaalen and Charles Vidal 1997.
target: Izoba into efana neribhoni ebhabhayo ilandela umendo we sinusoidal.Ibhalwe ngu Bas van Gaalen no Charles Vidal.

input: Draws a groovy rotating fiber optic lamp. Written by Tim Auckland 2005.
target: Izoba indoda- yekhuni ejula igange izinto phezulu.Ibhalwe ngu Tim Auckland.

input: This draws a waving colored flag,that undulates its way around the screen. The flag can contain arbitrary text and images. By default,it displays either the current system name and OS type,or a picture of Bob. Written by Charles Vidal and Jamie Zawinski 1997.
target: Oku kuzoba iflegi ebhabhayo efakwe umbala,eqengqeleka ngendlela yayo ijikeleza ekhusini.Umgibe yiflegi ekwaziyo ukuqulatha umbhalo wokuzimisela omnye nemifanekiso.Ngokwendalo,ibonisa noba ligama lendlela yokusebenza ekhoyo nohlobo lwe OS,okanye umfanekiso we Bob ,kodwa ungayibuyisela

input: Iterative fractals. Written by Scott Draves 1993.
target: Olunye uphinda- phindo lomenzi we fractal.Ibhalwe ngu Scott Draves.

input: Grabs an image of the desktop,turns it into a GL texture map,and spins it around and deforms it in various ways. Written by Ben Buxton and Jamie Zawinski 2001.
target: Ixutha umfanekiso we desktop,iyiququle kubunjani bemephu ye GL,ze iyijikelezise jikelele ze ingakhi kwiindlela ezininzi.Ibhalwe ngu Ben Buxton.

input: Draws successive pages of text. The lines flip in and out in a soothing 3D pattern. Written by Jamie Zawinski 2005.
target: Ibonisa imigca embalwe yombhalo ojikeleza jikelele kuhlobo lwamagama esithathu oluqinileyo.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinki.

input: Models the physics of bouncing balls,or of particles in a gas or fluid,depending on the settings. If Shake Box is selected,then every now and then,the box will be rotated,changing which direction is down in order to keep the settled balls in motion. Written by Peter Birtles and Jamie Zawinski 2002.
target: Yakha iphysics yeebhola ezimpampayo,okanye iingxenye ze gesi okanye engamanzi,kuxhomekeke kwizicwangciso.Ukuba i Shake Box ikhetiwe,kwaye qho ngoku nangoko,ibhokisi izaku jikeleziswa,ukutshintsha kwindlela esezantsi ukuze ugcine iibhola ezibekiweyo ngentshukumo.

input: Fractal trees. Written by Peter Baumung 1997.
target: Oku kuzoba imithi yomilinganiselo ye geometry.Ibhalwe ngu Baumung.Wonke umntu othanda imilinganiselo,kunjalo

input: This draws spinning galaxies,which then collide and scatter their stars to the,uh,four winds or something. Written by Uli Siegmund,Harald Backert,and Hubert Feyrer 1997.
target: Oku kuzoba iigaxies ezijikelezayo,ezithi ethubeni zingqubane ze sisasazeke ngeenkwenkwezi zayo kwi,uh,imimoya emine okanye into ethile.Ngokwendalo umzobo we Amiga ngu Uli Siegmund.

input: Draws a rippling waves on a rotating wireframe grid. Written by Josiah Pease 2000.
target: Izoba amaza alwayo kujikelezo lwemigca enqamlezeneyo yesakhiwo socingo,usebenzisa se GL.Ibhalwe ngu Josiah Pease.
Imbhewu Yomgca othe ngqo onqamleze kwisangqa

input: Draws an animation of sprinkling fire-like 3D triangles in a landscape filled with trees. Written by Eric Lassauge 2002.
target: Izoba okwenza ukuphila komlilo- njengoonxantathu besithathu kugcwaliso ngemithi.Ifuna i OpenGL,nomatshini onoqiniso loxhaso lengaphandle lekhompyutha yobunjani beemephu.Ibhalwe ngu Eric Lassauge It lassuage mail.dotcom.frgt.

input: Draws a planet bouncing around in space. The built-in image is a map of the earth extracted from xearth ',but you can wrap any texture around the sphere,e. g.,the planetary textures that come with ssystem'. Written by David Konerding 1998.
target: Izoba iplanethi jikelele kwisithuba emajukujukwini.Ibhalwe ngu David Konerding.Umfanekiso owakhiwe ngaphakathi yimephu yomhlaba ukukhupha ukusuka kwi xearth ,kodwa ungasongela nabuphi na ubunjani jikelele kwindawo,umzekelo.,ubunjani bobuplanethi obuza ne ssystem.

input: Draws a simulation of the Rubik's Snake puzzle. See also the Rubik and Cube21 screen savers. en. wikipedia. org wiki Rubik27sSnake Written by Jamie Wilkinson,Andrew Bennetts,and Peter Aylett 2002.
target: Izoba ulinganiso lwe Nyoka ye Rubik yokudlala.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Wilkinson,Andrew Bennetts,no Peter Aylett.

input: Displays a few lines of text spinning around in a solid 3D font. The text can use strftime escape codes to display the current date and time. Written by Jamie Zawinski 2001.
target: Ibonisa imigca embalwe yombhalo ojikeleza jikelele kuhlobo lwamagama esithathu oluqinileyo.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinki.

input: This draws a simple orbital simulation. With trails enabled,it looks kind of like a cloud-chamber photograph. Written by Greg Bowering 1997.
target: Le nkqubo izoba ulinganiso olulula lwe orbital.Ukuba uvula imizila,ikhangeleka njenga mafu- wegumbi eliphezulu.Ibhalwe ngu Greg Bowering.

input: Draws random colored,stippled and transparent rectangles. Written by Jamie Zawinski 1992.
target: Oku kuzoba ujikelezo lwenombala namaxanda anamachaphaza.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: Draws trippy psychedelic circular patterns that hurt to look at. en. wikipedia. org wiki Moirepattern Written by Jamie Zawinski 1993.
target: Oku kuzoba into ecingwa ngumntu wemilinganiso ejikelezayo ekubuhlungu ukuyijonga.Ingalawula anqaku nayo ophiliso,kodwa oko kuthatha i CPU eninzi nesantya sokuthumela idata.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: Spirally string-art-ish patterns. Written by Jamie Zawinski 1992.
target: Oku kuphinda- phinda kusenza okumile njengojijeko lwemilinganiselo ongathi ngumzobo weqela lamagama.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: This draws lacy fractal patterns based on iteration in the imaginary plane,from a 1986 Scientific American article. See also the Discrete screen saver. Written by Patrick Naughton 1992.
target: Oku kuzoba umlinganiselo wegeometry we lacy,isekwe kuphindo lombono osengqondweni we nqwelo ntaka,esuka kwinqaku Lokwenzulu lwazi lwase Amerika lwango 1986.Okuninzi kubhalwe ngu Patrick Naughton.

input: Draws a juggling stick-man. See also Juggler3D. en. wikipedia. org wiki Siteswap Written by Tim Auckland 2002.
target: Izoba indoda- yekhuni ejula igange izinto phezulu.Ibhalwe ngu Tim Auckland.

input: Spiraling,spinning,and very,very fast splashes of color rush toward the screen. Written by Teemu Suutari 1998.
target: Ujikelezo,ujikeleziso,nokuphoswa kombala okunamendu kakhulu phambili kwi khusi.Ibhalwe ngu Teemu Suutari.

input: Animates a simulation of Lemarchand's Box,the Lament Configuration,repeatedly solving itself.occasionally opens doors. en. wikipedia. org wiki Lemarchand27sbox Written by Jamie Zawinski 1998.
target: Yenza impiliso kulinganiso lwebhokisi ye Lemarchand ngokuphinda- phinda izicalula ngokwayo.Ifuna i OpenGL,nomatshini onoxhaso lwengaphandle lekhompyutha olunamendu lobunjani beemephu.Isilumkiso ngamaxesha athile ivula iminyango.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: Moving radiating lines,that look vaguely like scanning laser beams. Frankie say relax. Written by Pascal Pensa 1997.
target: Ihambisa imigca ethe ngqo,ekhangeleka okwenkungu njengovavanyo lwe laser beams.Ibhalwe ngu Pascala Pensa.uthi u Franke phumla.

input: Lissajous loops. This one draws the progress of circular shapes along a path. en. wikipedia. org wiki Lissajouscurve Written by Alexander Jolk 1997.
target: Esinye isimo se Lissajous.Le yona izoba inkqubela yezimo ezijikeleza kumendo.Ibhalwe ngu Alexander Jolk.

input: This generates random spline-ish line drawings and morphs between them. Written by Sverre H. Huseby and Glenn T. Lines 1995.
target: Oku kwenza engathi liceba lomgca elijikelezayo lemizobo notshintsho lwesimo zayo.Ibhalwe ngu Sverre H.Huseby no Glenn T.Lines.

input: Generates loop-shaped colonies that spawn,age,and eventually die. en. wikipedia. org wiki Langton27sloops Written by David Bagley 1999.
target: Le ivelisa isimo esidibanisa iindawo ezibizwe ngaphambili,iminyaka yomntu,emvakwethuba bafe.Ibhalwe ngu David Bagley.

input: This draws the three-dimensional variant of the recursive Menger Gasket,a cube-based fractal object analagous to the Sierpinski Tetrahedron. en. wikipedia. org wiki Menger en. wikipedia. org wiki Sierpinskicarpet Written by Jamie Zawinski 2001.
target: Le izoba umahluko onamacala amathathu okuphinda kwenze i Menger Gasket,isekwe- kwi tyhubhu yomlinganiselo wento yegeometry efanayo kwi Sierpinski Tetrahedron.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.
Imbhewu Yomgca othe ngqo onqamleze kwisangqa

input: Generates fields of concentric circles or ovals,and combines the planes with various operations. The planes are moving independently of one another,causing the interference lines to spray. en. wikipedia. org wiki Moirepattern Written by Jamie Zawinski 1998.
target: Omnye umzekelo owonwabisayo ungawufumana ngemilinganiselo engathi ngamanzi ephazamisayo olu qhubo lwenza iindawo ezimombindi oqhelekileyo wezangqa okanye okumbhoxo,ze idibanise nemizobo yeeplanes ngemisebenzi emininzi.Imizobo yeeplane zihamba zizimele kwezinye,zenza uphazamise imigca ukuze i tsitse.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: Draws several different representations of molecules. Some common molecules are built in,and it can also read PDB Protein Data Bank files as input. en. wikipedia. org wiki ProteinDataBank28fileformat29 Written by Jamie Zawinski 2001.
target: Izoba imiboniso emininzi eyahlukileyo yengxenye encinane.Ezinye iingxenye ezincinane ezibonakalayo zakhelwe ngaphakathi,kwaye ingafunda nayo iifayile ze PDB Protein Data Base njengemveliso.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: Generates random 3D plots that look vaguely mountainous. Written by Pascal Pensa 1997.
target: Yenza amaphawu endawo ezintathu jikelele ezifana nenkungu kwindawo ezizintabai.Ibhalwe ngu Pascala Pensa.

input: Draws different shapes composed of nervously vibrating squiggles,as if seen through a camera operated by a monkey on crack. Written by Dan Bornstein 2000.
target: Izoba izimo ezahlukileyo ezineentshukumo zoloyiko olujijekayo,ngokungathi ibonwa kwikhamera elungisiweyo lucandeko lwe mfene.Ngu Dan Bornstein.

input: This is sort of a combination spirograph string-art. It generates a large,complex polygon,and renders it by filling using an even odd winding rule. Written by Dale Moore 1995.
target: Olu luhlobo lodibaniso lesixhobo sokukala ubunzulu ukuzoba kweqela lamagama.Yenza enkulu enomzobo onamacala amaninzi,kwaye iyeka umncedisi enze imfumba yomsebenzi ngokuyinika olinganayo omnqakathi uthetho ojikelezayo.Ibhalwe ngu Dale Moore,isekwe khowudi ye PDP- 11 yakudala.

input: Simulates something like the classic arcade game Missile Command. en. wikipedia. org wiki MissileCommand Written by Adam Miller 1999.
target: Olu qhutyo lulinganisa Umyalelo we Missile womdlalo wendlela egqunyiweyo yasemandulo.Ibhalwe ngu Adam Miller.

input: This simulates colonies of mold growing in a petri dish. Growing colored circles overlap and leave spiral interference in their wake. Written by Dan Bornstein 1999.
target: Oku kulinganisa ulwakhiwo lokukhula kwee koloni kwisitya se petri.Izangqa ezikhulayo ezinombala zilala phezu kwezinye ze zishiye uphazamiseko olujijekileyo kuvuko lwazo.Ibhalwe ngu Dadn Bornstein.

input: Draws a simulation of an old terminal,with large pixels and long-sustain phosphor. On X11 systems,This program is also a fully-functional VT100 emulator Written by Jamie Zawinski 1999.
target: Izoba ulinganiso lwesixhobo sangaphandle kwikhompuytha esidala,ngamachaphaza enza umfanekiso noxhaso- olude lwe sphosphor.Ingasebenzisa nayiphi na inkqubo njenge mvelaphi yombhalo ewubonisayo.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: Repeatedly attempts to completely fill a rectangle with irregularly-shaped puzzle pieces. en. wikipedia. org wiki Polyomino Written by Stephen Montgomery-Smith 2002.
target: Izama ngokuphinda- phinda ukugcwala ngokugqibeleleyo ngesimo esiqhelekileyo zomdlalo wabaceba.Ibhalwe ngu Stephen Montgomery- Smith.

input: Draws some intersecting planes,making use of alpha blending,fog,textures,and mipmaps. Written by David Konerding 1999.
target: Izoba eminye imizobo enqamleza embindini,isezisa isiqalo sokuxuba,inkungu,ubunjani,nemephu ze mip,ne kunye nezakhelo ngomzuzu ngamnye mitha ukuze ukwazi ukuxela ukuba linamendu kangakanani ikhadi lemizobo yakho.Ifuna i OpenGL.Ifuna i OpenGL.Ibhalwe ngu David Konerding.
Yenza Iimephu ze Mip Zokuva ubunjani ngesandla

input: Bounces a series of line segments around the screen,line segments,filled polygons,and overlapping translucent areas. en. wikipedia. org wiki Qix Written by Jamie Zawinski 1992.
target: Aba ngabantu base Switzland bomkhosi abadibeneyo besenza ikhonkco leenkqubo ze qis.Ibhampisa uthotho lomgca weengxenye ezijekeleze ikhusi,ze zisebenzise ezihlulekileyo kwezinye kwesisiseko sihambayo somlinganiselo ukuvelisa zonke iintlobo zeziboniso ezahlukileyo umgca weengxenye,umzobo onamacala amaninzi ogcwalisiweyo,iindawo ezikhwela phezu kwezinye zothunyelo lwmitha yokukhanya.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: Draws a grid of growing square-like shapes that,once they overtake each other,react in unpredictable ways. RD stands for reaction-diffusion. Written by Scott Draves 1997.
target: Omnye umahluko we hombu nkqubo ngu Scott Draves.Oku kuzoba imigca enqmlezeneyo ekhula njenge zimo zezikwere ezithi,xa zigqithana enye kwenye,zisebenze kwiindlela ezingaqikelelekiyo.I RD imele reaction- diffusion.
Imbhewu Yomgca othe ngqo onqamleze kwisangqa

input: This draws rippling interference patterns like splashing water. With the -water option,it manipulates your desktop image to look like something is dripping into it. Written by Tom Hammersley 1999.
target: Oku kuzoba amanzi aphahlazekayo afana nemilinganiselo yophazanyiso yeliza elincinci elisemanzini.Ngo khetho lwamanzi,iqhatha umfanekiso ye destop yakho ukuba ikhangeleke ngokungathi kukho into evuzela kuyo.Ibhalwe ngu Tom Hammersley.

input: This draws an animation of flight through an asteroid field,with changes in rotation and direction. Written by Jamie Zawinski 1992.
target: Oku kuzoba okwenza kuphile kwento ebhabhayo kwindawo yenkwenkwezi ebhabhayo,ngeentshintsho kujikelezo nakwi ndlela.Ingabonisa nayo izahlulo ezinamacala amathathu zokubomvu nokuluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka kweeglasi Ubuninzi ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: Creates a collage of rotated and scaled portions of the screen. Written by Claudio Matsuoka 2001.
target: Yenza intlama yokuncamathisela lojikelezo neengxenye ezikalishwayo zekhusi.Ibhalwe ngu Claudio Matsuoka.

input: Draws a Rubik's Cube that rotates in three dimensions and repeatedly shuffles and solves itself. See also the GLSnake and Cube21 screen savers. en. wikipedia. org wiki Rubik27sCube Written by Marcelo Vianna 1997.
target: Izoba Ityhubhu ye Rubik ethi ijikelezise kumacala amathathu ze itshofute ngokuphinda- phinda ize izisombule ngokwayo.Olunye uqhubo olulungileyo lwe GL ngu Marcelo Vianna.

input: This draws smoothly-shaded oscillating oval patterns that look something like vapor trails or neon tubes. Written by Shane Smit 1999.
target: Oku kuzoba ebumnyama obugudileyo yezilinganiso ezijikelezayo ezimbhoxo,ikhangeleka njengemizila engumphunga okanye neetyhubhu ze neon.Ibhalwe ngu Shame Smit.

input: This draws the two-dimensional variant of the recursive Sierpinski triangle fractal. See also the Sierpinski3D screen saver. en. wikipedia. org wiki Sierpinskitriangle Written by Desmond Daignault 1997.
target: Oku kuzobe umahluko wamacala amabini okuphinde kwenzeke kwe Sierpinski yonxantathu womlinganiselo we geometry.Ibhalwe ngu Desmond Daignault.

input: This takes an image,divides it into a grid,and then randomly shuffles the squares around as if it was one of those fifteen-puzzle games where there is a grid of squares,one of which is missing. en. wikipedia. org wiki Fifteenpuzzle Written by Jamie Zawinski 1994.
target: Oku kuthatha umfanekiso,ihlula- hlula kwimigca enqamlezeneyo,ze ngokuthe jikelele itshofute izikwere ngokujikelezayo ukuba ibiyenye yale midlalo idikayo ye 16- puzzle ,apho kukho imigca enqamlezeneyo yezikwere,enye ethe yalahleka.Ndiya kucaphukela ukuzama ukucombulula loomidlalo wamaceba,kodwa ukukhangela utshintsho lohlenga- hlengiso yalo iyonwabisa kakhulu.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: Simulates speeding down a rocky mineshaft,or a funky dancing worm. Written by Conrad Parker 2001.
target: Ilinganisa isigrombi somgodi onamatye esinesantya esisezantsi,okanye umbungu omhle odanisayo.Ibhalwe ngu Conrad Parker.

input: These closed objects are commonly called spherical harmonics,although they are only remotely related to the mathematical definition found in the solution to certain wave functions,most notably the eigenfunctions of angular momentum operators. en. wikipedia. org wiki Sphericalharmonics Visualizationofthesphericalharmonics Written by Paul Bourke and Jamie Zawinski 2002.
target: Ezi zinto zivaliweyo ziqhele ukubizwa ngokuba zizimo zebhola zeengxenye zesandi,nangona zihlobene kude kwinkcazelo yezibalo efunyanwa kucazululo kwiliza elithile leentsebenzo,ezininzi eziqatshelwayo imisebenzi ye eige yemisebenzi yamandla eekona nezimo.Ibhalwe ngu Paul Bourke no Jamie Zawinski.

input: Draws a spotlight scanning across a black screen,illuminating the underlying desktop or a picture when it passes. Written by Rick Schultz and Jamie Zawinski 1999.
target: Izoba indawo ekhanyo yokuvavanya ukunqamleza ikhusi elimnyama,ikhanyisa idesktop elele ngaphantsi xa idlula.Ibhalwe ngu Rick Schultz.

input: Draws a set of interacting,square-spiral-producing automata. The spirals grow outward until they hit something,then they go around it. Written by Jeff Epler 1999.
target: Izoba iqela lentshukumo yangaphakathi,ujijeko- lesikwere- olukhupha okuzenzekelayo.Iinjijeko zikhula ngaphandle de zibethe into,zezihambe ziyi jikeleza.Ibhalwe ngu Jeff Epler.

input: This generates a sequence of undulating,throbbing,star-like patterns which pulsate,rotate,and turn inside out. Another display mode uses these shapes to lay down a field of colors,which are then cycled. The motion is very organic. Written by Jamie Zawinski 1997.
target: Oku kwenza uthotho lokunyuka usehla kwamaza,ubetho ngamandla,imilinganiselo efana nenkwenkwezi,ujikelezo,nokuguqula ngaphakathi nangaphandle.Enye indlela yokubonisa isebenzisa ezizimo ukulalisa phantsi indawo yemibala,ezithi zibezizangqa.Intshukumo inamalungu kakhulu.Ibhalwe ngu Jami Zawinski.

input: Draws a stream of text slowly scrolling into the distance at an angle,over a star field,like at the beginning of the movie of the same name. en. wikipedia. org wiki StarWarsopeningcrawl Written by Jamie Zawinski and Claudio Matauoka 2001.
target: Izoba umpompozo lombhalo orola ngokucotha kumgama kwikona,phezu kwendawo yenkwenkwezi,njenga xa kuqala umboniso wegama elifanayo.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski no Claudio Matauoka.

input: Chains of colorful squares dance around each other in complex spiral patterns. Inspired by David Tristram's electropaint 'screen saver,originally written for SGI computers in the late 1980s or early 1990s. Written by Andrew Plotkin 2001.
target: Amakhonkco ezikwere anemibala adanisa jikelele enye kwezinye kwiingxenye ezihlobeneyo zojijeko lwemilinganiso.Ibhalwe ngu Andrew Plotkin,isekwe kwi payinti yombane ye SGI yesigcini sekhusi.

input: it's a colorful,unpredictably-animating swarm of dots that swoops and twists around. en. wikipedia. org wiki Attractor Strangeattractor Written by Massimino Pascal 1997.
target: Le izoba abatsali mdla abangaqhelekanga inamibala,indawo yolinganiso olungaqikelelekiyo lwamachaphaza olutyibilikayo nolu jijeka ngokuthe jikelele.Intshukumo ilunge kakhulu.Ibhalwe ngu Massimino Pascal.

input: Draws a working analog clock composed of floating,throbbing bubbles. Written by Bernd Paysan 1999.
target: Oku kuzoba ikloko enamanani enokubhabha,ubetho ngokungxama kwamaqampu.Ibhalwe ngu Bernd Paysan.

input: Displays a view of the Bird in a Thornbush fractal. Written by Tim Auckland 2002.
target: Ibonisa imboniso ye Ntaka Kwihlathi elinameva yomlinganiselo wegeometry.Ibhalwe ngu Tim Auckland.

input: Generates random mountain ranges using iterative subdivision of triangles. Written by Tobias Gloth 1997.
target: Yenza iikona zentaba jikelele isebenzisa uphindo lolwahlulo olusezantsi loo nxantathu.Ibhalwe ngu Tobias Gloth.

input: This draws line- and arc-based truchet patterns that tile the screen. en. wikipedia. org wiki Tessellation Written by Adrian Likins 1998.
target: Le izoba umgca - nemilinganiselo ye Truchet esekwe kwi arc eyenza ithayile ekhusini.Ibhalwe ngu Adrian Likins.

input: Divides the screen into a grid,and plucks them. Written by Dan Bornstein 2002.
target: Yahlula- hlula ikhusi kwimigca enqamlezeneyo,ze izitsale.Ibhalwe ngu Dan Bornstein.

input: Draws squiggly worm-like paths. Written by Tyler Pierce 2001.
target: Izoba umendo onjengombungu obumaza nojijekileyo.Ibhalwe ngu Tyler Pierce.

input: Generates a continuous sequence of small,curvy geometric patterns. Written by Tracy Camp and David Hansen 1997.
target: Le yenza ulandelwano rhoqo lwe milinganiselo yamagophe egeometry.Izisasaza jikelele kwi khusi lakho de iligcwalise,ze icoce ikhusi iphinde iqale.Ibhalwe ngu Tracy Camp no David Hansen.

input: Draws a colorful random-walk,in various forms. en. wikipedia. org wiki Randomwalk Written by Rick Campbell 1999.
target: Izoba ujikelezo- lokuhamba elinemibala,kwizakhiwo ezininzi.Ibhalwe ngu Rick Campbell.

input: Floating stars are acted upon by a mixture of simple 2D forcefields. The strength of each forcefield changes continuously,and it is also switched on and off at random. Written by Paul'Joey 'Clark 2001.
target: Iinkwenkwezi ezibhabahyo zisebenza phezukoxutyo lweendawo ezinyanzelwayo ezinamacala amabini.Amandla endawo enyanzelweyo nganye iyatshintsha rhoqo,kwaye nayo icima ivule jikelele.ngu Paul Joey Clark.

input: Draws zooming chains of sinusoidal spots. Written by Ashton Trey Belew 2001.
target: Izoba amakhonkco asondezayo amachaphaza enza amaza okanye amagophe.Ibhalwe ngu Ashtom Trey Belew.

input: Draws multicolored worms that crawl around the screen. Written by Brad Taylor,Dave Lemke,Boris Putanec,and Henrik Theiling 1991.
target: Ungeno olungekho mthethweni lwe xlock lakudala lizoba imibungu enemibala emininzi ekhasa jikelele kwi khusi.Ibhalwe ngu Brad Tayolor,Dave Lemke,Boris Putaned,no Henrik Theiling.

input: Draws a simulation of pulsing fire. It can also take an arbitrary image and set it on fire too. Written by Carsten Haitzler and many others 1999.
target: Izoba ulinganiso lomlilo obetha phantsi.Ingathatha umfanekiso womthetho uze uwulumeke emlilweni nawo.Ibhalwe ngu Carsten Haitzler,isikwe rhoqo ngabanye abaninzi.

input: This behaves schizophrenically and makes a lot of typos. Written by Jamie Zawinski 1997.
target: Oku kuphinda- phinda kusenza okumile njengojijeko lwemilinganiselo ongathi ngumzobo weqela lamagama.Ibhalwe ngu Jamie Zawinski.

input: This generates pretty fractal pictures via the Lyapunov exponent. en. wikipedia. org wiki Lyapunovexponent Written by Ron Record 1997.
target: Oku kwenza imifanekiso emihla yomlinganiselo wobalo ngokwenza ubalo olo yikekayo olufaka i Lyapunov exponent.Inendlela epholileyo yentshukumo yangaphakathi,nayo.Ibhalwe ngu Ron Record.

input: Draws a few swarms of critters flying around the screen,with faded color trails behind them. Written by Chris Leger 2000.
target: Izoba iinginginya ezihambayo zezinambuzane ezibhabhayo ngokujikeleza kwikhusi,ngombala omhle ophelelwayo ishiya imizila ngasemva kwazo.Ibhalwe ngu Chris Leger.

input: Simulates that pen-in-nested-plastic-gears toy from your childhood. en. wikipedia. org wiki Spirograph Written by Rohit Singh 2000.
target: Ilinganisa usiba- olufakwe- kwi- plastiki- yeegiya zethoyi ezisuka ebuncinaneni bakho.Ngu Rohit Singh.

input: Zooms in on a part of the screen and then moves around. With the Lenses option,the result is like looking through many overlapping lenses rather than just a simple zoom. Written by James Macnicol 2001.
target: Isondeza kwindawo yekhusi ze ijikeleze.Ngokhetho zee lense iziphumo zifana nokujonga iilense ezininzi ezikhelanayo kunoku vele zisondeze kuphela.Ibhalwe ngu James Macnicol.

Here you can configure your default web browser. All KDE applications in which you can select hyperlinks should honor this setting.

input: Here you can configure your default file manager. The entries in the K menu and all KDE applications in which you can open folders will use this file manager.

input: This service allows you to configure your default email client. All KDE applications which need access to an email client application should honor this setting.
target: Lenkonzo ikuvumela ukuba uqwalasele umxhasi wakho we email.Zonke izicelo ezidinga unikezelo kumxhasi we email wesicelo kufuneka yamkele esisicelo.Name

input: This service allows you to configure your default terminal emulator. All KDE applications which invoke a terminal emulator application should honor this setting.
target: Lenkonzo ikuvumela ukuba ukwazi ukuqwalasela isiphelo esingagqibekanga sendlela yokulinganisa.Zonke izicelo ze KDE eziqalisa isicelo sesiphelo sendlela yokulinganisa kumele zisamkele esisicwangciso.

You can help us improve this software by filing a bug report.
It is safe to close this dialog. If you do not want to,you do not have to file a bug report.
What do you know about the crash
In this page you need to describe how much do you know about the desktop and the application state before it crashed.
If you can,describe in as much detail as possible the crash circumstances,and what you were doing when the application crashed this information is going to be requested later. You can mention
actions you were taking inside or outside the application
documents or images that you were using and their type format later if you go to look at the report in the bug tracking system,you can attach a file to the report
the URL of a web site you were browsing
or other strange things you notice before or after the crash.
This page will generate a backtrace of the crash. This is information that tells the developers where the application crashed.

If the crash information is not detailed enough,you may need to install some debug packages and reload it if the Install Debug Symbols button is available you can use it to automatically install the missing information.
You can find more information about backtraces,what they mean,and how they are useful at 1
Using the quality of the crash information gathered,and your answers on the previous page,the assistant will tell you if the crash is worth reporting or not.
If the crash is worth reporting but the application is not supported in the KDE bug tracking system,you will need to directly contact the maintainer of the application.
Login into the bug tracking system

We may need to contact you in the future to ask for further information. As we need to keep track of the bug reports,you need to have an account on the KDE bug tracking system. If you do not have one,1
Then,enter your username and password and press the Login button. You can use this login to directly access the KDE bug tracking system later.

This page will search the bug report database for similar crashes which are possible duplicates of your bug. If there are similar bug reports found,you can double click on them to see details. Then,read the current bug report information so you can check to see if they are similar.
If you are very sure your bug is the same as another that is previously reported,you can set your information to be attached to the existing report.

If you are unsure whether your report is the same,follow the main options to tentatively mark your crash as a duplicate of that report. This is usually the safest thing to do. We cannot uncombine bug reports,but we can easily merge them.
If not enough possible duplicates are found,or you did not find a similar report,then you can force it to search for more bug reports only if the date range limit is not reached.
Details of the bug report and your system
In this case you need to write a title and description of the crash. Explain as best you can.
You can also specify your distribution method GNU Linux distribution or packaging system or if you compiled the KDE Platform from sources.

The last page will send the bug report to the bug tracking system and will notify you when it is done. It will then show the web address of the bug report in the KDE bug tracking system,so that you can look at the report later.

If the process fails,you can click Retry to try sending the bug report again. If the report cannot be sent because the bug tracking database has a problem,you can save it to a file to manually report later.
Thank you for being part of KDE
If you are interested into helping us to organize bug reports allowing the developers to focus on fixing the real issues,join the BugSquad kde-bugs on FreeNode IRC

input: Behavior This module allows you to choose various options for your desktop,including the way in which icons are arranged and the pop-up menus associated when clicking on the desktop using the middle and right mouse buttons. Use the What's This ShiftF1 to get help on specific options.

input: Here you can customize KDE's behavior when clicking somewhere into a window while pressing a modifier key.
target: Apha ungenza ukuziphatha kwe KDE xa unqakraza endaweni ethile kwi window ngexesha ucinezela isitshixo sokuguqula kancinane.

input: Here you select whether holding the Meta key or Alt key will allow you to perform the following actions.
target: Apha ungakhetha noba kukubamba isitshixo se Meta okanye isitshixo se Alt sizakuvumela ukusebenza iintshukumo ezilandelayo.

input: Here you can customize KDE's behavior when scrolling with the mouse wheel in a window while pressing the modifier key.
target: Apha ungenza ukuziphatha kwe KDE xa unqakraza endaweni ethile kwi window ngexesha ucinezela isitshixo sokuguqula kancinane.
Isitshixo sokuguqula kancinane iqhosha eliphakathi NAME OF TRANSLATORS

input: When this option is enabled,a window in the background will automatically come to the front when the mouse pointer has been over it for some time.
target: UKuba uphakamiso oluzenzekelayo luyenzeka,i window kwisiqalo izakuza ngokuzenzekela phambili xa isalathisi se mouse singaphezulu kwixesha elithile.

input: This is the delay after which the window that the mouse pointer is over will automatically come to the front.
target: Olu lulibaziseko emva kokuba iwindow engaphezulu kwesalathisi se mouse izakuza ngokuzenzekelayo phambili.

input: When this option is enabled,the active window will be brought to the front when you click somewhere into the window contents. To change it for inactive windows,you need to change the settings in the Actions tab.
target: Xa olu khetho lusenzeka,ii window zakho zizakuziswa phambili xa unqakraza ndaweni ithile kwimixholo ye window.

input: When this option is enabled,there will be a delay after which the window the mouse pointer is over will become active receive focus.
target: Olu lulibaziseko emva kokuba iwindow engaphezulu kwesalathisi se mouse izakuza ngokuzenzekelayo phambili.

input: This is the delay after which the window the mouse pointer is over will automatically receive focus.
target: Olu lulibaziseko emva kokuba iwindow engaphezulu kwesalathisi se mouse izakuza ngokuzenzekelayo phambili.

input: If Shade Hover is enabled,a shaded window will un-shade automatically when the mouse pointer has been over the title bar for some time.
target: Ukuba i Hover yomthunzi yenziwe,iwindow enomthunzi izaku- ngawenzi- umthunzi ngokuzenzekelayo xa isalathisi se mouse singaphaya kwebar yewonga ngexesha elithile.

input: Sets the time in milliseconds before the window unshades when the mouse pointer goes over the shaded window.
target: Icwangcisa ixewsha lemizuzwana emininzi phambi kokuba iwindow ingawenzi umthunzi xa isalathisi se mouse sihamba ngaphaya kwe window enomthunzi.

input: Enable this option if you want a window's content to be fully shown while moving it,instead of just showing a window'skeleton '. The result may not be satisfying on slow machines without graphic acceleration.
target: Yenza olu khetho ukuba ufuna umxholo we window uboniswe ngokupheleleyo ngexesha uyisusa,endaweni yokubonisa nje uphahla lwe window.Isiphumo sinokungo nelisi kwimatshini ezicothayo ngaphandle konikezelo lomzobo.
Bonisa umxholo kwii window ezenza ubungakanani kwakhona

input: Enable this option if you want a window's content to be shown while resizing it,instead of just showing a window'skeleton '. The result may not be satisfying on slow machines.
target: Yenza olu khetho ukuba ufuna umxholo we window uboniswe ngexesha isenza ubungakanani kwakhiona bayo,endaweni yokubonisa nje uphahla lwe window.Isiphumo sinokungo nelisi kwimatshini ezicothayo.

input: Allow moving and resizing of maximized windows
target: Vumela ushukumo kunye nokwenziwa kobungakanani kwakhona bee window ezenziwe nkulu

input: When enabled,this feature activates the border of maximized windows and allows you to move or resize them,just like for normal windows
target: Xa yenziwe,lomsebenzi osemqoka wenza umda wee window ezenziwe nkulu kwaye ikuvumela ukuzishukumisa okanye ukwenza ubungakanani kwakhona bazo,njengee window eziqhelekileyo

input: Here you can set the snap zone for screen borders,i. e. the'strength 'of the magnetic field which will make windows snap to the border when moved near it.
target: Apha ungacwangcisa ummandla wokwenziwa ngokukhawuleza wemida yekhusi,ithetha ukuba.ulomelelo lo mhlaba otsalayo ongenakwenza mfanekiso wee window kumda xa isondezwe kufutshane nayo.

input: Here you can set the snap zone for windows,i. e. the'strength 'of the magnetic field which will make windows snap to each other when they are moved near another window.
target: Apha ungacwangcisa ummandla wokwenziwa ngokukhawuleza wee window,ithetha ukuba.ulomelelo lo mhlaba otsalayo ozakwenza umfanekiso wee window kwenye xa zisondezwa kufutshane kwenye i window.

input: Here you can set the snap zone for the screen center,i. e. the'strength 'of the magnetic field which will make windows snap to the center of the screen when moved near it.
target: Apha ungacwangcisa ummandla wokwenziwa ngokukhawuleza wemida yekhusi,ithetha ukuba.ulomelelo lo mhlaba otsalayo ongenakwenza mfanekiso wee window kumda xa isondezwe kufutshane nayo.
Bamba ii window kuphela xa zisalekwa ngaphezulu

input: Here you can set that windows will be only snapped if you try to overlap them,i. e. they will not be snapped if the windows comes only near another window or border.
target: Apha ungacwangcisa ukuba iiwindow zenziwa ngokukhawuleza ukuba uzama ukuzaleka ngaphezulu,ithetha ukuba.azinakwenziwa ngokukhawuleza ukuba iiwindow ziza kuphela kufutshane nenye iwindow okanye umda.
Shiya olu khetho lukhabazekileyo ukuba ufuna ukwenza umda wokuhamba ngapha kwee window ukuya kweyangoku i desktop.

input: Leave this option disabled if you want to limit walking through windows to the current desktop.
target: Ulawulo lwe desktop lusongela macala onke
Yenza olukhetho ukuba ufuna ibhodi yezitshixo okanye umda wombane wolaulo ngapha kwe siphelo se desktop ukuzisa i desktop kwisiphelo sesiphelo.

input: Enable this option if you want keyboard or active desktop border navigation beyond the edge of a desktop to take you to the opposite edge of the new desktop.
target: ingxolo eqhekezayo yegama kwi desktop tshintsha

input: Popup desktop name on desktop switch
target: Yenza olukhetho ukuba ufuna ukubona i desktop yangoku igama eliqhekezayo xa i desktop yangoku itshintswa.

input: Enable this option if you wish to see the current desktop name popup whenever the current desktop is changed.
If this option is enabled,moving the mouse to a screen border will change your desktop. This is e. g. useful if you want to drag windows from one desktop to the other.

target: Apha ungenza ubambezelo lutshintshela ii desktop usebenzisa imida esebenzayo esemqoka.Iidesktop zezakuswitsha emva kokuba imouse ityhalwe ngokuchasene nomda wekhusi kwinani elikhankanyiweyo lemizuzwana emininzi.

input: Here you can set a delay for switching desktops using the active borders feature. Desktops will be switched after the mouse has been pushed against a screen border for the specified number of milliseconds.
target: Apha ungenza ukuziphatha kwe KDE xa unqakraza ngaphakathi kwi window ngexesha ucinizela isitshixo sokuguqula kancinane.
Apha ungenza ukuziphatha konqakrazo lwe mouse xa unqakraza kabini kwibar yewonga ye window.

input: Here you can customize KDE's behavior when middle clicking into a window while pressing the modifier key.
Here you can customize mouse click behavior when double clicking on the titlebar of a window.

target: Philisa intshukumo yokunciphisa iwindow kwibar yayo yewonga yenza umthunzi nawo njengolwandiso lwe window enomthunzi

input: Animate the action of reducing the window to its titlebar shading as well as the expansion of a shaded window
target: Yenza olu khetho ukuba ufuna uphiliso olubonisiweyo xa iiwindow zisenziwa ncinane okanye zigcinwa kwakhona.

input: Here you can set the speed of the animation shown when windows are minimized and restored.
Launch Feedback You can configure the application-launch feedback here.

input: This is where you live. KDE will use the defaults for this country or region.
target: Apha kulapho uhlala khona.i KDE izakusebenzisa okwendalo kweli lizwe.

input: This will add a language to the list. If the language is already in the list,the old one will be moved instead.
target: Oku kuzakususa ulwimi kuluhlu.Ukuba ulwimi sele lukuluhlu,endala izakusiwa endaweni yoko.

input: This will remove the highlighted language from the list.
KDE programs will be displayed in the first available language in this list. If none of the languages are available,US English will be used.

input: Here you can choose your country or region. The settings for languages,numbers etc. will automatically switch to the corresponding values.

input: This is how numbers will be displayed.
This is how monetary values will be displayed.

input: This is how date values will be displayed.
target: Oku yindlela amaxabiso omhla azakuboniswa ngayo.

input: This is how the time will be displayed.

target: item currency name and currency code

input: Here you can define the decimal separator used to display monetary values. Note that the decimal separator used to display other numbers has to be defined separately see the'Numbers' tab.

input: Here you can define the thousands separator used to display monetary values. Note that the thousands separator used to display other numbers has to be defined separately see the'Numbers' tab.
target: Apha ungachaza amawaka asetyenziswe ngumahluli ukubonisa amaxabisoemali.Qaphela ukuba amawaka asetyenziswe ngumahluli ukubonisa amanye amanani azakuchazwa ngokwahlukileyo bona Amanani tab.

input: Here you can set the number of decimal places displayed for monetary values,i. e. the number of digits after the decimal separator. Note that the decimal places used to display other numbers has to be defined separately see the'Numbers' tab.
target: Apha ungachaza umahluli wenani eliphela kwishumi elisetyenzisiweyo ukubonisa amaxabiso emali.Qaphela ukuba umahluli wokugqibela osetyenziswayo ukubonisa amanye amanani azakuchazwa ngokwahlukileyo bona Amanani tab.

input: If this option is checked,the currency sign will be prefixed i. e. to the left of the value for all positive monetary values. If not,it will be postfixed i. e. to the right.
target: Ukuba olu khetho lukhangelwe,uphawu lwangoku luzakubekwa phambili ithetha ukuba ekhohlo kwexabiso kuwo onke amaxabiso alungayo emali.Ukuba akunjalo,izaku lungiswa ngeposi ithetha ukuba ekunene.

input: If this option is checked,the currency sign will be prefixed i. e. to the left of the value for all negative monetary values. If not,it will be postfixed i. e. to the right.
target: Ukuba olu khetho lukhangelwe,uphawu lwangoku luzakubekwa phambili ithetha ukuba ekhohlo kwexabiso wawo onke amaxabiso akhabanayo emali.Ukuba akunjalo,izaku lungiswa ngeposi ithetha ukuba ekunene.

input: Here you can select how a positive sign will be positioned. This only affects monetary values.
target: Apha ungakhetha indlela uphawu oluvumelanayo linokunikwa indawo.Oku kuphela kuchaphazela amaxabiso emali.

input: Here you can select how a negative sign will be positioned. This only affects monetary values.
target: Apha ungakhetha indlela uphawu lokukhabayo linokunikwa indawo.Oku kuphela kuchaphazela amaxabiso emali.

input: Here you can define the decimal separator used to display numbers i. e. a dot or a comma in most countries. Note that the decimal separator used to display monetary values has to be set separately see the'Money 'tab.
target: Apha ungachaza umahluli wokugqibela osetyenziswayo ukubonisa amanani ithetha ukuba ichaphaza okanye isiphumlisi kumazwe amaninzi.Qaphela ukuba umahluli wokugqibela osetyenziswayo ukubonisa amaxabiso emali uzakubekwa ngokwahlukileyo bona Mali isithuba.

input: Here you can define the thousands separator used to display numbers. Note that the thousands separator used to display monetary values has to be set separately see the'Money 'tab.
target: Apha ungachaza amawaka esetyenziswe ngumahluli ukubonisa amanani.Qaphela ukuba amawaka asetyenziswe ngumahluli ukubonisa amaxabiso emali kufuneka abekwe ngokwahlukileyo bona i Mali tab.

input: Here you can specify text used to prefix positive numbers. Most people leave this blank.

input: Here you can specify text used to prefix negative numbers. This should not be empty,so you can distinguish positive and negative numbers. It is normally set to minus -.

input: Here you can set the number of decimal places displayed for numeric values,i. e. the number of digits after the decimal separator.

input: This page presents the contents of your samba log file in a friendly layout. Check that the correct log file for your computer is listed here. If you need to,correct the name or location of the log file,and then click the Update button.
target: Eli phepha lizisa imixholo yefayile yakho ye samba kubeko lobuhlobo.Khangela ukuba ifayile yelog elungileyo ye computer yakho ikuluhlu apha.Ukuba ufuna njalo,lungisa igama okanye indawo yefayile yelog,kwaye ngoku nqakraza Gqiba iqhosha.

input: Check this option if you want to view the details for connections opened to your computer.
target: Khangela olu khetho ukuba ufuna ukubonisela iinkcukacha zendibaniso evuliweyo kwi khompyutha yakho.

input: Check this option if you want to view the events when connections to your computer were closed.
target: Khangela olu khetho ukuba ufuna ukubonisela iziganeko xa iindibaniso kwi khompyutha yakho evaliweyo.

input: Check this option if you want to see the files which were opened on your computer by remote users. Note that file open close events are not logged unless the samba log level is set to at least 2 you cannot set the log level using this module.

input: Check this option if you want to see the events when files opened by remote users were closed. Note that file open close events are not logged unless the samba log level is set to at least 2 you cannot set the log level using this module.

input: Session Manager You can configure the session manager here. input: KDE will not configure or show keyboard layouts

Keyboard Layout Here you can choose your keyboard layout and model. The'model 'refers to the type of keyboard that is connected to your computer,while the keyboard layout defines which key does what and may be different for different countries.
target: Ubeko lwebhodi yezitshixo Indlela Apha ungakhetha ubeko lwakho lwebhodi yezitshixo kunye nendlela.I ndlela ibhekisa kudidi lwebhodi yezitshixo edityaniswe kwi computer yakho,ngexesha ubeko lwebhodi yezitshixo ichaza istshixo esenza ntoni kwaye inokuba nomahluko kumazwe awahlukeneyo.Ukongezelela kubeko Olusezantsi,oluzakusetyenziswa njengoku ngagqibekanga,ungakhankanya ubeko olongeziweyo,ongalucima ululayite ngokulula phakathi usebenzisa iqela lenjongo ethile le KDE.

input: Here you can choose a variant of selected keyboard layout. Layout variants usually represent different key maps for the same language. For example,basic,winkeys as in Windows,typewriter as in typewriters and phonetic each Ukrainian letter is placed on a transliterated latin one.
target: Apha uyakwazi ukukhetha uhlobo olukhethiweyo eyongeziweyo lobeko lwe sitshixo sebhodi.Umehluko wobeko ngokuqhelekileyo ibonisa kwakhona umehluko wesitshixo seemephu zolwimi olufanayo.Umzekelo,Ubeko lwe Ukrainian ubeko lwe Ukrainian lunee ntlobo ezine okuba inentlobo ezine basic,winkeys njenga kwi Windows,umashini wokuchwetheza as in typewriters ne phonetic unobumba ngamnye wase Ukrainian obekwe kwi transliterated latin one.

input: \t\t You can locate objects in the sky by their name. \t\t\tUse CtrlF,the Pointing- Find Object menu item,or the Find Object \t\t\tToolbar button. \t\t \t
target: ukuba uyakwazi ukuphendla iinjongo ezisesibhakabhakeni ngamagama azo Sebenzisa u CtrlF,the Uqwalaselo - Fumana Injongo umba we menu,okanye Fumana Iqosha Lesixhobo se bar.

input: \t\t To change your Geographic Location,\t\t\tuse CtrlG,the Settings- Geographic... menu item,\t\t\tor the globe Toolbar button. \t\t \t
target: ukuba uyakwazi ukutshintsha Indawo okuyo ye Giografi Sebenzisa CtrlG,the Izicwangciso - Cwangcisa Indawo Yegeografi.umba we menu,okange i iglobhu Iqosha lesixhobo se bar.

input: \t\t You can Track an object,so it will always be centered \t\t\tin the display. \t\t\tUse CtrlT,the Pointing- Engage Tracking menu item,or the lock \t\t\tToolbar button. You can also simply center the object by \t\t\tdouble-clicking on it or selecting Center and Track from the \t\t\tobject's popup menu. \t\t \t
target: ukuba uyakwazi ukukhangela injongo,ukwenzela ukuba isoloko isembindini kwimboniselo Sebenzisa CtrlT,the Lungisa - Khangela Injongo umba we menu,okanye i tshixha Iqosha lesixhobo se bar.Uyakwazi futhi ukuvele ebeke injongo embindini ngoku nqakraza- kabini kuyo okanye ngokukhetha Beka embindini ukhangele ukusuka kwi menu yengxolo eqhekezayo.

input: \t\t The KStars Handbook includes the AstroInfo Project,a series \t\t\tof informative articles about Astronomy. \t\t \t
target: ukuba Incwadi yesandla ye KStars iquka Iprojekti Yencwadana ezinolwazi malunga Nolwazi lweenkwenkwezi

input: \t\t The N,S,E,W keys will point the display at the North,\t\t\tSouth,East and West points on the Horizon. The Z key will point the \t\t\tdisplay at the Zenith. \t\t \t
target: ukuba izitshixho ze N,S,E,W zizakwelatha Emantla,Emzantsu,Empuma Nasentshona yalatha Kulundi

input: \t\t Click and Drag with the mouse to slew the skymap to a new position on \t\t\tthe sky. \t\t \t
target: Nqakraza urhuqe i mouse kwi slew skymap kwindawo entsha.

input: \t\t Double-click with the mouse to center the display on the location \t\t\tof the mouse cursor. If you double-click on an object,KStars will \t\t\tautomatically begin tracking it. \t\t \t
target: Nqakraza- kabini nge mouse kumbindi wemboniso kwindawo yesalathisi se mouse.

input: \t\t The status bar displays the current sky coordinates of the mouse cursor,\t\t\tin both Equatorial and Horizontal coordinate systems. \t\t \t
target: Ibar yendawo engatshintshiyo lizakubonisa ngalolonke ixesha eyangoku Unyusko,Nolwehlo ezilinganayo zesalathisi se mouse.

input: \t\t You can manually set the coordinates of the central Focus point. \t\t\tPress CtrlM,or use the Pointing- Set Focus Manually... menu item,and enter \t\t\tthe desired coordinates in the popup window. \t\t \t
target: ukuba uyakwazi ukucwangcisa Indawo yokujongisa ngesandla Cinizela u CtrlM,pkanye sebenzisa Jongisa - Cwangcisa Ujongiso Ngesandla.umba we menu,ungenise into ezilinganayo kwi window yengxolo eqhekekayo.

input: \t\t To switch between Equatorial and Horizontal coordinate \t\t\tsystems,use the View- Coordinates menu item,or press the spacebar. \t\t \t
target: ukuba uyakwazi ukutshuntshela phakathi kwe Equatorial and Horizontal elinganayo udweliso lweenkqubo Sebenzisa i Imboniselo - Elinganayo umba we menu,okanye amaqosh Kuqwalaselo lwe window ye KStars.

input: \t\t To set the Time and Date,type CtrlS,use the Time- Set Time menu item,\t\t\tor press the time toolbar button. Note that dates in KStars can be very \t\t\tremote you can use any year between -50,000 and 50,000. \t\t \t
target: ukuba uyakwazi ukucwangcisa Ixesha Nomhla Sebenzisa CtrlS,i Ixesha - Cwangcisa Ixesha umba we menu,okanye igalsi yeyure isixhobo se bar

input: \t\t You can use CtrlE or the Time- Set Time to Now menu item to synchronize \t\t\tthe simulation clock with your CPU clock. \t\t \t
target: ukuba uyakwazi ukusebenzisa i CtrlE okanye i Ixesha - Cwangcisa Ixesha Kungoku ukwenza isebenziselane ikloko yolinganiselwano ne kloko yakho ye CPU

input: \t\t The Spin Box in the Toolbar allows you to adjust the time step \t\t\tused by the KStars clock setting it to 1.0 sec provides real time. \t\t\negative values make time run backwards. \t\t \t
target: Ibholisi Yokujikeleza Kwisixhobo se bar ikuvumela ukwazi ukunyenyisa ixesha lenqwanqwa elisebenizswa yikloko ye Kstars.Ukuyicwangcisela ku 1.0 sec inika.real time.Inika amaxabiso anganghqinelaniyo enze ixesha libalekele ngasemva

input: \t\t You can stop and start the clock with the Play Pause button \t\t\tin the Toolbar,or with the Time- Stop Clock menu item. \t\t \t
target: Uyakwazi ukumisa nokuqala ikloko nge Dlala Yima qosha Kwisixhobo se bar,okanye nge Ixesha - Yima qalisa Ikloko umba we menu.

input: \t\t When you click your mouse in the map,the object in the sky nearest \t\t\tthe mouse cursor is identified in the status bar. \t\t \t
target: Xa unqakraza i mouse yakho kwi maphu,injongo ekwisibhakabhaka ekufutshane kwisalthisi se mouse ichazwe kwi bar yewonga.

input: \t\t Right-click with the mouse to open a popup menu of detailed options \t\t\tfor a particular object,including links to images and information on \t\t\tthe Internet. \t\t \t
target: Nqakraza- ekunene nge mouse ukuvula i menu yengxolo eqhekezayo yokhetho lweenkcukacha lwenjongo ethile,equka amakhonco nolwazi nge Internet.

input: \t\t The deep-sky objects with a special color the default is Red \t\t\thave extra URL links available in their popup menu. \t\t \t
target: Iinjongo zesibhakabhaka ezinzulu ezinombala okhethekileyo ukungagqibeki Bububomvu ezinamakhonkco e URL ongezelekileyoafumaneka kwi menu yengxolo eqhekezayo.

input: \t\t By default,stars in KStars are displayed with realistic colors. \t\t\tA star's color depends on its temperature cooler stars are red,\t\t\twhile hotter stars are blue. \t\t \t
target: Ngokungagqibekanga,iinkwenkwezi kwi KStars iboniswa ngemibalo yokwenyani.Umbala wenkwenkwezi uxhomekeka kwiqondo lobushushu iinkwenkwezi epholileyo,izakuba bomvu,kusenjalo iinkwekwezi ezishushu ziluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka.

input: \t\t To add your own custom Object Catalogs,select Import Catalog or \t\t\tLoad Catalog from the Catalogs tab in the KStars Configuration window. \t\t\tSee the Handbook for instructions on formatting your catalog file. \t\t \t
target: ukuba uyakwazi ukudibanisa Injongo eyeyakho yencwadi yemifanekiso Khetha stom Object catalogs Select Dibanisa Incwadi yemifaneksio kwi tab Yencwadi yemifanekiso kwi Window Yoqwalaselo lwe KStars.bona Incwadi Yesandla xa ufuna imiyalelo yokufomata kwifayile yakho yencwadi yemifanekiso.

input: \t\t To add your own custom image information URLs to \t\t\tany object,select Add Link... from the object's popup menu. \t\t \t
target: ukuba uyakwazi ukudibanisa umfanekiso wakho esiko ulwazi lwe URLs kwi naliphi na iqela lenjongo elithile Dibanisa Ikhonkco.ukusuka kwi menu from the popup menu.

input: \t\t You can adjust dozens of display options by clicking the \t\t\tconfigure Toolbar button,or selecting the Settings- Configure KStars... \t\t\tmenu item. \t\t \t
target: ukuba uyakwazi ukunyenyisa iinketho zemboniso ezininzi ngokunqakraza wrench Iqosha lesixhobo se bar,okanye ngokukhetha Izicwangciso - Qwalasela i KStars.umba we menu

input: \t\t The on-screen Info Boxes can be hidden or shown using the \t\t\tSettings- Info Boxes menu. \t\t \t
target: ukuba ungafihla Iibhokisi Zolwazi kwi- khusi Khetha ezikhethwayo kwi Izicwangciso - Ibhokisi Yolwazi menu.

input: \t\t The Toolbars can be hidden or shown using the Settings- Toolbars menu. \t\t \t
target: ukuba uyakwazi ukufihla Ibar yesixhobo Khetha ezikhethwayo zakho kwi Zicwangciso - Ibars zesixhobo menu.

input: \t\t You can easily switch between predefined color schemes by selecting \t\t\tthe scheme from the Settings- Color Schemes menu. \t\t \t
target: Uyakwazi ukutshinthshela ngokulula phakathi kodweliso lombala ochazwe ngaphambibi ngokukhetha udweliso kwi Izicwangciso - Udweliso Lombala menu.

input: \t\t You can define your own Geographic Locations. Fill in the \t\t\trequired fields in the Set Geographic Location Dialog and then press the \t\t\tAdd City to List button. Your Locations will be available in all \t\t\tfuture sessions. \t\t \t
target: ukuba uyakwazi ukuzikhankanyela Indawo Yommandla Gcwalisa kwi umhlaba ofunekayo kwi Tsintsha Indawo Incoko yababini ucinizele Dibanisa Kuluhlu iqosha.Indawo okuyo izakufumaneka kuzozonke iintlanganiso zexesha elizayo.

input: \t\t You can define your own Color Schemes. Adjust the colors \t\t\tin the Configuration Window's Colors Tab,and then press the Save \t\t\tCurrent Colors button. Your Color Scheme will appear in the list in \t\t\tall future sessions. \t\t \t
target: ukuba uyakwazi ukuchaza Udweliso Lombala wakho Nyenyisa imibala kwi Window Yoqwalaselo Imibala Isithuba,ucinizele Gcina Imibala Yangoku iqosha lokugcina.Udweliso Lwakho Lwemibala lizakubonakala kuluhlu kwintlanganiso zamaxesha azayo.

input: \t\t The Advanced tab of the KStars Configuration window allows you to fine-tune \t\t\tthe behavior of KStars. You can specify whether to correct for atmospheric \t\t\trefraction,and whether to use animated slewing. You can also specify which \t\t\tobjects are hidden while the display is in motion. \t\t \t
target: Isithuba esibhekisa phambili se Window Yoqwalaselo ye KStars ikuvumela ukuba ulungise- kakuhle ukuziphatha kwe KStars.Uyakwazi ukukhankanya ukulungisa imeko- bume yobuyelo ngasemva,nokuba kuzakusebenziswa i slewing ephilisiweyo.Uyakwazi ukukhankanya ukuba izakuba zeziphi iinjongo ezizakufihlwa ngexesha imboniso ishukuma.

input: \t\t KStars displays 126,000 stars,13,000 deep-sky objects,88 constellations,\t\t\tall planets,the Sun,the Moon,thousands of comets and asteroids,and the \t\t\tMilky Way. \t\t \t
target: KStars ibonisa inkwenwezi ezingu 40,000,13,000 iinjongo zesibhakabhaka esinzulu,88 constellations,8 planets,the Sun,the Moon,and the Milky Way.

input: \t\t The line in the sky that the Sun and all the Planets seem to follow \t\t\tis called the Ecliptic. \t\t \t
target: Ilayini ekwisibhakabhaka elandelwa Lilanga Neeplanethi yaziwa njenge Ecliptic.

input: \t\t Object positions in KStars include the effects of precession,nutation,\t\t\taberration,atmospheric refraction,and light travel time for planets. \t\t \t
target: Indawo ezikuyo iinjongo kwi KStars iquka iziqhano zogqolo,noqwalo,aberration,atmospheric refraction,nexesha lokuhamba kokukhanya yeplanethi.

input: \t\t The nearest star to the Sun is Rigel Kentaurus alpha Centauri. \t\t\tThe brightest star in the sky is Sirius alpha Canis Majoris. \t\t \t
target: Igama lenkwenkwezi ekufutshane Kwilanga ngu Rigel Kentaurus alpha Centauri.Eyona nkwenkwezi ekhanyayo esibhakabhakeni ngi Sirius alpha Canis Majoris.

input: \t\t The large group of galaxies between Leo,Virgo and Coma Berenices \t\t\tis called the Virgo Cluster of Galaxies. \t\t \t
target: Iqela le Galaxies phakathi kwe Leo,Virgo ne Coma Berenices ibizwa njenge Virgo Cluster ye Galaxies.

input: \t\t The large group of clusters and nebulae near the south celestial pole \t\t\tare objects in the Large Magellanic Cloud,which is a dwarf galaxy in \t\t\torbit around the Milky Way. \t\t \t
target: Iqela elikhulu le clusters ne nubulae kufutshane nasemazansti kwepali ye celestial ziinjongo Zelifu Kwenkulu i Magellanic,engutikoloshe kwi galaxy ejikeleza kwi Milky Way

input: \t\t The Messier Catalog is a list of 110 of the brightest non-stellar objects \t\t\tin the sky. It includes such famous objects as the Orion Nebula M 42,the \t\t\tAndromeda Galaxy M 31,and the Pleiades M 45. \t\t \t
target: Incwadi yoboniso loluhlu lwe 110 lwezona non- stellar njongo ezithile esibhakabhakeni.Iquka injongo ezaziwayo njenge Orion Nebula M 42,i Andromeda Galaxy M 31,ne Pleiades M 45.
