input: Welcome to the tutorial course for Kolf
target: Comment Wamkelekile kwimbuyiselo yokufundiweyo ye Kolf

input: To hit the ball,press and hold the Down Arrow or left mouse button. How long you hold down the mouse button or key determines strength of the shot.
target: Comment Ukubetha ibhola cofa ubambe umkhonto ojonge phantsi okanye icala lasekhohlo lemouse.Ixesha olithathayo xa ucinezela iqhosha lemouse okanye iqhosa lekeyboard lithetha amandla obethe ngawo.

input: To aim the putter,press the Left rotate counterclockwise and Right rotate clockwise Arrow keys or use the mouse.
target: CommentJolisa induku ye golf,ncinizela Ekohlo ukujikelezisa ngokwe kloko ockwise Nasekunene jikelezisa ikloko Itolo lezitshixo zebhodi okanye usebenzise i mouse.

input: Bridges Bridges can have walls on the top,bottom,left,or right.
target: Comment Iibhulorho Iibhulorho zingaba neendonga ngaphezulu,ngezantsi,ekhohlo okanye ekunene.

input: Everything Here's a hole that has it all. Have fun with Kolf -- Jason Katz-Brown
target: Comment Yonke into Nanku umngxunya oqulathe konke.Yiba nolonwabo ne Kolf -- Jason Katz- Brown

input: Slopes Slopes are slanted areas of ground that push the ball in the direction that they slope. This direction is shown when you choose Hole- Show Info.
target: Comment Amathambeka Amathambeka ngamacala lalele kwiindawo zebala alityhala ibhola kwicala athambekele kulo.Le ndlela iboniswe when you choose Hole - Show Info.

input: Hit the ball onto the slope and let it roll into cup.
target: CommentBetha ibhola edongeni uphinde uyeke iqengqelekele ekhaphini.

input: Try out these different types of slopes.
The steepness of a slope is shown when you choose Hole- Show Info. Steepness goes from 8 steepest to 1 shallowest.
target: CommentUkwenyukela kwethambeka kuboniswa xa ukhetha Umngxuma - Bonisa ulwazi.Ukwenyukela buqala kwisibhozo eyona enyukeleyo ukuya kwenye Eyona enganzulwanga.

input: Walls Bounce the ball off of the red walls.
target: Comment Amadonga Betha phantsi ibhola ngaphandle kwamadonga abomvu.

input: Sand Sand is yellow,and slows your ball down.
target: Comment Isanti Isanti etyheli,ucothise ibhola phantsi.

input: Puddles Water Hitting into a puddle blue adds a penalty stroke to your score,and your ball is placed outside the puddle.
target: Comment Ichityana Amanzi Bethela kwi chityana bhlowu yongeza umvumbo wesohlwayo kwinqaku lakho,nebhola yakho ibekwe ngaphandle kwechityana.

input: Windmills Windmills brown base with moving arm have brown walls or half walls. The speed of the windmill arm may vary for each hole.
target: Comment Amaphiko omoya Amaphiko omoya Isiseko esimdaka nebala kunye nengalo ehambayo Yiba namadonga amdaka ngebala Okanye isiqingatha samadonga.amendu engalo yephikomoya angahluka ngomngxunya.

input: Black Holes Black Holes transport the ball to their exit,and eject it at a speed in direct relation to the speed your ball was traveling. Choose Hole- Show Info to see which Black Hole goes to which exit and the direction the ball will come out.
target: Comment Imingxuma Emnyama Imingxuma Emnyama ihambisa ibhola iyokutsho kwindawo yazo yokuphuma,ize iyikhuphe ngqo ngesantya esihlobene kwisantya ibihamba ngaso ibhola yakho.Khetha Umngxuma - Bonisa Ulwazi ze bone ukuba ngowuphi Umngxuma Omnyama ohamba ayokutsho kweliphi icala lendlela nakweyiphi indawo yokuphuma eza kuza kulo ibhola yakho.

input: Floaters Floaters are moving platforms that carry a ball that lands on it. Floaters' speeds vary.
target: Comment Izinto ezidadayo Floaters are moving platforms that carry a ball that lands on it.Floaters speeds vary.Name

Indawo ephelela kuyo No value has been set

input: Modify the mirrors used for downloading.
target: The available mirrors servers for downloading
hash as a hash of type md5,sha1 etc.
Check as in mark,not as in verify

target: Ifayile yendawo ephelela kuyo sele ikhona.Uyafuna ukuyibhala ngaphezuluIfayile

target: Ayinakufunda ifayile 1Download normally not as first or last

input: Each row consists of exactly one extension type and one folder.
target: Umqolo ngamnye unohlobo lolwandiso olunye ngqo kunye nomlawuli omnye

input: Keep this window open after the operation is complete.
target: Gcina le window ivulekile emva kokuba usebenzo lugqityiwe.

input: File 1 exists. Do you want to replace it
Failed to make a backup copy of 1. Continue anyway
target: Ayiphumelelanga ukwenza ukhuphelo lwasemva lwe 1.Qhubekeka noko

input: Resume button starts selected transfers and sets their mode to queued.
Pause button stops selected transfers and sets their mode to delayed.
target: Phindisela iqhosha liqala izinikezi ezikhethiweyo kwaye icwangcise indlela yayo ku foliso.

input: Delete button removes selected transfers from the list.
target: Phumla iqhosha limisa izinikezi ezikhethiweyo kwaye icwangcisa indlela yayo ku libaziseko.

input: Restart button is a convenience button that simply does Pause and Resume.
target: Cima iqhosha lisusa izinikezi ezikhethiweyo kuluhlu.

input: Queued button sets the mode of selected transfers to queued. It is a radio button -- you can choose between three modes.
target: Iqala kwakhona iqhosha liqhosha lokunceda elingaphumlisiyo nelingaphindiseliyo.

input: Scheduled button sets the mode of selected transfers to scheduled. It is a radio button -- you can choose between three modes.
target: Ifolisiwe iqhosha licwangcisa indlela ekhethiweyo yezinikezi ku foliso.Liqhosha lonomathotholo,ungakhetha phakathi kweendlela ezintathu.

input: Delayed button sets the mode of selected transfers to delayed. This also causes the selected transfers to stop. It is a radio button -- you can choose between three modes.
target: Icwangcisiwe iqhosha licwangcisa indlela ekhethiweyo yezinikezi ku icwangisiwe.Iqhosha layo likanomathotholo,ungakhetha phakathi kweendlela ezintathu.

input: Preferences button opens a preferences dialog where you can set various options. Some of these options can be more easily set using the toolbar.
target: Ilibazisekile iqhosha licwangcisa indlela yezikhethiweyo izinikezi ku libaziseko.Oku kuzakubangela izinikezi ezikhethiweyo zime.Iqhosha layo likanomathotholo,ungakhetha phakathi kweendlela ezintathu.

input: Paste transfer button adds a URL from the clipboard as a new transfer. This way you can easily copypaste URLs between applications.
target: Iinketho iqhosha livula incoko yababini yeenketho apho ungacwangcisa iinketho ezahlukeneyo.Ezinye zeenketho zingalula kakhulu ukuzicwangcisa usebenzisa isixhobo se bar.

Lahla itekeni iqhosha liqhobosha uhlobo lwe window phakathi kweqhelekileyo iwindow kwaye netekeni yolahlo.Xa ucwangcisa,iwindow yoqobo izakufihlwa kwaye endaweni yoko emilise buncinane iwindow izakuvela.Ungabonisa ufihle eqhelekileyo iwindow ngonqakrazo olulula kwemilileyo iwindow.

input: Do you really want to disconnect
Remove files from a list after success

target: Lindela indlela sukuqalela ukurhoxisa okanye ucime
Nqamla uxhulumaniso oluzenzekelayo emva kokuba ugqibile ukulayishela phantsi
Kwindlela yokungena okanye kwimposiso yexesha lokuphuma
KhethaLabel for the default identity,used by users to group their instant messaging accounts

input: You must provide a valid local filename
You must provide a valid local directory
You have connected from another client or computer to the account '1
Allows you to modify the selected account
target: Ikuvumela ukuba iguqule i akhawunti ekhethiweyo

input: Create a new dialup connection to the Internet
target: Yenza uxhulumanisa loku cofa kwi Internet

input: Makes a copy of the selected account. All settings of the selected account are copied to a new account that you can modify to fit your needs
target: Yenza ukhuphelo lwe akhawunti elikhethiweyo.Zonke izicwangciso ze akhawunti ekhethiweyo zikhutshelwa kwi akhawunti entsha,ongayiguqula ukuba ilingane iimfuno zakho

input: Deletes the selected account Use with care
target: Icima i akhawunti ekhethiweyo Sebenzisa ngenkathalo

input: This shows the accumulated phone costs for the selected account.If you have more than one account - beware,this is NOT the sum of the phone costs of all your accounts
target: Oku kubonisa amaxabiso emfono- mfono aqokelelwe ndawonye bekayo ukunyuka etyala elikhethiweyo.Kubalulekile Ukuba une akhawunti engaphezulu kwesinye - lumka,oku Asiyo isixa samaxabiso emfonomfono ee akhawunti zakho

input: This shows the number of bytes transferred for the selected account not for all of your accounts. You can select what to display in the accounting dialog. More on volume accounting
target: Oku kubonisa inani le bytes ezinikeziweyo ze akhawunti ekhethiweyo hayi ele akhawunti matyala akho wonke.Ungakhetha onoku kubonisa kwincoko yabababini yeze akhawunti.Ngaphezulu kwi zinga leze akhawunti

input: Do you want to use the wizard to create the new account or the standard,dialog-based setup The wizard is easier and sufficient in most cases. If you need very special settings,you might want to try the standard,dialog-based setup.
target: Ufuna ukusebenzisa iwizard ukwenza i akhawunti entsha okanye umgangatho,wesicwangciso sencoko yababini esekiweyo I wizard ilula kwaye yanele kwi miba emininzi.Ukuba ufuna izicwangciso ezikhetheke kakhulu,ungafuna ukuzama umgamgatho,isicwangciso,esisekwe- kwincoko yababini.

input: Are you sure you want to delete the account 1
You must enter a unique account name
target: Kufuneka ungenise elinye igama le akhawunti eyahlukileyo

input: Login script has unbalanced loop Start End
target: Indlela yokungena yokushicilelo lwesangqa esingalinganiyo Sesiqalo Isiphelo
Cwangcisa kwakhona amaxabiso emfono mfono aqokelelwe ndawonye

input: Check this to set the phone costs to zero. Typically you will want to do this once a month.
target: Khangela oku ukucwangcisa amaxabiso emfono- mfonofowuni kunothi.Ngenene ufuna ukwenza oku kanye ngenyanga.

input: Check this to set the volume accounting to zero. Typically you will want to do this once a month.
target: Khangela oku ukucwangcisa izinga lesansi lwe sifundo see akhawunti ku nothi.Ngokwesiqhelo uzakufuna ukwenza oku kanye ngenyanga.

input: Unable to create modem lock file.
target: Ayikwazi ukwenza i fayile yotshixo ye modem.
Isiphelo somjikelezo ngaphandle kwesi Qalo esifanayo Ilayini 1

input: pppd command command-line arguments exceed 2024 characters in length.
target: umyalelo we pppd iimpikiswano ze layini- yomyalelo idlule ngaphezulu kwabasebenzisi abayi 2024 ngobude.
Indlela yokungena Yokushicilelweyo kwe Ndlela yokukhupha amagciwane e Window

input: Type in a unique name for this connection
target: Chwetheza kwi gama elilodwa lolu xhulumaniso

input: Specifies the phone numbers to dial. You can supply multiple numbers here,simply click on Add. You can arrange the order the numbers are tried by using the arrow buttons. When a number is busy or fails,kppp will try the next number and so on
target: Ikhankanya amanani eemfono- mfono ukucofa.Unga nikeza amanani amaninzi apha,nqakraza ngokulula ku Yongeza.Unga hlenga- hlengisa indlela amanani azanywa ngayo ngokusebenzisa amaqhosha entolo.Xa inani lixakekile okanye lahluleka i,kppp iza kuzama inani elilandelayo njalo- njalo

input: When this is turned on,your ISP password will be saved in kppp's config file,so you do not need to type it in every time.your password will be stored as plain text in the config file,which is readable only to you. Make sure nobody gains access to this file
target: Xa oku kuvuliwe,igama lokugqitha lakho le ISP lizakugcinwa kwi kpppyefayile yoqwalaselo,ngoko akuyomfuneko ukuchwetheza lonke ixesha.Isilumkiso igama lakho lokugqitha lizakugcinwa njengo kubhaliweyo okungenanto kwifayile yoqwalaselo,efundeka kuwe kuphela.Qiniseka ukuba akukho mntu ofumana imvume yokungena kule fayile

input: Allows you to run a program before a connection is established. It is called immediately before dialing has begun. This might be useful,e. g. to stop HylaFAX blocking the modem.
target: Ikuvumela ukuba usebenzise inkqubo yodweliso phambi uxhulumaniso lusekiwe.Ibizwa ngokukhawuleza phambi kokuba ucofo luqalwe.Oku kunokuba luncedo,umzekelo.ukumisa i HylaFax evalela i modem.

input: Allows you to run a program after a connection is established. When your program is called,all preparations for an Internet connection are finished. Very useful for fetching mail and news
target: Ikuvumela ukuba usebenzise udweliso lwenkqubo emva kokuba uxhulumaniso lusekiwe.Xa udweliso lwenkqubo lwakho lubizwa,lonke ulungiselelo loxhulumaniso lwe Internet lugqityiwe.Iluncedo kakhulu kulando lweposi neendaba

input: Allows you to run a program before a connection is closed. The connection will stay open until the program exits.
target: Ikuvumela ukuba usebenzise udweliso lwenkqubo phambi kokuba uxhulumaniso luvalwe.Uxhulumaniso luzakuhlala luvulekile kude kube udweliso lwenkqubo lukhona.

input: Allows you to run a program after a connection has been closed.
target: Ikuvumela ukuba usebenzise udweliso lwenkqubo emva kokuba uxhulumaniso luvalwe.

input: Select this option when your computer gets an internet address IP every time a connection is made. Almost every Internet Service Provider uses this method,so this should be turned on.
target: Khetha olu khetho xa ikhomputha yakho ifumana idilesi ye Internet IP lonke ixesha uxhulumaniso lusenziwa.Phantse wonke Umnikezi Wenkonzo ye Internet usebenzisa le ndlela,ngoko oku kuno kuvulwaqalwa.

input: Select this option when your computer has a fixed internet address IP. Most computers do not have one,so you should probably select dynamic IP addressing unless you know what you are doing.
target: Khetha olu khetho xa ikhomputha yakho inedilesi engatshintsiyo ye Internet IP.Iikhompyutha ezininzi azinayo le nto,ngoko ungakhetha etshintshayo idilesi ye IP ngaphandle kokuba uyakwazi okwenzayo.

input: If your computer has a permanent internet address,you must supply your IP address here.
target: Ukuba ikhomputha yakho idilesi ye Internet yanomphelo,kufuneka unikeze idilesi yakho ye IP apha.

input: If your computer has a static Internet address,you must supply a network mask here. In almost all cases this netmask will be 255.255.255.0,but your mileage may vary. If unsure,contact your Internet Service Provider
target: Ukuba ikhomputha yakho inedilesi ye Internet engatshintshiyo,kufuneka unikeze isigqumathelo somsebenzi womnatha apha.Phantse kuyo yonke imiba esi sigqumathelo somnatha siza kuba yi 255.255.255.0,kodwa umlinganiselo ungahluka.Ukuba awuqinisekanga,qhagamshelana Nomnikezeli Wenkonza ye Internet wakho
Qwalasela- ngokuzenzekelayo igama lenginginya ukusuka kule IP

input: Whenever you connect,this reconfigures your hostname to match the IP address you got from the PPP server. This may be useful if you need to use a protocol which depends on this information,but it can also cause several problems. Do not enable this unless you really need it.
target: Nanini na uxhulumanisa,oku kuqwalasela kwakhona igama lakho lenginginya lifane ne dilesi ye IP onayo esuka kumncedisi we PPP.Oku kunokuba luncedo ukuba ufuna ukusebenzisa imithetho elandelwayo exhomekeke kule nkcukacha,kodwa inokubangela ezininzi iingxaki.Sukwenza oku ngaphandle kokuba uyifuna ngokwenene

input: Selecting this option might cause some weird problems with the X-server and applications while kppp is connected. Do not use it unless you know what you are doing. For more information take a look at the handbook or help in the Frequently asked questions section.
target: Ukukhetha olu khetho kunokubangela iingxaki ezinga qhelekanga ngomncedisi we- X kunye nezicelongexesha i kppp ixhulumane.Musa ukuyisebenzisa ude ube uyakwazi okwenzayo Xa ufuna iinkcukacha ezininzi jonga kwi ncwadi yesandla okanye uncedo kwicandelo Buza imibuzo rhoqo.

input: If you enter a domain name here,this domain name is used for your computer while you are connected. When the connection is closed,the original domain name of your computer is restored. If you leave this field blank,no changes are made to the domain name.
target: Ukuba ungenisa igama lendawo apha,le ndawo lethambeka lisetyenziswa kwi khomputha yakho ngexesha uxhulumanisa.Xa uxhulumaniso luvaliwe,igama lendawo loqobo lwe khomputha yakho luyagcinwa kwakhona.Ukuba ushiya lo mhlaba ungenanto,akukho lutshintsho lwenziwayo kwigama lendawo.

input: Allows you to specify a new DNS server to be used while you are connected. When the connection is closed,this DNS entry will be removed again. To add a DNS server,type in the IP address of the DNS server here and click on Add
target: Ikuvumela ukuba ukhankanye umncedisi omtsha we DNS oza kusetyenziswa ngexesha uxhulumeneyo.Xa uxhulumano luvaliwe,olu ngeno lwe DNS luza kususwa kwakhona.Ukongeza umncedisi we DNS,chwetheza kwidilesi ye IP yomncedisi we DNS apha kwaye nqakraza ku Yongeza

input: Click this button to add the DNS server specified in the field above. The entry will then be added to the list below
target: Nqakraza eli qhosha ukongeza umncedisi we DNS okhankanywe kumhlaba ngasentla.Ungeno luzakongezwa kuluhlu ngezantsi

input: Click this button to remove the selected DNS server entry from the list below
target: Nqakraza eli qhosha ukuze ususe ungenelo lomncedisi we DNS ekhethiweyo esuka kuluhlu olusezantsi

input: This shows all defined DNS servers to use while you are connected. Use the Add and Remove buttons to modify the list
target: Oku kubonisa bonke abancedisi abachaziweyo be DNS bokusetyenziswa ngexesha uxhulumeneyo.Sebenzisa i Yongeza ze Ususe amaqhosha ukulungisa kancinane uluhlu

input: Disable existing DNS servers during connection
target: Khubaza abancedisi abakhoyo be DNS ngexesha loxhulumaniso

input: When this option is selected,all DNS servers specified in etc resolv. conf are temporary disabled while the dialup connection is established. After the connection is closed,the servers will be re-enabled Typically,there is no reason to use this option,but it may become useful under some circumstances.
target: Xa olu khetho lukhethiwe,bonke abancedisi be DNS abakhankanywe ku njalo- njalo resolv.conf bakhubazeke okwexesha elifutshane ngexesha uxhulumaniso locofo lusekiwe.Emva kokuba uxhulumaniso luvaliwe,abancedisi bazakwenziwa- kwakhona Ngokuqhelekileyo,akukho sizathu sokusebenzisa olu khetho,kodwa lunga sebenziseka phantsi kwezinye iimeko.

input: Allows you to specify which computer you want to use as gateway see Default Gateway above
target: Ikuvumela ukuba ukhankanye ikhomputha oyifunayo ukuyi sebenzisa njenge ndlela yesango bona Indlela yesango Sendalo ngasentla

input: Assign the default route to this gateway
target: Nikezela ngendlela ehamba ngayo engagqibekanga kulendlela yesango

input: If this option is enabled,all packets not going to the local net are routed through the PPP connection. Normally,you should turn this on
target: Ukuba olu khetho lwenziwe,zonke iipakethi ezingayi kumnatha wobulali zinendlela ezihambe ngayo ukugqitha kuxhulumaniso lwe PPP.Ngokwesiqhelo,umele uvule lena.

input: kppp will wait this number of seconds to see if a PPP connection is established. If no connection is made in this time frame,kppp will give up and kill pppd.
target: kppp izakulinda elinani lemizuzwana ubone ukuba i PPP uxhulumaniso lusekiwe.Ukuba akukho xhulumaniso lwenziweyo kwesi sakhelo sexesha,kppp izakunikezela kwaye ibulale i pppd.
Faka phakathi kwi qela lenjongo kuxhulumano

input: After a connection is established,the window is minimized and a small icon in the KDE panel represents this window. Clicking on this icon will restore the window to its original location and size.
target: Emva kokuba uxhulumaniso lusekiwe,i window inciphisiwe kwaye iphawu lemifanekiso encinane kwiqela lenjongo le KDE limele le window.Ukunqakraza kweli phawu lemifanekiso kuzakugcina i window kwindawo yayo yoqobo kunye nobungakanani.

input: When a connection is established and it somehow gets disconnected,kppp will try to reconnect to the same account. See here for more on this topic.
target: Xa uxhulumaniso lusekiwe kwaye ngandlela ithile inqamla uxhulumaniso,kppp izakuzama ukuxhulumana kwakhona kwi akhawunti efanayo.Bonaapha ngaphezulu kwesi sihloko.

input: When this option is checked,the window title shows the time since a connection was established. Very useful,so you should turn this on
target: Xa olu khetho lukhangelwe,i window ye wonga ibonisa ixesha kuba uxhulumaniso lwasekwa.Iluncedo kakhulu,ngoko ungavula oku
Nqamla uxhulumaniso kumncedisi we X wokuvala phantsi

input: Checking this option will close any open connection when the X-server is shut down. You should enable this option unless you know what you are doing. See here for more on this.
target: Ukukhangela olu khetho kuzakuvala naluphi uxhulumaniso xa umncedisi we X evala phantsi.Ungalwenza olu khetho ngaphandle kokuba uyakwazi okwenzayo.Bona apha ngaphezulu kule.

input: When this option is turned on,kppp will be closed when you disconnect
target: Xa olu khetho luvulwa,kppp izakuvalwa xa unqamla uxhulumaniso

input: Iconifies kppp's window when a connection is established
target: Yenza iphawu lemifanekiso kwi kppp ye window xa uxhulumaniso lusekiwe

input: Type in a unique name for this modem
target: Chwetheza kwi gama elilodwa lolu xhulumaniso

input: Specifies how the serial port and modem communicate. You should not change this unless you know what you are doing.CRTSCTS
target: Ikhankanya indlela uthotho lezibuko ne modem zithungelana ngayo.Awunakutshintsha oku ngaphandle kokuba uyakwazi okwenzayo.Okwendalo CRTSCTS

input: Specifies how AT commands are sent to your modem. Most modems will work fine with the default CR LF. If your modem does not react to the init string,CR LF
target: Ikhankanya indlela imiyalelo ye AT ethunyelwa ngayo kweyakho imodem.Iimodem ezininzi zizakusebenza kakuhle ngokunga gqibekanga CR LF.Ukuba eyakho i modem ayisebenzi kumgca wesivakalisi sokuqala,umele uzame izicwangciso ezahlukileyo apha Okwendalo CR LF

input: Specifies the speed your modem and the serial port talk to each other. You should begin with at least 115200 bits sec or more if you know that your serial port supports higher speeds. If you have connection problems,try to reduce this value.
target: Ikhankanya isantya seyakho imodem kunye nothotho lwentetho yezibuko ethetha nenye.Umele uqale ngo kungagqibekanga kwe 38400 amasuntswana umzuzwana.Ukuba yonke into iyasebenza ungazama ukunciphisa eli xabiso,kodwa hayi ngaphezulu kwe 115200 amasuntswana umzuzwana ngaphandle kokuba uyazi ukuba uthotho lwakho lezibuko lixhasa izantya eziphezulu.

input: To prevent other programs from accessing the modem while a connection is established,a file can be created to indicate that the modem is in use. On Linux an example file would be var lock LCK.. ttyS1 Here you can select whether this locking will be done.On
target: Ukunqanda ezinye iinkqubo ukusuka kwindlela yokungena ikwi modem ngexesha uxhulumaniso lusekiwe,ifayile iingenziwa ukubonisa ukuba imodem iyasetyenziswa.Kwi Linux ifayile yomzekelo izakuba yi var lock LCK.ttyS1 Apha ungakhetha ukuba olu tshixo luza kwenziwa.Okwendalo Kwi

input: This specifies how long kppp waits for a CONNECT response from your modem. The recommended value is 30 seconds.
target: Oku kuchaza ukuba kukade kangakanani kppp ukulindela u Uxhulumaniso impendulo esuka kwi modem yakho.Ixabiso elicetyiswayo yi 30 yemizuzwana.

input: Wait for dial tone before dialing
target: Lindela isandi socofo phambi kokucofa amanani

input: Normally the modem waits for a dial tone from your phone line,indicating that it can start to dial a number. If your modem does not recognize this sound,or your local phone system does not emit such a tone,uncheck this option Default On
target: Ngokwesiqhelo imodem ilinda isandi socofo esivela kwilayini yefowuni yakho,ibonisa ukuba ingaqala ukucofa inani.Ukuba imodem yakho ayisazi esi sandi okanye indlela yemfonomfono yobulali ayikhuphi isandi esinjalo,sukukhangela olu khetho Okwendalo Kwi

input: Specifies the number of seconds to wait before redial if all dialed numbers are busy. This is necessary because some modems get stuck if the same number is busy too often. The default is 0 seconds,you should not change this unless you need to.
target: Ikhankanya inani lemizuzwana emayilindwe phambi phinda ucofe wonke amanani acofiweyo axakekile.Oku kuyimfuneko kuba ezinye iimodem ziyaxinga ukuba inani elifanayo lixakeke rhoqo.Okwendalo ngu 0 imizuzwana,awunakutshintsha oku ngaphandle kokuba ufuna njalo.

input: Most modems have a speaker which makes a lot of noise when dialing. Here you can either turn this completely off or select a lower volume. If this does not work for your modem,you must modify the modem volume command.
target: Iimodem ezininzi zinesithethi esenza ingxolo eninzi xa ucofa.Apha ungakwazi noba oku kucime ngokupheleleyo okanye khetha izinga lelizwi elisezantsi.Ukuba oku akusebenzi kwimodem yakho,kufuneka ulungise kancinane izinga lelizwi le modem.

input: This controls how kppp detects that the modem is not responding. Unless you are having problems with this,do not modify this setting.Off
target: Oku kulawula ukuba i kppp ibhaqa njani imodem ayiphenduli.Ngaphandle kokuba unee ngxaki ngale nto,sukuguqula kancinane esi sicwangciso.Okwendalo Kucimile

input: Allows you to change the AT command for your modem.
target: Ikuvumela ukuba utshintshe umyalelo we AT we modem yakho.

input: Most modems support the ATI command set to find out vendor and revision of your modem. Press this button to query your modem for this information. It can be useful to help you set up the modem
target: Iimodem ezininzi zixhasa ucwangciso lomyalelo we ATI fumana umthengisi kunye ukhumbuzo lwe modem.Cinezela eli qhosha ukuze ubuze imodem yakho le nkcukacha.Kunokuba luncedo ukunceda ukucwangcisa i modem

input: Opens the built-in terminal program. You can use this if you want to play around with your modem's AT command set
target: Ivula inkqubo eyakhelwe- ngaphakathi.Unga sebenzisa oku ukuba ufuna ukudlala jikelele ngocwangciso lomyalelo wemodem yakho ye AT

input: Type in the username that you got from your ISP. This is especially important for PAP and CHAP. You may omit this when you use terminal-based or script-based authentication.myusername is not the same as MyUserName.
target: Chwetheza igama lomsebenzisi onaye kweyakho i ISP.Oku kubaluleke ngoku khethekileyo kwi PAP ne CHAP.Ungashiya oku xa usebenzisa isiphelo sendlela- esisekiweyo okanye uqinisekiso loshicilelo- olusekiweyo.Kubalulekile umba obalulekileyo apha igamalamlomsebenzisi alifani ne GamaLamLomsebenzisi

input: Type in the password that you got from your ISP. This is especially important for PAP and CHAP. You may omit this when you use terminal-based or script-based authentication.mypassword is not the same as MyPassword.
target: Chwetheza kwigama lokugqitha onalo kweyakho i ISP.Oku kubaluleke ngokukhethekileyo kwi PAP ne CHAP.Ungashiya oku xa usebenzisa isiphelo sendlela- esisekiweyo okanye uqwalaselo loshicilelo- olusekiweyo.Kubalulekile umba ubalulekile apha igamalamlokugqitha ayifani ne IgamaLamLokugqitha
Bonisa ushicilelo lwe nkqubo lwe window

input: This controls whether a log window is shown. A log window shows the communication between kppp and your modem. This will help you in tracking down problems. Turn it off if kppp routinely connects without problems

input: If you check this box,the selected image will be scaled to fit the total size of the selected area. Image ratio will be adjusted to match the area size and height if necessary.

target: Apha ungakhetha ubuninzi bomfanekiso enokukhanyiselwa ngayo ukuze ungabinako ukuphazamisa kakhulu indawo ekhethiweyo.Imifanekiso eyahlukeneyo ifuna izicwangciso ezahlukeneyo,kodwa 25 lixabiso elilungileyo ukuqala ngalo.
Ukuba ukhangela le bhokisi,umfanekiso okhethiweyo uzakubekwa embindini phezu kwendawo ekhethiweyo.Ukuba umfanekiso mkhulu ngoko indawo,uzakubona kuphela indawo ephakathi yayo.

input: This page lets you configure the colors in which your chart is displayed. Each part of the chart can be assigned a different color.

This color is used for displaying titles for the X horizontal axis. This setting overrides the setting Title Color.
This color is used for displaying titles for the Y vertical axis. This setting overrides the setting Title Color.

input: The WEEKS function returns the difference between two dates in weeks.if the mode is 0,WEEKS returns the maximal possible number of weeks between those days. If the mode is 1,it only returns the number of whole weeks in between.
target: WEEKS ubuyisela umehluko phakathi kwemihla emibini kwiveki.i Parameter yesithathu ichaza indlela yobalo Ukuba indlela yi 0,WEEKS ibuyisela elona nani elandisiweyo lweveki phakathi kwezomini.Ukuba indlela yi 1,ibuyisela kuphela inani leveki ezipheleleyo phakathi kwazo.

input: WEEKS2002-02-18 2002-02-26 0 returns 1,because there is one week and 1 day in between
target: WEEKS 2002- 02- 18 2002- 02- 26 0 ibuyisela 1,ngokuba kukho iveki nemini enye phakathi

input: WEEKS2002-19-02 2002-19-02 1 returns 0,because there is not a whole week in between,starting at the first day of the week monday or sunday,depending on your local settings
target: WEEKS 2002- 19- 02 2002- 19- 02 1 ibuyela 0,ngokuba akukho veki epheleleyo phakathi,iqala kwimini yeveki yokuqala umvulo okanye icawe,kuxhomekeke kwizicwangciso zakho zobulali

input: The MONTHS function returns the difference between two dates in months.if the mode is 0,MONTHS returns the maximal possible number of months between those days. If the mode is 1,it only returns the number of complete months in between.
target: MONTHS umsebenzi ubuyisela umehluko phakathi kwimihla eimbini kwiinyanga.i Parameter yesithatut ibonisa ubalo lendlela ukuba indlela ingu 0,MONTHS ibuyisela elonana nani lenyanga phakathi kwalomihla.Ukuba indlela ingu 1,ibuyisela kuphela inani lenyanga ezigqibekileyo ngaphakathi.

input: MONTHS2002-01-18 2002-02-26 0 returns 1,because there is 1 month and 8 days in between
target: MONTHS 2002- 01- 18 2002- 02- 26 0 returns 1,because there is 1 month and 8 days in between

input: MONTHS2002-01-19 2002-02-26 1 returns 0,because there is not a whole month in between,starting at the first day of the month
target: MONTHS 2002- 01- 19 2002- 02- 26 1 ibuyela 0,ngokuba akukho nyanga epheleleyo phakathi,ekuqaleni kwemini yokuqala yenyanga

input: The YEARS function returns the difference between two dates in years.if the mode is 0,YEARS returns the maximal possible number of years between those days. If the mode is 1,it only returns whole years,starting at the 1st Jan and ending on the 31st Dec.
target: YEARS umsebenzi ubuyisela umahluko phakathi kwemini ezimbini ngeminyaka.i Parameter yesithathu ibonisa ubalo lendlela ukuba indlela ingu 0,YEARS ibuyisela ezona nyanga ezinintsi phakathi kwezomini.Ukuba indlela ingu 1,izakubuyisela kuphela iminyaka epheleleyo,eqala ngo 1st Jan iphele ngo 31st Dec.

input: YEARS2001-02-19 2002-02-26 0 returns 1,because there is one year and 7 days in between
target: YEARS 2001- 02- 19 2002- 02- 26 0 ibuyela 1,ngokuba kukho unyaka omnye neminin ezisixenxe phakathi

input: YEARS2002-02-19 2002-02-26 1 returns 0,because there is not a whole year in between,starting at the first day of the year
